THEY MUST COME FORWARD . <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THIS SHIP IS A FLAG OF CONVENIENCE REGISTRY, &nbsp;AND ALL CONTACT DATA WILL BE BUFFERED .<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>IN 1983 WHEN I WAS A SHIP CAPTAIN IN SCI , &nbsp;I HAD FOUGHT A BATTLE AND WON.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>INDIAN SAILORS CDC ( CERTIFICATE OF CONTINIOUS\nDISCHARGE ) COULD NOT BE ENDORSED WITH ANY OTHER REMARK THAN VG ( VERY GOOD ) &nbsp;FOR CONDUCT AND ABILITY <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THE REASON WAS WE HAD SOME ROGUE INDIAN SHIP CAPTAINS\nGIVING ADVERSE REMARKS LIKE \u201cVERY BAD \u201c ETC\u2014DEPENDING ON HIS MOOD OF THE DAY OR\nSOBRIETY OF THE HOUR . &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THOSE DAYS THE CDC ( INDIAN ) HAD NO EXPIRY\nDATE. &nbsp;&nbsp;ONCE THE CDC WAS MALIGNED THE SEAMAN OR\nOFFICER COULD NOT GET ANOTHER JOB.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HE\nWAS LITERALLY OUT OF THE SEA, WITH VERY LITTLE HELP FROM GOVT AUTHORITIES OR\nSEAMANs UNIONS.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>SOME IDIOT SCI CAPTAINS WERE EVEN ENDORSING \u201c\nWARM CLOTHING ISSUED ON DATE SO AND SO\u201d<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>I WAS AFTER SCI --- I PULLED STRINGS AT HIGH\nPLACES ( CHAIRMAN WAS MY FAN ) AND SCI IMMEDIATELY TOOK OUT A CIRCULAR \u2013 &nbsp;THAT NO ADVERSE COMMENT CAN BE\nMADE BY CAPTAIN OTHER THAN VG ( VERY GOOD ) FOR CONDUCT AND ABILITY.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>I WAS A CAPTAIN TOO -- BUT A COMPASSIONATE ONE.</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THE CDC IS THE PERSONAL DOCUMENT OF A SAILOR IT\nCANNOT BE DEFACED OR ADVERSELY ENDORSED BY ANYONE, WITHOUT THE CONSENT OF THE\nSAILOR.. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THE SAILOR COULD REFUSE TO\nHAVE ANY ENDORSEMENT ON HIS OWN CDC..<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>IF REQUIRED THE CAPTAIN ( MASTER ) CAN \u201cDECLINE\nTO REPORT\u201d &nbsp;( DR) \u2013 WITH A LETTER TO THE\nSHIPPING MASTER.&nbsp; THIS ENDORSEMENT \u201cDR\u201d\nCANNOT BE MADE BY THE CAPTAIN ON THE CDC<o:p></o:p></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>\"DR\" IF ENDORSED ON CDC MUST HAVE SHIPPING MASTERs SIGN AND SEAL. THIS IS AN EXTREME STEP .&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">WITH CONTINUED EFFORT WITH UNIONS THE COLUMNS\nFOR ABILITY AND CONDUCT WAS </span><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px;\">WITHDRAWN</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;FROM THE CDC FOR EVER.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">THIS MEANS CAPTAIN CAN SACK THE SAILOR FROM\nHIS COMPANY BUT HE CANT DEFACE OR ADVERSELY ENDORSE THE SAILORs &nbsp;CDC .<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>IF THE SAILOR IS UNFIT TO BE AT SEA ( MENTAL\nCASE \u2014 CRIMINAL --SERIAL OFFENDER &nbsp;) \u2013 THERE WAS A SEPARATE\nPROCEDURE TO BAN HIM FROM SEEKING EMPLOYMENT ON INDIAN REGISTRY SHIPS.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; &nbsp; THE SHIP CAPTAIN HAS NO RIGHT TO ENDORSE THE NATIONAL CDC-- &nbsp;UNLESS THE OFFICERS ASKS FOR IT.<br />\n<br />\nTHE CAPTAIN HAS POWERS ONLY TO ENDORSE THE MARSHALL ISLAND FLAG STATE CDC.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">BANGLADESIS ARE ALWAYS AT THE RECEIVING END</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THEIR MANNING AGENTS IN BANGLADESH WILL NOT GIVE A SAILOR A JOB UNLESS THE FIRST MONTHS SALARY IS GIVEN AS BRIBE</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">AND MANY ROGUE COMPANIES SACK A SAILOR JUST AT THE END OF HIS CONTRACT- &nbsp;SO THAT HE HAS TO PAY HIS AIRFARE HOME</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 28, 2017 at 4:48 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_65MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWHY DOES GOOGLE WANT TO TAKE DOWN THIS BLOGSITE ?<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHOLE WORLD IS RUN ON A LIE.<br />\n<br />\nTHE FORCES WHO RUN THIS PLANET WANT IT TO REMAIN THIS WAY.<br />\n<br />\nIT RUFFLES KOSHER FEATHERS WHEN A BROWN SKINNED INDIAN REVEALS&nbsp;THAT&nbsp;PYRAMIDS WERE BUILT BY INDIANS USING VAASTU AND WATER FLOTATION POWER--AND STONEHENGE HAS 27 PORTALS FOR 27 NAKSHATRAS .<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIT DOES NOT SUIT THE RULING FORCES WHEN IT IS DECLARED THAT THERE IS NOT AN IOTA OF SUPERSTITION IN SANATANA DHARMA-- THAT ALL HINDU GODS ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES ( EXCEPT VISHNU MORTAL AVATARS ) -- THAT THERE IS NO HEAVEN AND HELL IN HINDUISM<br />\n<br />\nIT DOES NOT SUIT THEM WHEN ONE MAN HAS THE ANSWERS AND THE POWER TO TELL THE TRUTH.-- SAY-- WHAT GAYATRI MANTRA WHICH HAS BEEN CHANTED FOR THOUSAND OF YEARS AND BILLIONS OF WORDS OF BULLSHIT EXPLANATIONS WRITTEN IS ALL ABOUT -- WHAT IS SAVITUR--&nbsp;THE QUASAR<br />\n<br />\nTHIS INDIAN BLOGGER MAKES ALL WHITE MEN EAT CROW--IT DOES NOT SUIT THEM<br />\n<br />\nBHAGAWAD GITA IS A DEEP PROFOUND DOCUMENT -- IT HAS BEEN MURDERED, BY IDIOTS USING SANSKRIT/ ENGLISH DICTIONARY -- FAKE ROGUE GURUS ARE PREACHING THE FAKE SHALLOW ASHTAVAKRA GITA.. .<br />\n<br />\nALL PAST TRUTHS ETCHED ON ROCK BECOMES QUESTIONABLE WHEN ONE OF THEM IS ESTABLISHED AS A LIE<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL IS A LIVING LEGEND AT SEA--ONLY BECAUSE HE HAD THE BALLS TO POINT OUT THE ELEPHANT IN THE FUCKIN' ROOM AND HOLLER THAT THE EMPEROR IS NOT WEARING CLOTHES.<br />\n<br />\nSO WHAT IS A LIE WHICH IS BEING TOUTED AS THE TRUTH ?<br />\n<br />\nJUST A WEE EXAMPLE ? SOMEONE WANTED ONE SINGLE SOLID PROOF WHICH IS TANGIBLE.<br />\n<br />\nCONSIDER THIS<br />\n<br />\n#######################<br />\n<br />\nAT SEA ON CHEMICAL TANKERS,&nbsp; SAILORS WERE FORCED TO SPRAY METHANOL INSIDE CARGO TANKS.&nbsp; &nbsp;THE WHOLE IDEA WAS TO USE THE TEST MEDIUM WHICH IS USED TO DO WALL WASH AND CHEAT AND PASS TANKS.<br />\n<br />\nIN THE \"SAFETY OF LIFE AT SEA\" ( SOLAS )&nbsp; &nbsp;RULES THERE IS A PASSAGE ON \"<b><span style=\"color: red;\">LUNG DEMAND TIME</span></b>\" WHICH HAS BEEN KOSHER WHITE WASHED AS \"&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">WORKING TIME</span></b>\" IN THE PROSE<br />\n<br />\nNO REGULATION ALLOWS SAILORS TO GO DOWN INTO TANKS AND SPRAY METHANOL .<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/airline-breathing-apparatus-on-chemical.html</span><br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: By the way NO regulation allows methanol spray with SCBA IBC sets. IBC sets are not for working in the literal sense. \" Working time \" relates to \"lung demand\" of free air, which is 10 litres / min for rest, 30 litres/ min for light work and 100 litres / min for strain of fireman's lift.&nbsp; &nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Fill up a form in capital does NOT mean you have to take a flight to the capital city of your country.</span></b>&nbsp; &nbsp;SCBA sets are for emergencies and must be donned by two sailors. UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nON CHEMICAL TANKERS WE ARE GIVEN SPARE SCBA SETS CALLED IBC SETS FOR METHANOL SPRAYING ..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/scba-self-contained-breathing-apparatus.html</span><br />\n<br />\nMETHANOL SPRAY IS JUST CHEATING YOURSELF.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/methanol-spray-on-chemical-tankers-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: In the IBC code , \" working time \" has been erroneously read by vested interests as&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">official sanction</span></b>&nbsp;to do routine WORK inside chemical cargo tanks. IT IS NOT SO. \" WORKING TIME \" IS TO BE READ AS \" LUNG DEMAND TIME \" -- WHICH IS 100 LITRES OF FREE AIR A MINUTE FOR STRAIN ( OF FIREMANS LIFT RESCUE) , 30 LITRES A MINUTE FOR LIGHT ACTIVITY , AND 10 LITRES A MINUTE WHILE AT REST---UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nONLY CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL HAD THE BALLS AND THE PERCEPTION TO SPELL OUT A KOSHER LIE..<br />\n<br />\nTODAY VADAKAYILs WALL WASH METHOD IS USED ALL OVER THE GLOBE.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/02/wall-wash-method-chemical-tankers-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE WORLD RUNS ON LIES.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_65BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_10.html?showComment=1525996869030#c3498136755581129753\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 11, 2018 at 5:31 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_73MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>IMPORTANT\u2014IMPORTANT\u2014IMPORTANT\u2026\u2026\u2026.</b></span><br />I AM PENNING THIS MOST CRITICAL POST FOR THE BLIND MEN OF HINDOOSTAN WHO ARE FIGHTING OVER THE QUINTESSENTIAL ELEPHANT..<br /><br />WE HAVE BOTTOM OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES, THE IGNORANT ISI, THE FOOLISH THINK TANKS , THE PEABRAINED BENAMI MEDIA ETC , ARGUING ABOUT WHY TAJ MAHAL IS DIRTY FROM OUTSIDE AND INSIDE..<br /><br />ONLY ONE MAN ON THIS PLANET CAN GIVE YOU THIS ANSWER--HIS NAME IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL ( IF I AM BOASTING, SO BE IT !) -- HENCE LISTEN UP..<br /><br />Pure white marble used in building Taj Mahal is the result of metamorphism of a very pure (silicate-poor) limestone or dolomite protolith\u2026<br /><br />Most of the exterior marble slabs you see on Taj Mahal is ripped off from inside rooms of an older palace which stood there several centuries before JEW Shah Jahan and his JEWESS wife Mumtaj Mahal existed ..<br /><br />This is an areas where ancient Nuclear explosions took place --and hence carbon dating will show later dates... This science is so sure that if you do carbon dating in a place where a fresh nuclear explosion took place like Bikini Atoll in Pacific--the carbon dating will show several centuries into the FUTURE ( instead of past )..<br /><br />THERE WAS A CONSPIRACY TO SHUT DOWN MATHURAL OIL REFINERY-- BY DESH DROHIS IN THE PAYROLL OF THE WHITE MAN -- STATING THAT THE REFINERYs CHIMNEY EMISSIONS MAKE THE TAJ MAHAL DIRTY..<br /><br />OIL PUMPED INTO THE VADINAR ( GUJARAT ) DEEP SEA SBM TERMINAL FROM HUGE TANKERS GO ALL THE WAY TO MATHURA REFINERY BY PIPELINE WITH BOOSTER PUMPS ENROUTE.. THE SHIP WHICH I SERVED AS SECOND MATE WAS THE FIRST TO PUMP 280,000 TONNED OF RASTANURA CRUDE OIL INTO VADINAR..<br /><br />THE DISTANCE FROM MATHURA OIL REFINERY TO TAJ MAHAL ( TO THE SOUTH EAST ) IS JUST 48 KM.. THIS PIPELINE FROM VADINAR DEEP SEA TERMINAL TO MATHURA REFINERY IS ABOUT 1800 KM LONG.. A MASSIVE INVESTMENT FOR THE PROSPERITY OF BHARATATA ..<br /><br />AT THAT TIME I WAS A YOUNG OFFICER ( 1977 ) AND I SAID BULLSHIT -- WHEN I HEARD THE TOP IOC OFFICIALS TALKING ABOUT SHUTTING DOWN MATHURA REFINERY TO SAVE TAJ MAHAL - I CALLED THEM CUNTS !<br /><br />Now --<br /><br />I have carried huge 30 to 35 ton marble blocks from Sicily Italy ( Reggio Calabria ) to Kuwait , for making statues for the Kuwait Emir's palace. These marble blocks were unpolished and you would think it was a huge block of white chalk or limestone.<br /><br />THIS WAS THE YEAR 1981 , AND I WAS 37 YEARS YOUNGER.. A BACHELOR..<br /><br />WE HAD HEAVY DERRICKS FROM 40 TONNES VALLES TO 125 TONNES JUMBOS ..<br /><br />DIGRESSION : ON THE SAME SHIP I LOADED A NUCLEAR PLANT FOR SADDAM HUSSAIN ( ITALY ) AND LANDED IT DIRECTLY INTO TRUCKS AT AL-KUWAIT PORT\u2026<br /><br />THE SHIP HAD TWEEN DECKS ( UPPER AND LOWER ) INSIDE THE HOLD-- WHICH MEANT DOZENS OF HUGE HYDRAULIC CYLINDERS TO LIFT THE HATCH COVERS AND TWIN DECK COVERS..<br /><br />MY CAPTAIN WAS A MALAYALI IDIOT ( WE CALLED HIM FUCK-KNOWS-STEPHANOS ) WHO CAME UP FROM THE RANKS-- AND SO WHEN IT CAME TO USING BRAINS , I AS A THREE STRIPER CHIEF OFFICER HAD TO USE IT TO SAVE THE VENTURE--EVERY TIME.. MY CREW / COMPANY ( SCI ) LOOKED UP TO ME..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">BELOW-- WHAT I DESCRIBED AT HAMBURG DRY DOCK WAS WHAT EXACTLY HAPPENED TO THE INDIAN NAVY WARSHIP IN MUMBAI LOCKS WHICH CAPSIZED RECENTLY..&nbsp; &nbsp; READ A MOST CRITICAL COMMENT DATED 6TH DEC 2016..&nbsp; &nbsp; I HAD TO COMMENT BECAUSE OUR INDIAN NAVY IS FULL OF CUNTS SANS HONOUR ..</span></div>\n<br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/india-stands-tall-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br /><br />I WANTED THE TOP LAYER OF THE MARBLE BLOCK TO BE COVERED WITH LARGE PLASTIC SHEATH WRAPPING.. THIS COSTED TIME AND MONEY---AND THE SHIPPERS WERE UNWILLING TO DO IT..<br /><br />AS THE CHIEF MATE I SAID I WILL NOT SIGN THE MATES RECEIPTS--THERE WAS A STAND OFF --AND FINALLY I WON..<br /><br /><div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">WHAT I SAID WAS --\"ONE DROP OF HYDRAULIC OIL DRIPPING ON MARBLE DURING THE VOYAGE ( SQUIRTING PAST LEAKY SEALS IN HIGH TEMPERATURE / ROUGH SEAS ) WOULD BE SUCKED INTO THE MARBLE SLAB LIKE ABSORBANT BLOTTING PAPER RENDERING IT UNFIT FOR POLISHING..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br /><br />CONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_73BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_73b+seedBotAD\" kind=\"d\"><div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_71T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_71TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_71TN\"><div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_71TD\">\n<span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></div>\n</span></span><ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_71TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_71B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7666295950680842272\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_71M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. WHEN THIS HAPPENS DIRT AND OIL ENTERS THE MICRO PORES ..<br /><br />THIS IS WHY , WHEN I MOVED INTO MY NEW HOME TWO DECADES AGO-- I SAW HUGE WHITE RAJASTANI MARBLE SLABS IN THE KITCHEN -- I GOT THEM RIPPED OFF AND CHANGED TO HIGHLY POLISHED SUPERIOR GRANITE WHOSE UNPOLISHED PORES WERE SMALLER ..<br /><br />ALL CALLED ME CRAZY-- I SAID, I KNOW WHAT I AM DOING...THESE SURFACES WOULD BE CONSTANTLY COVERED BY OIL AND HARSH DETERGENTS..AND WOULD BE A DIRTY YELLOW EYE SORE SOONER THAN LATER ..<br /><br />WISDOM: WHEN YOU USE WHITE MARBLE SLABS--ENSURE THAT THE SURFACE IF HIGHLY POLISHED ..THIS IS EASIER DONE ON HORIZONTAL SURFACE WITHOUT GROOVES--AND ALMOST IMPOSSIBLE TO DO ON CURVED DOMES...<br /><br /><div>\n<b style=\"color: magenta; font-size: x-large;\">A COARSE UNPOLISHED MARBLE SURFACE HAS PITS WHICH HOLDS FOREIGN MATERIAL..</b></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\nI WAS THE FIRST TO INTRODUCE \"PASSIVATION\" ON STAINLESS STEEL CHEMICAL TANKERS USING NITRIC ACID-- TO BUILD UP AN ANGSTROM THIN VENEER OF CHROMIUM OXIDE.. ONE OVER SMART MALAYALI PUJARI USED STRONG AMWAY DETERGENT ON A BLACK GREASY VISHNU IDOL-- AND THE IDOL SUDDENLY STARTED SHINING LIKE GOLD..<br /><br />NOW ABOUT FLYING BROWN ALGAE..WHICH MADE THE BOTTOM OF THE CEREBRAL BARREL MELORDS GO INTO A TIZZY..<br /><br />WHITE TAJ MAHAL DOMES CAN BE DARKENED BY NANO CARBON EMISSIONS FROM CNG CARS, NANO CARBON EMISSIONS FROM LPG COOKING CYLINDERS, DIESEL EXHAUSTS OF TRUCKS, DUST STORMS EMANATING FROM PAKISTAN SIDE, ACID RAIN WHOSE FOUNTAIN HEAD IS OIL REFINERIES IN THE SAUDI ARABIAN DESERT OR POLLUTION EVEN FURTHER AWAY..<br /><br />CALIFORNIAN WINE IS SHIT - BECAUSE&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">POLLUTION FROM CHINA TRAVELS ACROSS THE PACIFIC OCEAN IN 3 DAYS FLAT LIKE A HIGH ALTITUDE BALLOON</span></b>&nbsp;AND RAINS DOWN ON THE WEST COAST OF USA.. font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Surviving INA soldiers laid out a contract on\nthe life of Bose. Bose hid like a rat for 40 years in a hole.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/netaji-subhash-chandra-bose-untold.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/netaji-subhash-chandra-bose-untold.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHY\nHAVE AN INDIAN MULE REGIMENT ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Indian\nmules would NOT run away in battle even with several bullets embedded in their\nbodies. They transported artillery, ammunition, food, and medicine, and under\nenemy fire transported the wounded.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">More important they were used for laying\nmines near approaches/ exits bridges ad shallow stream crossings .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">British\nsurgeons removed the voice box of the mules for silent night operations. Mules\noperated in rugged and slushy places where no truck or jeep with wheels ( or\neven tanks ) could dream of going. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2VKzeTUEXF4/WXb6BHInMbI/AAAAAAABU9g/MVeOWw4k35oGiCmlzt0JLRwVR8yqRprCACLcBGAs/s1600/3408858_6b0c93ef12a2d2b491663dtr57a906a6bd3_wm.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"536\" data-original-width=\"751\" height=\"456\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2VKzeTUEXF4/WXb6BHInMbI/AAAAAAABU9g/MVeOWw4k35oGiCmlzt0JLRwVR8yqRprCACLcBGAs/s640/3408858_6b0c93ef12a2d2b491663dtr57a906a6bd3_wm.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Mule\nships were dedicated - called \u201cfloating barns,\u201d carried the mules, handlers,\nand a six-month supply of fodder and water for the voyage to the combat zone.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-G0SHLsyxMVE/WXb5c3_kUkI/AAAAAAABU9Y/UNIDdEib3yk5waDiQXcUKwAmEzOnhuBzgCLcBGAs/s1600/indian-man-with-55mule-gi.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"650\" data-original-width=\"940\" height=\"442\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-G0SHLsyxMVE/WXb5c3_kUkI/AAAAAAABU9Y/UNIDdEib3yk5waDiQXcUKwAmEzOnhuBzgCLcBGAs/s640/indian-man-with-55mule-gi.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Indian\nmules would NOT fall sea sick on a ship in rough weather. While being led up\nramps mules never panicked like horses. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Indian mules being excellent swimmers\nwere lowered to water by derricks and they would promptly swim ashore with no\nfuss.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Gx2VAmUL_3E/WXb6aDKuP7I/AAAAAAABU9k/DatsVkEmJbMENozJjQzjbZL-IDxt2Qt3QCLcBGAs/s1600/main_ff900.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"458\" data-original-width=\"900\" height=\"324\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Gx2VAmUL_3E/WXb6aDKuP7I/AAAAAAABU9k/DatsVkEmJbMENozJjQzjbZL-IDxt2Qt3QCLcBGAs/s640/main_ff900.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Hundreds of mules were loaded from Calcutta too. They would swim across the\nHoogly river to the anchored ship ( allowing for river flow ) and then would be\nlifted on board from side barges. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-97cKd8So5_I/WXb5ocM3LxI/AAAAAAABU9c/u453dQg7Dv46wpo53aRRPfHpoeRg2TySQCLcBGAs/s1600/6406242-3eew3x2-940x627.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"627\" data-original-width=\"940\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-97cKd8So5_I/WXb5ocM3LxI/AAAAAAABU9c/u453dQg7Dv46wpo53aRRPfHpoeRg2TySQCLcBGAs/s640/6406242-3eew3x2-940x627.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Huge howitzer\nguns would be dismantled into five parts\u2014each carried by a mule to high places\nand then re-assembled.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Mules\nloved their Indian handlers and vice versa . The mules would allow Indian soldiers to stand on them and fire-- without moving an inch ( something a horse wont allow ) . &nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">While abandoned Indian soldiers at\nDunkirk were being led off to the mine fields\u2014it is on record that both&nbsp; mules and Indian soldiers cried. &nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-p7AV22Ma11U/WXb64pqIRlI/AAAAAAABU9o/2rOqtBWqMxkqh_TDKBOYDQj1jPJhupluQCLcBGAs/s1600/2-eew4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"525\" data-original-width=\"750\" height=\"448\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-p7AV22Ma11U/WXb64pqIRlI/AAAAAAABU9o/2rOqtBWqMxkqh_TDKBOYDQj1jPJhupluQCLcBGAs/s640/2-eew4.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">The French civilians were most impressed with the bravery of Indian soldiers .&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rxG3TtE57pw/WXddAi_1M9I/AAAAAAABU_s/7dbKUY3fBgoNuIG4mwaiSA30G0ZaxAxtwCLcBGAs/s1600/43W63968663.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"1024\" data-original-width=\"791\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rxG3TtE57pw/WXddAi_1M9I/AAAAAAABU_s/7dbKUY3fBgoNuIG4mwaiSA30G0ZaxAxtwCLcBGAs/s640/43W63968663.jpg\" width=\"494\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Before the Indian were transported by Germans to the Tungsten mines, they gave their mules to the French civilians&nbsp;</span>&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-CFrr9DfXI-E/WXb49MSVlUI/AAAAAAABU9Q/Fd6TAznnae8aDGBnN9oyHHR0pYwIeUcEwCLcBGAs/s1600/indian-soldier-watering-mules-western-front-www-drhw78.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">I ASK MY FRENCH READERS -- TELL YOUR MOVIE\nMAKERS TO MAKE A FRENCH VERSION OF \"BATTLE OF DUNKIRK\"<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">BASTARDS -- THE WHITE ENGLISH SPEAKING ANGLO\nSAXONS --TOTALLY SUBVERTED HISTORY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Gandhi recruited 25 lakh ( 2.5 million )\nIndian soldiers in the second World war. Out of this 243000 ( 2.43 lakh)\nsoldiers were killed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Gandhi and BR Ambedkar who recruited Mahars suppressed\nthe Indian story at Dunkirk.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">At Dunkirk the British evacuated only the\nwhite man &nbsp;- - incuding some French later\n. &nbsp; &nbsp;The French did NOT want to go to England\u2014rather they preferred to be\ntransported to some part of the French coast not under siege by the Germans.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Till the British evacuated the white soldier \u2013the\nFrench and Indians were bravely &nbsp;\"HOLDING THE PERIMETER\"\u2014 including the event\nknown as the &nbsp;SIEGE OF LILLE. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">More than 14, 500 Indian soldiers were\nkilled ( wounded NOT counted ) during this Dunkirk battle \u2014holding off the advancing Germans. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Qt-LWxKyaTc/WXb4eMVa2GI/AAAAAAABU9M/XfHeO06RyxsRvuT89tM5pwdgA_6Jm6IUwCLcBGAs/s1600/0dd4._1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THERE WAS A QUID PRO QUO BETWEEN JEW\nCHURCHILL AND JEW HITLER .&nbsp; &nbsp;JEW ROTHSCHILD MEDIATED AS HE WANTED THE WAR\nTO PROLONG AND INVOLVE THE WHOLE PLANET TO CARVE OUT ISRAEL</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">HITLER ALLOWED THESE COWARDLY BRITISH\nSOLDIERS TO ESCAPE FROM DUNKIRK BEACH --PROVIDED THEY LEFT ENOUGH INDIAN POWs\nFOR THEIR MINES -- &nbsp;AND OF COURSE THEY\nCOULD NOT TAKE AWAY HEAVY EQUIPMENT IN SMALL FISHING &nbsp;BOATS OVER A 34 KM VOYAGE . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THESE STUPID BRITISH SOLDIERS WERE STANDING\nLIKE IDIOTS IN LONG QUEUES FOR SEVERAL DAYS ON DUNKIRK BEACH..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHY DID I START THIS BLOGSITE?</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">TO EXPOSE ZIONIST JEW AND WHITE MANs LIES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1945, the Vatican\nhad received 350 million Swiss francs in Nazi gold for\n\"safekeeping,\".&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Bigelow report&nbsp;\nstated that the balance of the gold was held in one of the Vatican\u2019s\nnumbered Swiss bank accounts. font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The white British soldier would faint when they see blood and gore. &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">They shat on seeing the drawn Japanese samurai blades. &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Only Indian soldiers had the guts to engage the Japs sword to sword.</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-B1rA_SMXLeY/WXdSVXtIqzI/AAAAAAABU-4/XleEZJU7Hc0j81zVVeZQ0tadc2CF0-cKQCLcBGAs/s1600/british-surreender-to-japanese-at-singapore.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"265\" data-original-width=\"600\" height=\"282\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-B1rA_SMXLeY/WXdSVXtIqzI/AAAAAAABU-4/XleEZJU7Hc0j81zVVeZQ0tadc2CF0-cKQCLcBGAs/s640/british-surreender-to-japanese-at-singapore.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>YOU SEE, THE COWARDLY BRITISH WHITE SOLDIER\nNEVER RETREATS .&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>HE ONLY ADVANCES IN ANOTHER DIRECTION, &nbsp;WHILE BEATING THE RETREAT IN BAND AND REGALIA \u2013PRETENDING\nTHAT HE HAS WON THE FIGHT , WHEN IN REALITY HE HAS BEEN BEATEN TO PULP<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>IN THE BOLLYWOOD MOVIE \u201cLAGAAN \u201c IT WAS SHOWN\u2014HOW\nTHE BRITISH WERE RETREATING IN STYLE CHEST UP CHIN IN\u2014 WITH THE WINNING INDIANS\nWATCHING IN AWE AND FEELING AS IF THEY LOST MISERABLY .</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ULlP5iGtD-8/WXdWo4OD0HI/AAAAAAABU_E/sL8EfRVE38Q1l-Uf6kRtIXNts2pgGv12gCLcBGAs/s1600/imaeges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"250\" data-original-width=\"202\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ULlP5iGtD-8/WXdWo4OD0HI/AAAAAAABU_E/sL8EfRVE38Q1l-Uf6kRtIXNts2pgGv12gCLcBGAs/s640/imaeges.jpg\" width=\"517\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The Japanese initially\nencountered Indian troops who had only swords and spears</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8T5GAbcfb5Q/WXdXBpnP1GI/AAAAAAABU_M/Qibm3CC-DccXF66x1yCXHnzBOlArTVVmwCLcBGAs/s1600/6186e1f72c36decc6f3b7f246ebc56851.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The Japs lobbed\ngrenades and shot the Indians who survived .&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Indian refused to share the trenches with the cowardly white soldiers out of contempt in the thick of battle &nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">READ WHAT A WHITE WAR\nCORRESPONDENT WROTE IN THE THICK OF BATTLE IN FRANCE </span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">\n\n</span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">QUOTE:&nbsp;</span><i> <span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">It was a curious sight to all of us, French\nor English, the day when the Indians arrived in a dreary little town of\nNorthern France \u2026 Suddenly the Indian Lancers appeared, and the pavement on\nboth sides of the street was at once filled by a crowd of soldiers and\ncivilians watching the procession, as a London crowd will do in Whitehall on\nthe day of the opening of Parliament.&nbsp;</span></span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></i></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Iue2vcRTTls/WXdc4mqOJXI/AAAAAAABU_o/a3l5wyq2YLIY2SLo-P4FMa3QqLf6hp7cACLcBGAs/s1600/paSrade.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GONTMeg0VfE/WXdcK_y-9cI/AAAAAAABU_g/u1nnrNztSSoJL7NwsHzTog4vIZW_aPslgCLcBGAs/s1600/Indian-cavalry-briWng-in-Turkish-prisoners-after-their-capture-of-Jerusalem-in-1917.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
