, serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The Lancers sat proudly in their saddles, with their heads upright under\nthe Oriental crowns; then came a regiment of Sikhs, walking at a brisk pace,\nall big and strong men, with curled beards and the wide 'pagri' round the ears;\nthe Pathans followed, carrying on their heads that queer pointed bonnet, the\n'kullah,' which reminds one of the warriors seen on old Persian tapestries \u2013 a\nmore slender type of men, but equally determined, and with faces at the same\ntime smiling and resolute. &nbsp;</span></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7ooBmZwzFDo/WXdb7PvFg-I/AAAAAAABU_c/cFrPXNXkEoU0H0zpNeiQi-3EaxMZohDUwCLcBGAs/s1600/IWRM-4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"446\" data-original-width=\"580\" height=\"492\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7ooBmZwzFDo/WXdb7PvFg-I/AAAAAAABU_c/cFrPXNXkEoU0H0zpNeiQi-3EaxMZohDUwCLcBGAs/s640/IWRM-4.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The day\nafter, we heard that during the night one of the Sikh regiment had had to\nrecapture the trench, which the Germans had taken by surprise, and that their\nbayonet charge was so tremendous that the enemy did not dare counter-attack.&nbsp;</span></span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3Z3_Dkap1rw/WXdciLCSbrI/AAAAAAABU_k/WtU15bexP9AKOMaES0TuVvR3-KdgIuOogCLcBGAs/s1600/wrn15-24.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"598\" data-original-width=\"1199\" height=\"318\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3Z3_Dkap1rw/WXdciLCSbrI/AAAAAAABU_k/WtU15bexP9AKOMaES0TuVvR3-KdgIuOogCLcBGAs/s640/wrn15-24.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Almost immediately after that feat an order came not to allow the Indians\nuselessly to expose their lives by walking out of the trenches.&nbsp;</span></span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></i></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rjQCuKRKX60/WXddb47PNyI/AAAAAAABU_w/wEsBcKyHEIUnz1dAxWnVvjFezgEcxzkiQCLcBGAs/s1600/1t35563.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"636\" data-original-width=\"800\" height=\"508\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rjQCuKRKX60/WXddb47PNyI/AAAAAAABU_w/wEsBcKyHEIUnz1dAxWnVvjFezgEcxzkiQCLcBGAs/s640/1t35563.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The fact was\nthat, in order to show their c</span><span style=\"color: red;\">ontempt for death ( READ AS COWARDLY WHITE MAN</span><span style=\"color: blue;\"> ) , Sikhs had refused to hide\nthemselves in the trenches and had immediately drawn a fierce fire on their\nregiment</span></b></span></i><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\">.</span> <span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">UNQUOTE&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JHT6LpYQB8E/WXdWymIGfjI/AAAAAAABU_I/Mi-k1XDiqsoku9vNMtx6Hxf0q1Sv_5tEQCLcBGAs/s1600/iwm-h-5584-swords-d0rawn.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"605\" data-original-width=\"450\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JHT6LpYQB8E/WXdWymIGfjI/AAAAAAABU_I/Mi-k1XDiqsoku9vNMtx6Hxf0q1Sv_5tEQCLcBGAs/s640/iwm-h-5584-swords-d0rawn.jpg\" width=\"476\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Fire and maneuver won the day; they\nsimply bested the Indians in combat and outflanked resistance by leaving the\nroads and infiltrating behind Indian positions.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On February 14 1942, Winston Churchill\nreversed himself and authorized the surrender of Singapore. Lieutenant General\nArthur Percival, the British commander of the British and Commonwealth forces\nat Singapore, sought terms.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-S6NVXEU3xec/WXdXHQUO1vI/AAAAAAABU_Q/F3pHw3Vtno0Uz4unB-nP9DJKpNYJvax5wCLcBGAs/s1600/surren44der_singapore.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"529\" data-original-width=\"768\" height=\"440\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-S6NVXEU3xec/WXdXHQUO1vI/AAAAAAABU_Q/F3pHw3Vtno0Uz4unB-nP9DJKpNYJvax5wCLcBGAs/s640/surren44der_singapore.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Japanese commander, Lt. Gen. Tomoyuki\nYamashita, told him that any surrender would be unconditional. Percival\ncomplied. Reports of the number of troops surrendered to the Japanese is beyond\n100, 000 men..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gen Yamashita had only 27,000 men.&nbsp; This is the greatest humiliation ever in the\nannals of warfare . Yamashita\u2019s troops were also quite low on ammunition, spent\non decimating the Indians at the perimeter . The Japanese had advanced over 510\nmiles in just over 71 days to capture not only their objective, but most of the\nAllied army as well.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cHe felt it was a\ndisgrace,\u201d recalled Lord Moran, the prime minister Churchill\u2019s &nbsp;physician who had to drug him with Opium\nLaudanum &nbsp;to calm him down . \u201cIt left a\nscar on his mind. One evening, months later, when he was sitting in his\nbathroom enveloped in a towel, he stopped drying himself and gloomily surveyed\nthe floor: \u2018I cannot get over Singapore,\u2019 he said sadly.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/07/winston-churchill-henchman-or-hero-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/07/winston-churchill-henchman-or-hero-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lieutenant General\nArthur Percival leadership was appalling and his white troops clearly did not\nhave the stomach for a fight to the death against the Japanese\u2014who screamed\nwith drawn samurais coated with blood<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Majority of the\nAustralian soldiers had received ZERO training \u2013their bravado left them when\nthey saw naked swords<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">None of the senior officers\nventured up to the front line during the battle and the Australian commander,\nMajor General Gordon Bennett, committed one of the grossest dereliction of\nduties ever encountered on the battlefield\u2014he ran away and was seen in\nAustralia unannounced<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Australian coward Bennett\n, a huge tough guy, would never hold high command again but, amazingly, he was\nnever tried for his desertion in Singapore when by all rights he should have\nfaced the firing squad.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Despite this notoriously dastardly deed, few in Britain\nhave heard of Bennett and he is not decried in the same way that Percival and\nGovernor Shenton Thomas are for their performances in Singapore.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>JUST\nIN CASE ANYBODY THINKS INDIA WAS LIBERATED BY GANDHI , NEHRU AND PATEL\u2014THINK AGAIN.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">WE HAD\n2.4 MILLION ( 24 LAKH ) BATTLE HARDENED WW1 AND WW2 LEFTOVERS . &nbsp; &nbsp;THESE\nINDIAN SOLDIERS HAD KILLED COUNTLESS ENEMIES IN &nbsp;FIERCE BLOODY FIGHTS . &nbsp; &nbsp;THEY REVOLTED !</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/02/the-indian-navy-mutiny-of-1946-only-war.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/02/the-indian-navy-mutiny-of-1946-only-war.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-tSHxgB6Qe70/WXdeQc0EscI/AAAAAAABU_4/pzef9EdV2zcxAf2lNN3V1EStoQ8pGWq8gCLcBGAs/s1600/cww205fc7dfd4a22079323d95e6312ed18.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"386\" data-original-width=\"640\" height=\"386\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-tSHxgB6Qe70/WXdeQc0EscI/AAAAAAABU_4/pzef9EdV2zcxAf2lNN3V1EStoQ8pGWq8gCLcBGAs/s640/cww205fc7dfd4a22079323d95e6312ed18.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>ROTHSCHILD\nDID NOT CARE AS HE STILL HAD THE POLICE WITH HIM.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THEN\n, THE MALABAR SPECIAL POLICE ( THE BEST AND TOUGHEST OF THE INDIAN POLICE ) 600\nOF THEM, &nbsp;&nbsp;REVOLTED AND THE GAME WAS OVER.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\">Nolan has never been a master of the human\npsyche.&nbsp; Nolan could have never ever done a Gilligan in BREAKING BAD</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/02/breaking-bad-tv-serial-review-where.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/02/breaking-bad-tv-serial-review-where.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Nolan&nbsp;\nsticks to his forte --&nbsp; narrative\nmeandering labyrinths, as he has been from \u201cMemento\u201d to \u201cThe Prestige\u201d to\n\u201cInception\u201d to \u201cInterstellar.\u201d</span><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In Dunkirk, Christopher Nolan has made a\nstark &nbsp;war movie muddled by his signature\n\u201cNolan Time,\u201d that arty farty temporal scramble that he thinks is more\nilluminating than it is.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-F-A7qdtG8IA/WXelmjJbo0I/AAAAAAABVAE/BCuqe3dXJVk_Nk7rCx-qkAzjczcET5CPQCLcBGAs/s1600/deownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"194\" data-original-width=\"259\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-F-A7qdtG8IA/WXelmjJbo0I/AAAAAAABVAE/BCuqe3dXJVk_Nk7rCx-qkAzjczcET5CPQCLcBGAs/s400/deownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Nolan Time consists of several (in this case\nthree) parallel temporal lines that appear to be out of sync but prove, in the\nend, to conform to a higher synchronization ( sic ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the rare quiet moments, we\u2019re invited to\nobserve an unusual instrument featured in Hans Zimmer\u2019s score: The ticking of a\nclock, a reminder that while Nolan can change the march of time, his heroes\ncannot. Indeed very arty farty. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-nB4mUWBQagw/WXgsK66LjeI/AAAAAAABVCM/6nPkyiDibVUmwrpqG0XabVWPPXaFtSrAgCLcBGAs/s1600/613475538.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"481\" data-original-width=\"612\" height=\"500\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-nB4mUWBQagw/WXgsK66LjeI/AAAAAAABVCM/6nPkyiDibVUmwrpqG0XabVWPPXaFtSrAgCLcBGAs/s640/613475538.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Like\nmost of Nolan's films, \"Dunkirk\" is obsessed by the relative\nperception of time. This is emphasized here by the cross-cutting of Lee Smith. &nbsp; Smith has edited all of Nolan's movies since \"Batman\nBegins\"\u2014including \"Interstellar,\" which is explicitly about the\nidea of time passing more quickly or slowly depending on where you are<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Nolan falls PHUTTT on his face in his attempt\nto &nbsp;over-intellectualize a strong but simple\ntale.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Nolan has this tendency to let his battle and\nfight scenes become cluttered, more focused on chaos and clatter than coherence.\nThe movie cuts back and forth between the three stories\u2014labeled on-screen as\n\u201cThe Mole,\u201d \u201cThe Sea\u201d and \u201cThe Air\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zB4BIMOXANg/WXgsCHPnYNI/AAAAAAABVCI/edb_0wK6u7guveY_8HBNuHlh0LpJ5wT6gCLcBGAs/s1600/ww2-mules-muskeUteers-large.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"640\" data-original-width=\"453\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zB4BIMOXANg/WXgsCHPnYNI/AAAAAAABVCI/edb_0wK6u7guveY_8HBNuHlh0LpJ5wT6gCLcBGAs/s1600/ww2-mules-muskeUteers-large.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Nolan presents the events of late May 1940\nusing three perspectives: The Mole (infantry on the beaches of Dunkirk awaiting\nevacuation), The Sea (a civilian crossing of the Channel), and The Air (a\nspitfire pilot tasked with stopping Germans from strafing and bombing rescue\nvessels and defenseless soldiers).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I suggest Nolan terminates his partnership\nwith Hans Zimmer. I squirmed in my seat as Hans Zimmer miscalculated his nosiy\near drum shattering score. - a raw nerve jangling din of booming drums, bum-vibrating\nsynth chords, and cawing string effects that loses much of its power by\nrefusing to shut up, even when silence or ambient war noise might have been\njust as effective, or more so.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The overuse of Zimmer's music has been an issue\nthroughout Nolan's career, but now it has become an object of debate among the intelligentsia\n( leave out the half wit cunts who have gone HOO HAAA )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Hey Zimmer baby \u2013what was all that &nbsp;instrumental ticking-clock soundtrack all\nabout?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Batao nah ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Pleajjje !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">All you have managed to do is to ratchets up faalthu\nanxiety, with grinding metal noises and ticking clocks and humming violin\nstrings rubbing our nerves raw.<span style=\"background: yellow; mso-highlight: yellow;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The situations and images are so vivid that\nthe score often seems to be trying to rescue a film that doesn't need its help.<span style=\"background: yellow; mso-highlight: yellow;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nlast time I squirmed on my seat so much was when Phantom kept grinning ghadi ghadi like a\njack ass<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/07/billy-zane-killed-man-who-cannot-die.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/07/billy-zane-killed-man-who-cannot-die.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3306784779441873965\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_74M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/09047675409868148466\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">san</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/dunkirk-christopher-nolan-2017-movie.html?showComment=1501031273802#c3306784779441873965\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 26, 2017 at 6:37 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_74MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCaptain,<br />\nquite a post! never heard of Dunkirk before though i am fairly good at following world events.<br />\nSuch injustice to such brave Indian soldiers! i have to related personally to this because my grand uncle was in the army (British or pre Independence or whatever names it is known by). he has passed on now so there is not much I can find out. I think he had been to tough places like Burma. I AM VERY PROUD TO DECLARE HE DESERTED THE ARMY. Not because he was coward, but because he was forced to drink alcohol and eat meat. I am very sure there were other reasons for his desertion. He must have sensed something. well, he came back to his village and the army came looking for him. He cleverly hid himself in a storehouse full of groundnut sacks. the soldiers prodded, stabbed and probed but could not find him. he (and we) was from a reasonably well to do family (storehouse full of groundnut sacks proves it), but not anymore. Independence and other turmoils brought peril on us, and his succeeding generation (my parents) were reduced to poverty stricken desperate families. we are on the way up now slowly recovering.<br />\nThe man died dirt poor, penniless and was a bar bender till his end. i was the compassionate one towards him, and gave him my old shirts to wear. believe that? wish he was alive. i might give you more info on Dunkirk than you know. who knows?<br />\ni am glad he deserted, at least i know where he rests. otherwise he would have died in a tungsten mine or contributed to the warping of Japanese DNA.<br />\nHe was a big raw boned bastard but was smarter than he looked. LOVE YOU GRAND UNCLE. my shirts fit you because you were getting old and losing muscle.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_74BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_74b+seedCTFZD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_73T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_73TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_74b+seedCTFZD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_73B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2932059418740308769\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_73M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;An exodus by sea was the only possibility, but\nGerman planes had sunk so many ships in Dunkirk harbor that it was nearly\nimpossible to navigate<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thankfully, salvation\ndid arrive, in the shape not just of the Royal Navy but also of a flotilla of\nsmall vessels\u2014the Little Ships, as they came to be known, some seven hundred\nstrong\u2014that had been summoned to the fray.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ls3cjxnYlLQ/WXgrr8Fs3qI/AAAAAAABVCA/dIwYYQAv7V8gyR9CpcufH9XyXn0PxRqNACLcBGAs/s1600/613473W9910.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"1024\" data-original-width=\"800\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ls3cjxnYlLQ/WXgrr8Fs3qI/AAAAAAABVCA/dIwYYQAv7V8gyR9CpcufH9XyXn0PxRqNACLcBGAs/s1600/613473W9910.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eventually, in what Churchill called\n\u201ca miracle of deliverance,\u201d a total of 338,226 peoples\u2014had been rescued.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indians were abandoned .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">White commanders who\nrefused to abandon Indians were court martialled by Churchill.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without any hope left\nfrom across the Channel, France surrendered to Hitler within three weeks.\nNotwithstanding the many French soldiers rescued at Dunkirk, many in France\nresented what they regarded as extreme British cowardice<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-yLOPD7-yQwo/WXjuCdIj3ZI/AAAAAAABVC8/3OptjOs4InQa-DvZcMY-rWLokbDDuUtWACLcBGAs/s1600/dunkirkK1_072017042929.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"442\" data-original-width=\"647\" height=\"436\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-yLOPD7-yQwo/WXjuCdIj3ZI/AAAAAAABVC8/3OptjOs4InQa-DvZcMY-rWLokbDDuUtWACLcBGAs/s640/dunkirkK1_072017042929.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In June of 2000, on the\nsixtieth anniversary of the Battle of Dunkirk, Britain commemorated the event\nwith a massive celebration. A large number of small boats reenacted the Channel\ncrossing to Dunkirk.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although there weren\u2019t nearly as many boats as there had\nbeen in 1940, some of the original craft had been restored specifically so that\nthey could make the journey again. While British television crews lined the\nDunkirk shore to relay the landings to exuberant crowds back home, the French\nmedia\u2014as might be expected\u2014gave little coverage to the event.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-096xxclBC14/WXgriuSWkbI/AAAAAAABVB8/zZVCE9Zs-Z8Fe6vkhLAA9I2qjg_w7W_VQCLcBGAs/s1600/f417c46e29cd27f1e4134dd6w5b4f15a93.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"730\" data-original-width=\"736\" height=\"632\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-096xxclBC14/WXgriuSWkbI/AAAAAAABVB8/zZVCE9Zs-Z8Fe6vkhLAA9I2qjg_w7W_VQCLcBGAs/s640/f417c46e29cd27f1e4134dd6w5b4f15a93.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">About 800 British and\nFrench veterans who had been rescued at Dunkirk attended a massive parade past\nthe town hall. Prince Charles gave a speech at the Dunkirk Memorial in both\nEnglish and French, praising the courage of all those who had helped in the miraculous\nrescue.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The remaining members of the Dunkirk veterans\u2019 associations\u2014many in\ntheir 80s and 90s\u2014chose that occasion to officially disband their\norganizations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.Shortly after the\nlast British troops left, the Wehrmacht began its final offensive, capturing\nParis on June 14. France surrendered on June 22, leaving the United Kingdom the\nonly antagonist directly engaged with Germany. Debate has long raged over the\nreasons for the German pause<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-zRVQhC_gf64/WXjt47qseNI/AAAAAAABVC4/IhiddzhiiNMK7mXKhGUb1gwx8XgV9z2hwCLcBGAs/s1600/indi33Wans-in-UK.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The loss of materiel on\nthe beaches was huge. The British Army left enough equipment behind to\nequip&nbsp; ten divisions. Discarded in France\nwere, among huge supplies of ammunition, 880 field guns, 310 guns of large calibre,\nsome 500 anti-aircraft guns, about 850 anti-tank guns, 11,000 machine guns,\nnearly 700 tanks, 20,000 motorcycles, and 45,000 motor cars and lorries</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; YOU WILL BE THE NO 1 WRITER ON THIS PLANET\"<br />\n<br />\nWHY DID I SAY THAT \"A CHRISTOPHER NOLAN CAN NEVER BE A VINCE GILLIGAN ?\"<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">GOOD DIRECTORS, WRITERS , CRITICS AND POETS UNDERSTAND THE HUMAN PSYCHE--<br /><br />THERE IS NOTHING BEYOND THE HUMAN PYSCHE --<br /><br />THERE ARE VERY FEW ON THE PLANET WHO CAN BREAK THIS ART BARRIER</span></b><br />\n<br />\nI SAID YESTERDAY--ONE OF MY WIFEs RELATIVES WALKED ALL THE WAY FROM AKYAB ( BURMA ) TO KANNUR ( SOUTH WEST PART OF INDIA )<br />\n<br />\nWHAT WAS THIS LONG <span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><b>\"FORREST GUMP \" TYPE</b></span> WALK ALL ABOUT? -<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS ABOUT A LOST SOUL , UNABLE TO COME TO TERMS WITH ITSELF..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS WAS NO MAO OR GANDHI TYPE JOURNEY-- WITH ULTERIOR MOTIVE .<br />\n<br />\nHE HAD JOINED A FIGHTING UNIT OF BOSE , TO FIGHT FOR HIS NATION-- ONLY TO FIND IT WAS ALL A BIG LIE .<br />\n<br />\n21,000 OF HIS COLLEAGUES GOT EATEN BY JAPS FOR DINNER . BOSE HID LIKE A RAT FROM HIS OWN MEN FOR 40 YEARS<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/netaji-subhash-chandra-bose-untold.html</span><br AND HIMSELF ON FIRE ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE BOLLYWOOD MOVIE PYASA DELVES IN THE HUMAN PSYCHE<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/pyaasa-hindi-movie-review-of-1957-capt_20.html</span><br />\n<br />\nBREAKING BAD DELVES IN THE HUMAN PSYCHE<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">BREAKING BAD is an amazing story of the nuances of human relationships \u2013 an unbridled potpourri of human ego, ingratitude, hypocrisy, double standards, double lives, morality, narcissism , greed, revenge, redemption, choices , aspirations, empathy, apathy, selfishness , squeamishness , web of lies, deceit, delusions, morbid obsessions , despair, desperation, devastation, melancholy, heart aches , heart breaks and of course fruits of karma.<br /><br />Deep ironies abound , and how !</span><br />\n<br />\nALL THESE CHOOTIYA \"MOVIE CRITICS \" --THOUSANDS OF THEM --RAJEEV MASAND TYPES-- HOW MANY ARE WORTH IT ?<br />\n<br />\nTHE MOVIE REVIEW BELOW MUST BE IN THE LIBRARY OF FTII.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/breaking-bad-tv-serial-review-where.html</span><br />\n<br />\nBREAKING BAD is a masterpiece---<br />\n<br />\nIt gives us a glimpse of the full essence of the human condition and the opening of the Dark Door that lies in all of us.<br />\n<br />\nWhat would we do?<br />\n<br />\nHow far do we go doing what we think it's the right thing even when everything starts to fall apart?<br />\n<br />\nCan we keep our goals or will we always want more and more?<br />\n<br />\nCan we stop?<br />\n<br />\nCan we give up?<br />\n<br />\nWhat will we do to protect the ones we love from the pain and suffering we caused them?<br />\n<br />\nWas it worth it?<br />\n<br />\nCan any bitch cry other than out of selfishness?<br />\n<br />\nIs it possible to wake up this bitch who pretends to sleep,<br />\n<br />\nDoes a man feel good when he self destructs on his own terms?<br />\n<br />\nWELL WELL, WHAT DO YOU KNOW !<br />\n<br />\nYESTERDAY I PUT BACK MY POST ON RSS.<br />\n<br />\nAFTER GANDHI WAS KILLED , POLICE CAME TO ARREST HIM-- MY FATHER DUMPED HIS RSS UNIFORM INTO HIS HOME WELL --<br />\n<br />\nHE AND HIS RSS UNIT SPENT 3 DAYS AT SEA --IN ROUGH WEATHER THE TETHERING ROPES OF THE BOATS BROKE AND HE GOT A HUGE HOLE ON HIS FOREHEAD -- LOST LOT OF BLOOD AND NEARLY DIED.<br />\n<br />\nLATER ON HE DUMPED ALL HIS WESTERN CLOTHES AND SHOES -- WHAT COULD BE WORSE ?<br /><br />TO CONQUER A NATION, FIRST YOU HAVE TO MAKE IT IMPLODE FROM WITHIN.. FIRST LOWER THE MORALE OF THE PEOPLE .. MAKE PEOPLE SELF LOATHING..<br /><br />IT IS EASY FOR SINGLE MESSIAH/ SINGLE HOLY BOOK RELIGIONS TO BRAINWASH PEOPLE BY MAKING THEM FANATICS..<br /><br />THIS IS A TRUE INCIDENT--<br /><br />A RUSTIC SARDARJEE FROM SOME REMOTE TARN TARAN TYPE VILLAGE WENT TO CHANDIGARH TO BUY SOMETHING .. HE GOT OFF THE BUS..<br /><br />INSIDE THE CITY , HE WAS FOOT SLOGGING AS HE DID NOT HAVE MONEY FOR A TAXI ..<br /><br />HE ASKED A BUNCH OF NAUGHTY SCHOOL CHILDREN THE WAY TO THE SHOP HE WANTED TO GO TO..<br /><br />THEY GAVE HIM WRONG DIRECTIONS ..<br /><br />THE SAME CHILDREN THEN RAN AND SAT AT THE NEW DESTINATION AWAITING THE SARDARJEE .<br /><br />THE RUSTIC GULLIBLE SARDARJEE ASKED THE SAME CHILDREN THE SAME QUESTION<br /><br />THE NAUGHTY CHILDREN DID THE SAME -- GAVE HIM NEW FALSE INSTRUCTIONS..<br /><br />IT HAPPENED AGAIN AND AGAIN AND FINALLY THE NAIVE SARDARJEE ARRIVED AT THE SAME PLACE WHERE HE FIRST MET THE PRANKSTER CHILDREN ..<br /><br />THEY HID BEHIND A WALL AND WERE WATCHING HIM MERRILY \u2026<br /><br />POOR SARDARJEE REALISED THAT HE WAS BACK AT SQUARE ONE .<br /><br />HE WAS TIRED AND FRUSTRATED AND HE WAS A BIT FRIGHTENED AS IT WAS GETTING DARK..<br /><br />AT THAT TIME , A MUNCIPALITY WORKER ARRIVED WITH A LARGE SPANNER, TO RELEASE WATER BY OPENING A WHEELLESS VALVE ( WATER RATIONING ) ..<br /><br />AS HE WAS TURNING IT THE SARDARJEE GOT TERRIBLY ANGRY, RAN TO HIM AND STARTED BEATING HIM UP .. CRYING<br />\" MAIN SUBEH SEH PRESHAAANN HOON, SAALA MERE KOH TU CHOOTIYA BANAH RAHE HOH, TU RASTA GHUMAAH RAHE HOH ? \"<br /><br />THIS IS THE EFFECT OF TOO MUCH BLIND FAITH..<br /><br />WHEN GURU NANAK WENT TO MECCA-- HE WAS SLEEPING BEFORE HE WENT TO THE KAABA..<br /><br />ONE RUFFIAN ISLAMIC MULLAH GANG WITH SWORDS ACCUSED HIM OF SLEEPING WITH LEGS TOWARDS THE KAABA AND DISRESPECTING ALLAH ..<br /><br />SO GURU NANAK TOLD THEM-- PLEASE HOLD MY FEET AND TURN IT IN ANY DIRECTION WHERE KAABA DOES NOT EXIST.<br /><br />SO THE MUSLIM GANG KEEP GHUMAAOING GURU NANAKS BODY -- BUT THE WHOLE OF MECCA ROTATED ALONG WITH GURU NANAKs BODY..<br /><br />YOU GO TO ANY VILLAGE IN PUNJAB --ASK ANY RUSTIC SARDARJEE --HE WILL TELL YOU THE SAME STORY WITH GREAT RELIGIOUS FERVOUR.. HE IS PROUD OF GURU NANAH AND WAHEGURU..<br /><br />ROTHSCHILD USED THIS SIKH PRIDE TO CALL THE HOLY BOOK GURU GRANTH SABIH AS THE ELEVENTH GURU.. THIS HOLY BOOK WAS CREATED BY A WHITE JEW WEARING TURBAN NAMED MAX ARTHUR MACAULIFFE , A ROTHSCHILDs AGENT..<br /><br />ROTHSCHILD THEN MADE DOZENS OF COPIES OF THIS HOLY BOOK AND TOOK IT TO EVERY WAR ZONE OF WW2 WHERE SIKHS FOUGHT..<br /><br />IF A WHITE SOLDIER DID NOT STAND UP AND SALUTE WHEN THIS VENERABLE BOOK WENT PAST, HE WOULD BE WHIPPED BY A SIKH..<br /><br />A CRYPTO JEW SIKH WEARING TURBAN WOULD BE IN CHARGE OF THIS BOOK , AND TREATED THE BOOK AS A LIVING ORACLE..<br />SIKHS WERE USED AS CANNON FODDER-- AS THEY BELIEVED THE ORACLE \"IF YOU FIGHT WITH THE NAME OF WAHEGURU ON YOUR LIPS , YOU SHALL WIN THIS BATTLE \"..<br /><br />SAB KO CHOOTIYA BANAAAYA... GANDHI WAS IN CAHOOTS..<br /><br />Gandhi recruited 13 lakh ( 1.3 million ) Indian soldiers in the first world war \u2013 out of which 111000 ( 1.11 lakh ) Indian soldiers were killed .<br /><br />Gandhi recruited 25 lakh ( 2.5 million ) Indian soldiers in the second World war. Out of this 243000 ( 2.43 lakh) soldiers were killed.<br /><br /><br />TILL CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL EXHUMED THE NUMBER OF INDIAN SOLDIERS KILLED -NOBODY EVEN KNEW .. font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">Police performance\nshould not be evaluated primarily on the basis of crime statistics or number of\ncases solved.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN FACT IF A POLICE\nSTATION IS VERY EFFECTIVE THERE WILL BE NO CRIME AROUND<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">MANY POLICE OFFICERS\nHAVE GOT PROMOTED TO HIGHEST &nbsp;RANKS AND GOT MEDALS , BY CATCHING SOME INNOCENT MAN AND <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">KEEPING HIM\nAS UNDERTRIAL TILL HE RETIRES</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/09/undertrial-prisoners-in-indian-remand.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/09/undertrial-prisoners-in-indian-remand.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">MANY UNDER-TRIALS CANT\nAFFORD BOND AND SURETY FOR BAIL ..&nbsp; IS\nTHE GOVT FOR THE RICH AND MIGHTY ALONE ?&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">RICH AND MIGHTY GET ANTICIPATORY BAIL EVEN FOR NON-BAILABLE OFFENCES</span></b></span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-A394Zu0ogF4/WXSp3P6E1aI/AAAAAAABU6g/N0Oj2FLn5V0PqqYlP8Y4RSYK2BuSRcpYQCLcBGAs/s1600/thQWequint%25252F2017-05%25252F2aff005a-80d6-4c83-a79e-0758bc03558d%25252Frich-poor-injail1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"1600\" data-original-width=\"1009\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-A394Zu0ogF4/WXSp3P6E1aI/AAAAAAABU6g/N0Oj2FLn5V0PqqYlP8Y4RSYK2BuSRcpYQCLcBGAs/s640/thQWequint%25252F2017-05%25252F2aff005a-80d6-4c83-a79e-0758bc03558d%25252Frich-poor-injail1.jpg\" width=\"402\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bail is an instrument\nwhich is used to ensure the presence of an accused whenever required by the\ncourt. CrPC does not define the term Bail, but essentially, Bail is an\nagreement in which a person makes a written undertaking to the court to appear\nbefore it whenever required and comply with any conditions set out in the\nagreement.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He also assures to forfeit a specified sum of money if the\nperson fails to comply with any terms and conditions of the agreement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In case of bailable\noffence, the grant of bail is a matter of right. It may be either given by a\npolice officer who is having the custody of Accused or by the court. The\naccused may be released on bail, on executing a \u201cbail bond\", with or\nwithout furnishing sureties.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The \"bail\nBond\" may contain certain terms and conditions, such as:----<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The accused will not\nleave the territorial jurisdiction of the state without permission of court or\npolice officer. The Accused shall give his presence before police officer every\ntime, he is required to do so. The Accused will not tamper with any evidence\nwhatsoever, considered by police in the investigation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The court is empowered\nto refuse bail to an accused person even if the offence is bailable, where the\nperson granted bail fails to comply with the conditions of the bail bond.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EXAMPLES OF BAILABLE\nOFFENCE:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Being a member of an\nunlawful Assembly<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rioting, armed with\ndeadly weapon<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Public servant\ndisobeying a direction of the law with intent to cause injury to any person.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wearing Garb or\ncarrying token used by public servant with fraudulent intents.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bribery in relation to\nelections<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">False statement in\nconnection with elections<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Refusing oath when duly\nrequired to take oath by a public servant<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obstructing public\nServant in discharge of his public functions<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Giving or fabricating\nfalse evidence in a judicial proceeding<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Selling any food or\ndrink as food and drink, knowing the same to be noxious<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Causing a disturbance\nto an assembly engaged in religious worship<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NON BAILABLE OFFENCE:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A non-bailable offence\nis one in which the grant of Bail is not a matter of right. Here the Accused\nwill have to apply to the court, and it will be the discretion of the court to\ngrant Bail or not.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The court may generally\nrefuse the Bail, if:----<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Bail Bond\"\nhas not been duly executed, or if the offence committed is one, which imposes\npunishment of death or Life imprisonment, such as \"Murder \" or\n\"Rape\" or the accused has attempted to abscond, and his credentials\nare doubtful.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The application for\nbail shall be filed before the Magistrate, who is conducting the trial. The\napplication after being filed is usually listed on the next day. On such day,\nthe application will be heard, and the police shall also present the accused in\ncourt. The magistrate may pass such orders, as he thinks fit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EXAMPLE OF NON BAILABLE\nOFFENCE:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Murder (S.302) IPC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dowry Death (S.304-B)\nIPC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Attempt to murder\n(S.307) IPC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Voluntary causing\ngrievous hurt. (S.326) IPC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kidnapping (S. 363) IPC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rape (S. 376) etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>IN INDIA MOST RAPE\nCHARGES ARE FAKE.</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Tax evasion of over Rs\n5 crore under the GST regime would be non-bailable offence with the police\nhaving authority to make an arrest without a warrant. It is not enough to\narrest, there must be long term jail.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>IF IMPLEMENTED LAKHS OF DESH DROHIS IN INDIA WILL GO TO JAIL-- WE WELCOME THIS&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Justice VR Krishna\nIyer: \u201cBail is the rule, and jail is an exception\u201d.&nbsp; Well this is why we can never catch BIG FISH.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Central GST (CGST)\nAct provides that if the offences relating to taxable goods and/or services\nwhere the amount of tax evaded or the amount of input tax credit wrongly\navailed or the amount of refund wrongly taken exceeds Rs 5 crore, shall be\ncognizable and non-bailable. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE CODE of Criminal\nProcedure (Cr. Pc.) provides a two-fold classification of the offences mentioned\nin the Indian Penal Code, having regard to their nature and seriousness. One is\nthe classification into bailable and non-bailable and the other is cognisable\nand non-cognisable. A cognisable offence is one for which a person can be\narrested by police without a warrant from a magistrate.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In case of a\nnon-cognisable offence, the police cannot arrest, generally speaking, without a\nwarrant. In case of bailable offences, the person arrested has to be released\non bail whether by the police or by the magistrate if he is ready to furnish\nbail. In the case of non-bailable offences, it lies in the discretion of the\nmagistrate or the judge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Undertrials\nwho\u2019ve completed 25% &nbsp;of the maximum sentence\nfor offences up to seven years MUST be released on bail.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Undertrials\nwho\u2019ve completed 40% &nbsp;of their sentence\nfor offences punishable with a sentence of more than seven years should be\ngiven bail.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\">Legal\nprovisions for remission should be provided in cases where an undertrial has\nendured the full length of maximum sentence. He must be compensated by the\nJudiciary .</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">EGO\nMASSAGE FRIVOLOUS SUITS BY HIGH AND MIGHTY ( WITH PET TOP COPS IN CAHOOTS ) MUST\nHAVE A PUNISHMENT &nbsp;BY SEVERE FINES \u2013WITH A\nDIRE WARNING THAT NEXT TIME HE DOES IT HE WILL BE IN </span><span style=\"color: red;\">JAIL FOR MINIMUM TWO YEARS\n.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">We the people demand\nthat undertrails and convicted prisoners must be kept segregated in jail.&nbsp; If possible there must be separate jail for\nundertrails with more humane conditions .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Prolonged periods in prison where undertrials and convicts were not\nsegregated would only make hardened criminals of the former.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">Most of these people\nare very poor, who stole to survive .When rich men steal they must be given\nTHRICE more severe punishments<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">For bail discretion\nlevels must be reduced.&nbsp; Section 2(a)is a\nvery generic definition of bailable offence and non-bailable offence with the\nreference to indication to schedule 1 . A more articulate and iron clad\ndefinition of bail is required so that corruption can be rooted out<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">The requirement of\nfinancial obligations, either through the execution of a personal monetary\nbond, or through sureties should be the last resort when no other method is\nlikely to work.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">In determining the conditions of bail, the Court should take\ninto account the financial status of the person accused of an offence, and\nshall ensure that the conditions of bail are not excessive or unduly onerous.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\">Stop\nrewarding police for filling up jails with 70% undertrials\u2014mostly beggars and\nunfortunate children of Bharatmata . Sureties should not be rejected solely on\nthe ground that they are not locally situated.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Young Kumari Mayawati\ndid&nbsp; NOT have 4 annas in her purse at the beginning of her politican career .&nbsp;Today she has hundreds of crores ( declared ).\n&nbsp;How?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anticipatory bail must\nnot only be granted with caution but must also be made operative for a limited\nperiod of time\u2014 so that the criminal can tie up legitimate domestic and\nbusiness loose ends .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Further, given the special position that sec 438\nof Cr.P.C enjoys in the Code and the potential for misuse, any order passed\nunder this section must be accompanied by reasons for rejecting or granting\nanticipatory bail.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All forms of economic\noffences which include tax evasion, customs offences or bank fraud should be\ndealt with strictly and provision for restricted bail in such offences should\nbe incorporated in the Criminal Procedure code or appropriate special statutes\nfor the purpose of granting or refusing bail.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">In terrorism laws, NDPS\nlaw etc., there should be a stricter scrutiny in granting the bail and only in\nexceptional cases bail should be granted. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">We know the judges who have been very lax\nwith separatists and Naxals to get faalthu awards from Zionist Jew desh drohi\nhuman rights NGOs<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Terrorists and separatists released on bail\nmust have electronic tagging like in USA\u2014tell human rights orgs to FUCK OFF.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Electronic tagging ( with GPS inputs in\nplotter mode ) &nbsp;is a form of surveillance\nwhich uses an electronic device, fitted to the person. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot;
