and fine of INR 10<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</td>\n </tr>\n</tbody></table>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">I ASK MY READERS</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">GO THOUGH THE POST BELOW--</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://lawcommissionofindia.nic.in/reports/Report268.pdf\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\">http://lawcommissionofindia.nic.in/reports/Report268.pdf</span></a><span style=\"font-size: 16pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8580014804014776702\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_52M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://draft.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/police-reforms-in-india-much-more-with_23.html?showComment=1500859303851#c8580014804014776702\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 24, 2017 at 6:51 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_52MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Jew Rothschild owned Tungsten mines in Germany and NEUTRAL Spain and NEUTRAL Portugal.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Tungsten was the new miracle metal. It more than doubled the efficiency of steel armour. It did the same for artillery shells, along with the barrels that fired them and the tools which made them.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Tungsten was almost as hard as a diamond and has one of the highest melting points of any mineral. Adding a small amount of Tungsten to steel makes it far harder, far more resistant to stress and heat.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Tungsten mine in England was also owned by German Jew Rothschild before WW2</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When WW2 broke out the need was so great, tungsten was so important, that Jew Rothschild\u2019s companies returned to the medieval tin mines of Germany where SLAVES needed to labour.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">IT IS A WELL KEPT SECRET HOW MANY INDIAN POWs WORKED IN THESE MINES . THEY NEVER GOT THEIR FREEDOM. THEY WERE KILLED WHEN THEY COULD NO LONGER WORK</b></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">JUST LIKE THE INDIAN SOLDIERS IN RABAUL. &nbsp; WHEN THEY COULD NO LONGER DIG TUNNELS ( 640 KM OF TUNNELS THROUGH HARD PUMICE ROCK ) THEY BECAME FOOD FOR DINNER</b></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/netaji-subhash-chandra-bose-untold.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: purple; font-size: x-large;\">NOLANs HOLLYWOOD MOVIE DUNKIRK WILL NOT TELL ABOUT UNFORTUNATE INDIAN SOLDIERS DELIBERATELY ABANDONED IN DUNKIRK JEW CHURCHILL TO JEW HITLER \u2013 &nbsp;TO SLAVE IN TUNGSTEN MINES AS FAR AS SPAIN</b></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The HUGE Barruecopardo tungsten mine was a large open pit mine located in the western part of Spain in Province of Salamanca. The HUGE La Parrilla mine was a large mine located in the north-western part of Spain in Province of Valladolid.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Both these mines were owned by Jew Rothschild. The Tungsten mine in NEUTRAL Portugal was also owned by Jew Rothschild.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Spain was kept a neutral nation during WW2 so that Tungsten could be mined for armor plates of German Panzer tanks and large barrel guns.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Portuguese Tungsten ( Wolfram ) mines were owned by French Rothschild&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Tungsten was also used to convert gold . REAL gold was hidden and taken away to Argentina. The gold bars were substituted with gold coated Tungsten</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/10/if-zionist-jews-created-isis-who.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: x-large;\">ROTHSCHILDs AGENT RAGHURAM RAJAN WANTED PRISTINE GOLD FROM KERALA TEMPLES TO BE TAKEN AWAY, WITHIN AN HOUR OF SITTING ON THE RBI GOVERNORs CHAIR\u2014WE TOLD HIM TO FUCK OFF .&nbsp;</b></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">MOST OF THE GOLD RESERVES IN ROTHSCHILDs WESTERN BANK VAULTS ARE FAKE TUNGSTEN BARS COATED WITH GOLD</b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">INA soldiers of Netaji Bose were tricked into working as slaves in Japanese mines during World War II. &nbsp; Japan has admitted that Indian POWs were made to work at a coal mine owned by the family of Prime Minister Taro Aso</span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NOLAN WILL NEVER ADMIT IN HIS LYING MOVIE THAT ABANDONED INDIAN SOLDIERS AT DUNKIRK WERE CALLED OSTARBEITER\u2014&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">INDIAN POWs SLAVED IN GERMAN TUNGSTEN MINES AND KILLED OFF. &nbsp; &nbsp;MANY INDIAN POWs DIED WHILE CLEARING MINE FIELDS. DEAD MEN TELL NO TALES</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Japnaese Lt Masaichi Kikuchi, was allotted 350 Indian POW in Singapore in 1945 for slave abour . The officer who handed over the Indian POWs ordered \"When you're finished, you can do what you like with them. If I was you, I'd shove them into a tunnel with a few demolition charges.\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MORE GERMANS WERE KILLED BY JEW EISENHOWER AFTER THE WAR \u2013THAN JEWS KILLED BY JEW HITLER DURING WW2.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Out of this 243000 ( 2.43 lakh) soldiers were killed.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>43,000 BRITISH \"EMPIRE\" SOLDIERS ( 60% INDIAN ) WERE ABANDONED IN DUNKIRK.</b></span><br />\n<br />\nQUOTE : \"There were no PAKIS at Dunkirk,\" the late Bernard Manning had once remarked on the Mrs Merton Show, a BBC TV show during the 1990s<br />\n<br />\nTHE BRITISH EVACUATED ONLY THE WHITE MAN - -INCLUDING SOME FRENCH</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">THE FRENCH AND INDIANS WERE \"HOLDING THE PERIMETER\"-- KNOWN AS SIEGE OF LILLE. &nbsp; More than 14, 500 Indian soldiers were killed ( wounded NOT counted ) during this Dunkirk battle\u2014holding off the Germans</span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n<br />\nTHE FRENCH DID NOT WANT TO GO TO BRITAIN--THEY WANTED TO BE DROPPED ON ANOTHER PART OF FRANCE WHERE THEY WERE NOT IN IMMEDIATE DANGER FROM GERMANS<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: purple; font-size: x-large;\">THE ABANDONED INDIANS WHO SURVIVED WERE SHIPPED OFF TO ROTHSCHILDs TUNGSTEN MINES IN GERMANY, SPAIN AND PORTUGAL. NOT ONE OF THEM EMERGED ALIVE TO TELL THEIR STORY OF BETRAYAL</b></div>\n<br />\nTHE MULES ( 3500 SHIPPED FROM MUMBAI ) ATTACHED TO THE INDIAN REGIMENT WERE GIVEN AWAY TO LOCAL FRENCH BEFORE THE INDIANS WERE TAKEN AWAY.<br />\n<br />\nINDIAN SOLDIERS CRIED BECAUSE THEY WERE ATTACHED TO THESE ANIMALS -- THESE MULES WOULD WORK TILL THE LAST BREATH . THE VOICE BOXES OF THE MULES WERE SURGICALLY OPERATED BY BRITISH SURGEONS SO THAT THEY WONT MAKE NOISE . THEY COULD LIVE OF THE LAND AND NEEDED NO PETROL .<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS A QUID PRO QUO BETWEEN JEW CHURCHILL AND JEW HITLER . JEW ROTHSCHILD MEDIATED AS HE WANTED THE WAR TO PROLONG AND INVOLVE THE WHOLE PLANET TO CARVE OUT ISRAEL<br />\n<br />\nHITLER ALLOWED THESE COWARDLY BRITISH SOLDIERS TO ESCAPE FROM DUNKIRK BEACH --PROVIDED THEY LEFT ENOUGH INDIAN POWs FOR THEIR MINES -- AND OF COURSE THEY COULD NOT TAKE AWAY HEAVY EQUIPMENT IN SMALL BOATS OVER A 35 KM VOYAGE .<br />\n<br />\nTHESE STUPID BRITISH SOLDIERS WERE STANDING LIKE IDIOTS IN LONG QUEUES FOR SEVERAL DAYS ON DUNKIRK BEACH<br />\n<br />\nWHY DID I START THIS BLOGSITE<br />\n<br />\nTO EXPOSE ZIONIST JEW AND WHITE MANs LIES<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_166BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nAugust 30, 2014 at 2:58 PM<br />\n<br />\nhi a,<br />\n<br />\nNeither the ATS nor the NIA have been able to establish a case against Lt Col Srikant Prasad Purohit, till now.<br />\n<br />\nDespite probing the matter for almost three years the NIA has not been able to gather any evidence against him to charge sheet him.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">So far there is NIL evidence against him in the 17 February 2007 Samjhauta Express blasts.</span><br />\n<br />\nThe Indian Army handed Colonel Purohit over to the Maharashtra ATS when he was in Madhya Pradesh learning Arabic for an undercover SIMI operation.<br />\n<br />\nAiding the colonel's defence is the testimony by 50 army personnel in the military court that he was, in reality, an infiltrator and NOT a conspirator.<br />\n<br />\nLt. Col. Prasad Shrikant Purohit has been in jail as an under-trial for over five years under the stringent MCOCA (Maharashtra Control of Organized Crime Act) -- which also put a black bag on \"terrorist\" cricketeer Sreeshant's head .<br />\n<br />\nWhy is he being denied bail?<br />\n<br />\nAt the time when Malegaon bomb blast case investigation was in progress, Purohit was undergoing a course in Arabic language in the AEC (Army Education Corps) Training College and Centre at Panchmarhi in Madhya Pradesh.<br />\n<br />\nHe had specifically requested this 18 months long course in writing and the same was strongly recommended by the Commanding Officer of Southern Command Liaison Unit of Military Intelligence, based on his service profile, experience and performance. Before that he was posted in Devlali in district Nashik as an Intelligence Officer of the Southern Command Liaison Unit, Pune.<br />\n<br />\nPurohit was deputed to the Intelligence Wing of the Indian Army after he suffered a serious knee injury during anti-terrorist operations in Kashmir. His knee had to be reconstructed and the doctors advised him not to undertake any serious physical activity such as running or mountain climbing. That made him unfit for resuming his earlier job in the Infantry Division of the Army.<br />\n<br />\nPurohit had developed an effective intelligence network and was successful in putting together useful information about the infamous terror group, SIMI (Students Islamic Movement of India) and its links with Pakistan\u2019s intelligence agency, the ISI (Inter Services Intelligence). Purohit\u2019s service record shows that he had received several commendation certificates for good performance. The Confidential Reports (CR\u2019s) by his seniors were also consistently positive. To quote a few:<br />\n<br />\n\u201cThe officer (Lt. Col. Purohit) has infiltrated the SIMI and other underground outfits in the region through his capabilities and go getter attitude\u201d - Army\u2019s Confidential Report (31 Dec 06)<br />\n<br />\n\u201cHe (Lt. Col. Purohit) developed an effective informant network in the AOR [Area of Responsibility] which led to acquisition of Naxal propaganda, Maoists and Terrorists.\u201d - Army\u2019s Confidential Report (15th February 2008)<br />\n<br />\n\u201cMy heartiest congratulations to you and all ranks of the battalion for successful operations in Gen Area Rangai on 07 May 02 which led to the killing of two foreign terrorists and recovery of large quantity of war like stores\u201d - Brig. Prakash Menon, Commander, 68, Mountain Brigade (8 May 02)<br />\n<br />\n\u201cI am extremely pleased to learn about the achievements of your Cell in obtaining actionable intelligence relating to the terrorist activities in you AOR.\u201d - Lt. Col. Amitabh Joshi, Offg CO, 31, Composite Intelligence Unit (20 Mar 03)<br />\n<br />\n\u201cI am extremely pleased to learn about the achievements of your Cell in obtaining intelligence relating to presence of hard core terrorists at Thimaran Forest MZ 2980 in your AOR\u201d - Lt. Col. Amitabh Joshi, Offg CO, 31, Composite Intelligence Unit (04 Sep 03)<br />\n<br />\nWILL NARENDRA MODI PLAY VOTE BANK POLITICS OVER THIS OFFICER ?<br />\n<br />\nCapt Ajit Vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7474928961159940904\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_89M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NOW DONT EVER IMAGINE STUPID YANKS CAN FIGURE OUT GALVANIC CORROSION.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Galvanic corrosion (also called bimetallic corrosion) is an electrochemical process in which one metal corrodes preferentially when it is in electrical contact with another, in the presence of an electrolyte.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Anode is the source of electrons and cathode is where the electrons flow</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The flow of current takes place by the positively charged iron atoms (iron ions) leaving the steel plate and the steel plate corrodes. The galvanically corroding metal surface is called the anode.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SO I SEND A MESSAGE TO MY STUPID YANK (TECHNICAL BOSSES IN NEW YORK ) \u2013 I WILL CHIP ONLY IF YOU ORDER ME TO DO SO</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/sox-and-nox-emissions-from-ships.html?showComment=1512920248008#c4300396988934819416\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 10, 2017 at 9:07 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_158MC\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://www.timesnownews.com/india/article/banaras-hindu-university-triple-talaq-nikkah-halala-alauddin-khilji-political-science-question-paper-ma-students-master-of-arts-degree/143420<br /><br />NOBODY IN INDIA HEARD OF CHAITANYA MAHAPRABHU AND THE BHAKTI MOVEMENT TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..'<br /><br />CHAITANYA MAHAPRABHU AND BHAKTI MOVEMENT ARE JEW ROTHSCHILDs FAKE AND BACKDATED CREATIONS.<br /><br />SANATANA DHARMA ALLOWS ONLY SHRADDHA --NEVER BHAKTI....<br /><br /><br />All the BHAKTI MOVEMENT HEROES are FAKE and backdated creations of Jew Rothschild who ruled India \u2014the most famous being the DASA characters .<br /><br />Jew Rothschild\u2019s historians LIED that Bhakti movement was a revival, reworking and recontextualisation of ancient Vedic traditions..<br /><br />In Sanatana Dharma the six virtues are Sama, dama, uparati, titiksha, SHRADDHA and samadhana..<br /><br />Lord Krishna also gives importance to Shraddha and says in the Bhagavad Gita:--<br /><br />One who has Shraddha ( not BHAKTI ) gains knowledge.<br /><br />Shraddha hrudayya yakutyaa shradhayaa vindate vasu. --(Rig Veda 10/151/4) 5000 BC.<br />Meaning: Shraddha (faith) is the symbol of the high sentiment of the heart.<br /><br />Shraddha cannot be aptly translated into English. Loosely put, it may be be called faith / trust.<br /><br />Your willingness to know the unknown is shraddha...shraddha is not blind faith, but enlightened faith based on verification.<br /><br />If your mind is fixed, and says \u201cThat\u2019s it. I know it all\u201d, that is ego. The more you know, the more will be the feeling that you don\u2019t know. Recognition of the unknown is Shraddha....<br /><br />Shraddha means unwavering faith in the sacred scriptures or shastras and in the moral codes they contain as well as in the atma ( soul )...<br /><br />The shastras are designed to ensure the peace and prosperity of the world and the spiritual perfection of mankind..<br /><br />This is not blind faith like is SINGLE MESSIAH, SINGLE HOLY BO RELIGIONS...<br /><br />It is based on accurate reasoning, evidence and experience. Then only it can be lasting faith. Then only it can be perfect, unshakeable faith....<br /><br />Superstitious beliefs, beliefs in mere religious traditions ( like AGAMA ) or social customs cannot help one in spiritual advancement......<br /><br />No spiritual progress is possible without shraddha. ..From shraddha comes nistha or one-pointed devotion and from nistha comes self-realization. If the faith is flickering, it will die soon and the aspirant will be drifted aimlessly hither and thither...<br /><br />Ancient maharishis talked about the quality of \u201cshraddha\u201d which is a positive energy that comes from within. ..<br /><br />Shraddha should not be translated as a \u201csimple\u201d faith / trust, --it also conveys mental and intellectual firmness...<br /><br />SINGING BHAJANS LIKE ASSHOLES ( BHAKTI MOVEMENT OF JEW ROTHSCHILD ) BEATING DHOLAKS AND SHAKING ASS , HAS NEVER BEEN PART OF HINDUISM.<br /><br />BHAJANS IN VERNACULAR ARE NOT MANTRAS IN SANSKRIT..<br /><br />In the opening verses of the 17th chapter OF Bhagwad Gita , Krishna says that faith results from our most steadfast convictions.<br /><br />When our mind is pure, he says, we find faith in benevolence, having little attachment to what we ourselves can gain.<br /><br />At such times, faith leads us to value yoga as a means for curtailing sorrow and suffering, and for directing our mind toward transcendental truths.<br /><br />Yoga itself is an act of faith arising from the heart, and by having faith in the fundamental aims of yoga, \u201ca faithful person obtains knowledge.\u201d (Bhagawad Gita 4.39- 4000 BC)<br /><br />A Hindu free of BHAKTI dogma ( like in other single holy book religions ) is skeptical when this question of trust / faith arises because faith is always understood to be blind faith.<br /><br />Shraddha is more than mere faith. It also implies self\u2013reliance, an independent sense of right and wrong, reliance on conscience and the courage of one\u2019s own conviction<br /><br />SHRADDA WAS REPLACED BY BHAKTI (BLIND DEVOTION ) AND SANATANA DHARMA WAS HIJACKED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD ..<br /><br />CONTINUED TO 2</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_158BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; color: black; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_158b+seedD6uxD\" kind=\"d\"><div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_157T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_157TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_157TN\"><div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_157TD\">\n<span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></div>\n</span></span><ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_157TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_157B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6291713880131147051\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_157M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. In the same way, Hindu Gurus and spiritual texts do not command you to believe; they lead you to understand.<br /><br />The goal, as understood by the ancient rishis, is not to merely believe in God, but to know God directly.<br /><br />Shraddha is the first step in one's search for God. In the fourth chapter of the Bhagavad Gita, Sri Krishna says, \"shraddhavan labhate jnanam, one with shraddha gains knowledge.<br /><br />Check out the FAKE Bhakti movement heroes-- 12 Alvars , 63 Nayanars, Andal, Basava, Bhagat Pipa, Allama Prabhu, Akka Mahadevi, Kabir, Tulsidas, Kabirdas, Kalidas, Ramdas, Chandidas , Surdas , Ravidas, Gusainji, Ghananand, Ramananda Sripadaraja, Vyasatirtha, Purandara Dasa, Kanakadasa, Vijaya Dasa, Six goswamis of Vrindavan , Raskhan, Jayadeva Goswami, Namdev, Eknath, Tukaram, Mirabai, Ramprasad Sen, Sankardev, Vallabha Acharya, Narsinh Mehta, Gangasati,Chaitanya Mahaprabhu etc etc .<br /><br /><br />EVEN ADI SHANKARACHARYA WAS CONVERTED TO A BHAKTI CHARACTER<br /><br />THIS FOUL AND CUNNING SUBSTITUTION OF SHRADDHA WITH BHAKTI, IN THE WARP AND WEFT OF HINDUISM BY JEW ROTHSCHILD REDUCED THE GREAT SPIRITUALITY OF SANATANA DHARMA TO THE ABSURD LEVEL OF SINGLE HOLY BOOK/ SINGLE MESSIAH RELIGIONS ..<br /><br />THE BHAKTI LIE IS NOW BUSTED FOREVER<br /><br />HINDUISM IS NOW BEING ATTACKED FROM WITHIN BY TRAITORS IN THE PAYROLL OF FOREIGN FORCES<br /><br />PUT THIS COMMENT IN THE WEBSITES OF ALL HINDUS ORGS \u2026SPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA \u2026 ALSO PUT IN THE WEBSITES OF PMO, PM MODI, HOME MINISTER, LAW MINISTER, CJI, EDUCATION MINISTER, DEFENCE MINISTER, FINANCE MINISTER, SUSHMA SWARAJ, SMRITI IRANAI, SWAMY, GURUMURTHY, YOGI ADITYANATH ..<br /><br />Capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 8 , BELOW---</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/07/police-reforms-in-india-much-more-with_29.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/07/police-reforms-in-india-much-more-with_29.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">DIG D ROOPA WAS\nTRANSFERRED 26 TIMES IN 16 YEARS \u2013 WHY ?&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">ARE THERE NO RULES ?</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>I DEDICATE THIS POLICE REFORM SERIES TO DIG D ROOPA ! &nbsp; &nbsp;CHANGES WILL HAPPEN !!</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>ROOPA IS PEOPLEs CHAMP !! &nbsp; SHE IS NO \"PUBLICITY KA BHOOKA\" &nbsp;KIRAN BEDI.. !!!</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>THIS BLOGSITE MAKES HER WORLD FAMOUS !!</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-gyFPLlW9PXg/WXNTr8b8_9I/AAAAAAABU5U/OCdOJCyo0M0Jxi-6Z-TJc4kk_1xlbCvIgCLcBGAs/s1600/D-RoWopa.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"285\" data-original-width=\"380\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-gyFPLlW9PXg/WXNTr8b8_9I/AAAAAAABU5U/OCdOJCyo0M0Jxi-6Z-TJc4kk_1xlbCvIgCLcBGAs/s400/D-RoWopa.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In an order on July 8,\n2016, the SC had negated the protection against prosecution available to armed\nforces personnel under AFSPA.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SORRY, THE COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY\n( &nbsp;LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES ) HAVE NO SUCH\nPOWERS VESTED UNDER THE CONSTITUTION<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any action taken by\nArmy during counter-insurgency ops can't be put to judicial scrutiny. First of all the Collegium Judiciary is NOT allowed by the Indian constitution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indian Army has to,\nin given circumstances, take quick decisions which cannot be dissected later on\nlike an ordinary murder appeal. &nbsp;In other\nwords, the scope of judicial review against active military operations cannot\nbe on the same parameters as in other situations.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Army needed to use full\nforce when faced with insurgents armed with sophisticated foreign enemy\nsupplied weaponry. &nbsp;&nbsp;In India terrorism\nhas reached ISIS in Syria proportions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If army personnel are apprehensive\nabout using force fearing a militant's death , as that could lead to\nregistration of FIR against him, it would be difficult to win the battle\nagainst insurgents and militants, who aim to secede territories from India<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">WE THE PEOPLE TRUST\nOUR ARMED FORCES MORE THAN THE COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY WHEN IT COMES TO PROTECTING\nBHARATAMATA\u2014 &nbsp;MELORDS &nbsp;LET US BE VERY CLEAR\nABOUT THIS .&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">IF YOU WANT YOU CAN HAVE A NATIONWIDE REFERENDUM ABOUT THIS .. REALITY CHECK MELORDS !!<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Collegium Judiciary strangely\nunder the influence of Jew Noam Chomsky has never cared about human rights of\nour beloved jawans or their families.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Empirical\ndata as compiled from Manipur proves a point \u2014 18,703 (90.3 %) insurgents have\nbeen apprehended by security forces from 1990 to 2015 as compared to 1,852 &nbsp;( 9.8 %) insurgents/terrorists who have died\nin encounters&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the same period,\nArmy and Assam Rifles lost 941 personnel to insurgents and 1,484 more were\ninjured during counter-insurgency operations in Manipur alone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Supreme Court said that\nany encounter carried out by armed forces in the garb of AFSPA should be\nsubjected to thorough Judicial inquiry.&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SORRY, THE COLLEGIUM\nJUDGES DON\u2019T HAVE SUCH POWERS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WHY IS THE ELECTED\nEXECUTIVE ARGUING WITH THE COLLEGIUM &nbsp;JUDICIARY ? \u2014WHO PLAYS GOD AND DOES EXTREME\nOVERREACH\u2014 WHO&nbsp; HAVE NO IDEA WHAT IT\nTAKES TO PROTECT THE WATAN?<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>INDIA IS THE ONLY\nNATION ON THIS PLANET WHERE JUDGES ELECT JUDGES LIKE THE JNU COMMIE PROFESSOR\nCOLLEGIUM SYSTEM</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><b>DURING ANTI-KHALISTANI\nOPERATIONS SOME KHALISTANI SIKH JUDGES ATTEMPED TO BLEED BHARATMATA. &nbsp;WE KNOW WHO THEY ARE .</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AFSPA was enacted in\n1958 to bring under control what the government of India considered disturbed\nareas.&nbsp; It was first implemented in\nManipur and Assam, following the Naga movement.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Central government\nempowered the governors of the states and administrators of Union Territories\nto take a call whether the areas of that particular state or union territory is\ndisturbed or not.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the case of AFSPA (Manipur and Assam) 1958, the government\nof India used article 355 of the Constitution to confer power in the hands of\ngovernors. \"Keeping in view the duty of the Union under Article 355 of the\nConstitution, inter alia, to protect every State against internal\ndisturbance</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later The Armed Forces (Assam and Manipur) Special Powers Act,\n1958\" were substituted by \"Armed Forces (Special Powers) Act,\n1958\", getting the acronym of AFSPA, 1958. AFSPA's section&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It enables the\ngovernor of the state or union territory to issue an official notification in\nThe Gazette of India, after which the centre get the constitutional authority\nto send armed forces for civilian aid. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Though the Judiciary\nthinks that it is unclear whether governor has to request the Centre to send\narm forces or it's Centre's own prerogative. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HAVE NO DOUBT\u2014IT IS THE\nPREROGATIVE OF THE ELECTED EXECUTIVE AT THE CENTRE&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once declared a\n'disturbed' region, an area has to maintain status quo for a minimum of three\nmonths, according to The Disturbed Areas (Special Courts) Act, 1976<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In case of AFSPA, state\ngovernment is more or less of a toothless tiger \u2013and this is the &nbsp;WAY IT SHOULD BE .</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The state government\ncan suggest whether the act should be enforced or not (In Tripura's case), but\nthanks to section (3) of the Act, its opinion can be overruled by the governor\nor the Centre.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apart from northern-eastern states of India where AFSPA has been\nimplemented for over 50 years now, the other states where AFSPA was implemented\nare Punjab and Jammu &amp; Kashmir.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The centre enacted the\nArmed Forces (Punjab and Chandigarh) Special Powers Act on 6 October 1983,\nrepealing The Armed Forces (Punjab and Chandigarh) Special Powers Ordinance,\n1983, to enable the central armed forces to operate in the state of Punjab and\nthe union territory of Chandigarh.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Act was enforced in the whole of Punjab\nand Chandigarh on 15 October 1983 to counter the Khalistan movement initiated\nby separatist who were demanding a separate nation for Sikhs.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was removed in\n1997 after a period of 14 years. But the state government removed its Disturbed\nArea Act (DAA) only in 2008. despite militancy finding its feet in Kashmir in\nlate 1970s, till 1990, Kashmir and AFSPA was alien to each other.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It has been\nunder AFSPA ever since. According to AFSPA, an officer can exercise the\nfollowing powers:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. After giving due\nwarning, an officer is allowed to open fire or use other kinds of force even if\nit causes death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Destroy any arms\ndump, hide-outs, prepared or fortified position or shelter or training camp\nfrom which armed attacks are made or can be made by by the armed volunteers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. To arrest anyone\nwithout warrant who has committed cognizable offences or is reasonably\nsuspected of having done so. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. To enter and search\nany premise in order to make such arrests, or to recover any person wrongfully\nrestrained or any arms, ammunition or explosive substances and seize it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. Stop and search any\nvehicle or vessel reasonably suspected to be carrying such person or weapons.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6. Army officers have\nlegal immunity for their actions. There can be no prosecution, suit or any\nother legal proceeding against anyone acting under AFSPA. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7. Government's\njudgment on why an area is found to be disturbed isn't subject to judicial\nreview.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The demand for\nrepealing the AFSPA is often used as a cover by many in the FOREIGN KOSHER\nSPONSORED left-liberal cabal to advance their anti-national agenda. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Extraordinary\nsituations demand extraordinary measures, and AFSPA is what is required to deal\nwith anti-Indian terrorists whose stated objective is breaking up the country.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Terrorism would NEVER\nEVER have been rooted out in Punjab or Mizoram without the AFSPA and without\nthe tough measures that were taken by the security forces operating under the\nprotection of the Act.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Portraying the Indian\nstate as a monster and the Indian army as an occupational force that kills,\nrapes and maims Indian citizens at will suits the DESH DROHI agenda of the\nleft-liberals who are hypocritically silent on the unspeakable depredations by,\nsay, China in Tibet or even their Maoist comrades in the jungles of central\nIndia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THESE ARE THE SAME\nCOMMIES WHO SUPPORTED CHINA DURING THE 1962 WAR WITH CHINA. &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>NEHRU\nHAD THE BALLS TO JAIL MORE THAN 10,000 OF THESE TRAITOR BASTARDS . <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>NEHRU WAS GIVEN THE\nCOMPLETE LIST OF INDIAN ROTHSCHILD PAYROLL TRAITOR COMMIES BEFORE THE 1962 WAR\nWITH CHINA BY RUSSIAN PREMIER NIKITA KHRUSHCHEV\u2026 <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WHEN RUSSIA MOVED AWAY\nFROM ROTHSCHILD ( WHO CREATED RUSSIAN COMMUNISM ) THESE COMMIES WERE FUNDED BY\nJEW ROTHSCHILD--VIA THE CHINESE\u2026. <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;
