, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A\npermanent National Commission for Policing Standards should be established to\nlay down common standards for the police across the different states, and to\nensure state governments set up mechanisms to enforce the standards.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">POLICE\nREFORMS MUST START BY CREATING A PLEDGE AND ENSURING EVERY POLICEMAN TAKES THE\nPLEDGE . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/01/deck-cadets-training-record-book-on.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/01/deck-cadets-training-record-book-on.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The police must be\nunder a duty to forward all cases of serious misconduct to the Central Commission\nfor inquiry.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Except in cases of\nserious misconduct, the police department must retain the power to internally\ninquire and discipline officers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">GIVING SPECIAL\nPRIVILEGES IN JAILS TO THE RICH AND POWERFUL IS SERIOUS MISCONDUCT ( LIKE FOR\nVK SASIKALA ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">PUTTING CONVICTED\nCRIMINALS IN PRIVATE HOSPITALS FOR NO REASON ( FAKE DIAGNOSIS ) IS SERIOUS\nMISCONDUCT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://www.tehelka.com/2010/06/b-ramalinga-raju-sick-man-walking/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.tehelka.com/2010/06/b-ramalinga-raju-sick-man-walking/</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">RAMALINGA RAJU HAD\nDOCTOR CERTIFIED HEPATITIS C AND A HEART PROBLEM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Satyam Computers\u2019\nfounder, Ramalinga Raju&nbsp; was arrested in\nJanuary 2009. By August 2009, Raju checked into the Nizam\u2019s Institute of\nMedical Sciences (NIMS) in Hyderabad with complaint of chest pain.&nbsp;&nbsp; He and his wife were given a VIP suite ICCU\nin the hospital.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soon the hospital found\nthat he was suffering from Hepatitis C and chronic liver problems that required\nin the doctor\u2019s words, \u201cimmediate in-patient treatment of Raju for 6-8 weeks,\nwhich was not possible on an out-patient basis\u201d.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From then on Raju went on to\nstay in the VIP suite of the hospital where he could receive visitors, but did\nnot show up for any of the hearings of the court citing health reasons.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Raju\nstayed for almost a year at the VIP suite No 11 of the Mettu Ranga Reddy\nPrivate rooms wing of NIMS until the AP High Court released him on bail on\nAugust 18 2010<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Byrraju_Ramalinga_Raju\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Byrraju_Ramalinga_Raju</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br />DOCTORS WHO GIVE FAKE DIAGNOSIS MUST BE JAILED AND DEFROCKED&nbsp;</span></span></b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The police are under a\nduty to send quarterly reports detailing the complaints received against police\nofficers and the action taken by the police organisation (where the case\ninvolves a member of the public).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If a complainant is not satisfied with he\noutcome of an inquiry and believes that the principles of natural justice have\nnot been followed, the Commission or Authority may direct the police to\ninstitute a fresh inquiry by a different officer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The complainant shall\nhave the following rights:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">o to be informed of the\nprogress of an inquiry periodically and of any conclusion and action taken in\ntheir case.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">o to be informed of the\ndate and place of each hearing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">o to attend all the\nhearings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">o to have all hearings\nconducted in a language intelligible to the complainant, and if that is not\npossible, to be provided with an interpreter upon his or her request.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;If the Commission finds that a complaint of\nserious misconduct was&nbsp; frivolous, or <b>ego\nmassage driven</b> it MUST impose a severe fine on the complainant\u2014and make this\npublic .</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Identified police\nmisconduct shall be considered a criminal offence. Identified misconduct\nincludes illegal arrest, detention, search and seizure, failure to present an\narrested person before a magistrate within 24 hours, subjecting a person to\ntorture, inhuman or unlawful violence, gross misbehaviour and making threats or\npromises unwarranted by law.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Non-registration of a\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\">VALID</b> First Information Report shall also be an offence punishable with three\nmonths imprisonment or fine (or both). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">VALID IS\nIMPORTANT.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NOWADAYS WE FIND KNOWN &nbsp;NOTORIOUS WHORES FILING AN FIR FOR RAPE ( WHEN THE CUSTOMER REFUSES TO GET RIPPED\nOFF&nbsp; ).&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WE FIND WOMEN WHO HAVE\nBEEN&nbsp; LIVING TOGETHER WITH A MAN FOR TEN\nYEARS CRYING&nbsp;&nbsp; \u201c<span style=\"color: blue;\">I WAS RAPED DAILY FOR TEN\nYEARS </span>\u201c&nbsp;&nbsp; WHEN SHE FINDS HE WANTS OUT--&nbsp;&nbsp; ESCAPE FROM HER EVIL CLUTCHES AND MARRY A\nGOOD WOMAN , SETTLE DOWN AND HAVE CHILDREN</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u201cA special investigation cell should be\ncreated in the police department at the state level to monitor the progress of\ninvestigation of cases under the Protection of Civil Rights Act or other\natrocities against Scheduled Castes and Tribes\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">BALLS !</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ONE SMALL GIRL WITH CHINKY LOOKS TOOK OUT A CONDOM FROM HER BAG ( PROBABLY HER MOTHER PACKED IT FOR HER )-- INFLATED IT BY 20% AND WAS STARING AT IT FOR A FULL 8 MINUTES&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; THIS IS A FEATHER IN THE CAP OF THIS BLOGSITE..<br />\n<br />\nLATER WIKIPEDIA ACKNOWLEDGED IT..<br />\n<br />\nGandhi recruited 13 lakh ( 1.3 million ) Indian soldiers in the first world war \u2013 out of which 111000 ( 1.11 lakh ) Indian soldiers were killed ...<br />\n<br />\nGandhi recruited 25 lakh ( 2.5 million ) Indian soldiers in the second World war. Out of this 243000 ( 2.43 lakh) soldiers were killed...<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE : \"<span style=\"color: red;\">There were no Pakis at Dunkirk</span>,\" the late Bernard Manning had once remarked on the Mrs Merton Show, a BBC TV show during the 1990s. The British comedian had continued with his verbal assault by claiming that there were \"no Pakis\" (read Indians) at Anzio, Arnhem or Monte Cassino - all famous World War II battles.:UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nWHITE BASTARD MANNING MUST KNOW THAT THOSE DAYS PAKISTAN WAS PART OF INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE MAN WAS A COWARD ... HE WOULD ONLY SHOOT FROM FAR --FROM SAFE PLACES.. WHEN IT CAME TO SWORDS/ LANCETS/ BAYONETS IN TRENCHES --IT WAS ALWAYS THE BRAVE INDIAN SOLDIER..<br />\n<br />\nMore than 14, 500 Indian soldiers were killed ( wounded NOT counted ) during the Dunkirk battle ..</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Indian soldiers were widely photographed and respected for the bravery and discipline shown at Dunkirk. Today those photos taken in June 1940 have been sunk.</span></div>\n<br />\nChristopher Nolan\u2019s Dunkirk will be the most widely seen or read depiction of history released in 2017 -- this blogsite will write his legacy.<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE NOT SEEN THIS MOVIE \"DUNKIRK\" YET<br />\n<br />\nTHIS BLOGSITE WILL NOT ALLOW COWARDLY BRITISH / FRENCH / CANADIAN / POLISH/ BELGIAN SOLDIERS TO CORNER ALL GLORY<br />\n<br />\nWINSTON CHURCHILL WAS A JEW WITH ROTHSCHILD BLOOD. THIS BLOGSITE HAS ALREADY WRITTEN HIS LEGACY..<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">CHURCHILL , BR AMBEDKAR AND GANDHI DID NOT WANT THE PARTICIPATION OF INDIAN SOLDIERS TO BE PUBLICISED.</span></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/10/the-only-dalit-freemason-of-india-capt.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/07/winston-churchill-henchman-or-hero-capt.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /><span style=\"color: blue;\">Around 40,000 \"British troops\" ( sic) never made it back across the Channel and became POWs.. Many of those ended up having to endure forced marches into Germany and served as slave labour for the Nazis-- working in mines .</span></span><br />\n<br />\nThe phrase \u201cDunkirk spirit\u201d has since become part of the language used to toast WHITE people who pull together in a time of adversity.<br />\n<br />\nBALLS TO THE LYING WHITE MAN-- BASTARDS --NEVER RECORDED HOW INDIAN SOLDIERS WERE <span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>ABANDONED BY EXTREME DECEIT</b></span> AFTER SPILLING THEIR BLOOD AND FIGHTING THEIR GUTS OUT<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Sir Paddy Ashdown wrote how his father was court martialed by Churchill for NOT </span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>abandoning </b></span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">his Indian troops when ordered during Dunkirk retreat (Royal Indian Army Service Corps, Punjab division )</span><br />\n<br />\n21,000 INDIAN SOLDIERS WERE EATEN FOR DINNER AT RABAUL ISLAND BY JAPANESE . font-size: large;\">AFTER WW2 GERMAN POWs WERE USED BY JEW EISENHOWER TO CLEAR MINE FIELDS--THIS IS KEPT AS A GREAT SECRET</span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Forced_labor_of_Germans_after_World_War_II</span><br />\n<br />\nAfter the German capitulation in Norway on May 8, 1945, over 5,000 German prisoners of war were forced by the British, under the command of General Sir Andrew Thorn, to undertake clearance of land mines in clear violation of the Geneva Convention of 1928<br />\n<br />\nAt the end of WW2, mines had been laid on more than 600,000 hectares of land in France.<br />\n<br />\nThe French had asked the Americans and the British to hand German POWs over to them for use in mine-clearing operations. London and Washington agreed, and the French forced tens of thousands of German prisoners of war to clear minefields between mid-1945 and the end of 1947, regardless of whether the mines had been laid by German army engineers or by the French army against German forces.<br />\n<br />\nMore than 80,000 German POWs were used for this high-risk form of forced labor. An estimated 3100 of them died. Some of the survivors asked or compensation till they died of old age.<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">INDIAN SOLDIERS WERE DELIBERATELY ABANDONED AT DUNKIRK -- JEW TO JEW -- CHURCHILL TO HITLER-- TO WORK IN GERMAN MINES AND TO CLEAR MINEFIELDS</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">INDIAN POWs DID TUNGSTEN MINING EVEN IN SPAIN ( MINES OWNED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD )</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/10/if-zionist-jews-created-isis-who.html</span><br />\n<br />\nAFTER THE FAKED SUICIDE OF JEW HITLER-- AND ESCAPE TO ARGENTINE --HUNDREDS OF GERMAN U TUBE BOATS ( SUBMARINES ) WAITED OFF USA TO DELIVER A LETHAL SECOND STRIKE<br />\n<br />\nTHE ORDER NEVER CAME.. max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c9015758810617978071\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_65M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 23, 2017 at 8:54 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_65MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nno wonder we do pitru shanti</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_66B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1123766534474972837\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_66M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://draft.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/police-reforms-in-india-much-more-with_22.html?showComment=1500782167078#c1123766534474972837\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 23, 2017 at 9:26 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_66MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nA SINGLE SPERM CONTAINS AMAZING AMOUNT OF DATA.<br />\n<br />\nWHEN A MAN EJACULATES INTO A WOMAN HE TRANSFERS ABOUT 2000 TERABYTES OF DATA.<br />\n<br />\nAND YOU ARE SO PROUD OF YOUR ONE TERRABYTE PORTABLE DISK WHICH LOOKS LIKE A MONSTER , RIGHT?<br />\n<br />\nFrom head to end of long tail, human sperm cells measure about 50 micrometers (0.05 millimeter)..<br />\n<br />\nThe tiniest object you can see with your unaided eyes is about 0.1 mm\u2014so forget about seeing sperm without a microscope. The head which contains all data in just 1/20 of the length of the sperm<br />\n<br />\nThe sperm has a strong flagellum ( tail ) to propel them. When a woman gives a blowjob the sperm burrows itself everywhere . A woman who has sex with another man other than her husband is NOT spared of Karma.<br />\n<br />\nThe head, of a sperm contains a condensed haploid nucleus \u2013 the DNA in the nucleus is extremely tightly packed, so that its volume is minimized for transport, and transcription is shut down..<br />\n<br />\nThe human genome contains the complete genetic information of the organism as DNA sequences stored in 23 chromosomes (22 autosomal chromosomes and one X or Y sex chromosome)<br />\n<br />\nHe human body has more tha 100 trillion cells.<br />\n<br />\nEach diploid cell contains 1.6 GB of data --the approximate amount of data stored in the human body is 160 Zettabytes-- 160 billion terabytes<br />\n<br />\n1000 kB kilobyte<br />\n1000^2 MB megabyte<br />\n1000^3 GB gigabyte<br />\n1000^4 TB terabyte<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-LRO7nZ9vrhg/WXQeoywkE0I/AAAAAAABU5o/Y5lX2V0Ei30qlUIOiiFbcv07bfCl2vGQACLcBGAs/s1600/ssperm-4-animated-gif400px.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"267\" data-original-width=\"400\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-LRO7nZ9vrhg/WXQeoywkE0I/AAAAAAABU5o/Y5lX2V0Ei30qlUIOiiFbcv07bfCl2vGQACLcBGAs/s640/ssperm-4-animated-gif400px.gif\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 7 , BELOW-</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/police-reforms-in-india-much-more-with_23.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/police-reforms-in-india-much-more-with_23.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-KJKnATbQyhg/WXJIE8nUiLI/AAAAAAABU4E/vF6i_idFj7oXDV-zqbYpMkEctxBwwjd_QCLcBGAs/s1600/IMG-20170721-WA0016.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"368\" data-original-width=\"264\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-KJKnATbQyhg/WXJIE8nUiLI/AAAAAAABU4E/vF6i_idFj7oXDV-zqbYpMkEctxBwwjd_QCLcBGAs/s320/IMG-20170721-WA0016.jpg\" width=\"229\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "240", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/7452456554873925828/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "3658832999284821544", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2017-07-20T00:38:00+05:30", "updated": "2017-07-22T00:02:51+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTAwNjYxOTcxMDg4Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/bridge-team-resource-management-on.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/3658832999284821544", "title": " BRIDGE TEAM RESOURCE MANAGEMENT ON SHIPS - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL ", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-OwScMRl-LZc/WW-unLwtAHI/AAAAAAABU3E/DDp6GsAXq1IxPfhHXELCKxBCUWKPnNRVQCLcBGAs/s1600/tan0ker-ship.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"600\" data-original-width=\"800\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-OwScMRl-LZc/WW-unLwtAHI/AAAAAAABU3E/DDp6GsAXq1IxPfhHXELCKxBCUWKPnNRVQCLcBGAs/s640/tan0ker-ship.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is one of my\ncirculars when I worked at the shore office .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Recently we had a bad\nexperience on one of our ships. &nbsp;&nbsp;This\ncould have been avoided if the following basis principles of watch keeping and\nseamanship were adhered to.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1) All ships must\nimmediately start&nbsp; a dedicated GPS\nregister on bridge , with the following columns.&nbsp; Date/ time in SMT/ time in GMT/ Latitude as\nper GPS display/ Longitude as per GPS display/ GPS speed/ Propeller speed/ GPS\ncourse over ground/ Gyro course / WGS 84 correction applies YES or NO. This\npermanent record of ships position is now a requirement of vetting oil majors,\nfor ships without GPS printer. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only after :--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">the GPS course tallies\nwith Gyro course <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">and<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">the GPS speed tallies\nwith Propeller speed (minus approx slip in knots ) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--should the fix on\nchart be trusted.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is not prudent to\nplot latitude directly from GPS screen\u2014as by the time you plot the longitude\nship has made a run over the time interval\u2014and in large scale port approach\ncharts this means a big error. &nbsp;&nbsp;WGS 84\ncorrections can be very large upto 4 cables off Tokyo bay, 4 .5 cables of\nKaohsiung and 8 cables in Magellan straits.&nbsp;&nbsp;\n&nbsp;&nbsp;New Metric BA charts allow for\nthis correction and can be plotted direct.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2)Emergency anchoring\nat high speeds in case of black out , is a part of bridge resource management.\nHow to dredge both anchors to reduce the momentum/ drift energy&nbsp; of ship before finally paying out for anchors\nto bite , must be discussed and planned. Mass of ship is constant\u2014 reduction of\nspeed by 2 means , 4 times reduction of drift energy. Paying out more cable to\ncause anchors to bite , must be done AT THE RIGHT TIME to prevent running\naground. Once the anchors bite the ground , the brake lining will burn, produce\nslippery graphite and run out.&nbsp; Bow\nstopper must now be dropped and crew must keep clear. The bow stopper is\ndesigned by class to take 80% of the breaking stress of the chain. It is a\nfallacy to imagine that high speed anchoring is possible only on small ships.\nLarge ships with strong chains and larger and higher proof load anchors can do\nthis easily with good leadership if planned well, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The anchor brake must\nbe adjusted so that from fully shut to 100% open brake is just about 3 to 4\nturns. Chief engineer must adjust the brake band stopper bolts , and check\nclearance by feeler guage.&nbsp; The steel\nsurface of the gypsy where the brake lining abuts, must never be chipped. If\nthis surface is too jagged , the brake lining will wear out due to high dynamic\nspeeds .&nbsp; Brass countersunk bolts heads\nmust never touch this surface , as it will cause galvanic corrosion&nbsp; and loss of molecular strength.&nbsp; Seawater acts as a perfect electrolyte\nbetween brass and steel. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All our ships must hold\n100% SPARE brake band linings ( for windlass ) and countersunk head brass\nbolts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Master must NEVER EVER\nhesitate to use both anchors ( unless it will foul a submarine cable ) to\nprevent his ship from running aground.&nbsp;\nPollution can wipe out the company. Running aground with one anchor\nstill in the hawse pipe cannot have any excuse. Anchor stations must have\nminimum 3 persons. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bow stopper MUST be\ndropped after the paying out the requisite cable and anchor is brought up.\nFriction is NOT expected to hold a large ship at anchor. &nbsp;Use of red flag on cable to check if brake is\nslipping at anchor , is not a practice at sea ( unlike barges in rivers ) where\nthere is swell. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/H4DCCWQGexY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/H4DCCWQGexY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3)The bridge team must\nunderstand where the pivot of the ship being manoevered or ASSISTED BY TUG\nlies.&nbsp; It is no use pushing or pulling on\nthe shorter side of the lever .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PIVOT of ships lever is\nshifted in a FORWARD direction by :--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">a)Forward movement of\nship from rest. This causes the bow thruster to be less effective as soon as\nship picks up speed from rest. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">b)When ship trims from\naft trim to forward trim.&nbsp; Squatting on\nlarge loaded bluff bowed ships of high Block Coefficient is a combination of\nbodily sinkage and going down by head.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In combinations of A\nand B ( down by head ) the pivot might well lie on the forecastle.&nbsp; This means when a long ship goes astern on a\nRH propeller, the stern moves to port . it appears that the bow goes to stbd\nrelatively.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">c)When the port anchor\nis dropped the pivot of ship, moves to port side (outboard) of&nbsp; port windlass. Now a&nbsp; tug is more effective aft ( at the end of the\nlonger simple lever ) . If the tug tries to push/ pull at the forecastle , it\nis pushing exactly on the pivot or probably even aft of the pivot in a mindless\nopposite effect manner.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember , when both\nanchors are dropped the pivot lies between the port and stbd windlasses.\nDredging during emergency anchoring after blackout , with one anchor will cause\na wide swing of the stern, in the opposite direction of the anchor dropped.\nStern hitting hard ground underwater means loss of ER reserve buoyancy .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GPS speed is speed of\nthe antenna over the ground. Doppler speed is the speed of underwater sensor\nthrough the water.&nbsp; When a long ship\nsheers, with the pivoting centre forward , the GPS/ doppler speed is useless.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4) When pilot is on\nbridge , silence of the Master means concurrence with what the pilot advises or\ndoes.&nbsp; While there must not be conflict\nbetween Master and Pilot on bridge in a unsafe manner, it must be emphasized\nthat this does not percolate to pilot getting off before designated drop off\npoint fixed by the Port Management OR casting off the tug which is being paid\nfor in a unsafe location. Tugs are employed to assist and to ward off dangers\ncaused by machinery breakdowns.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5) All our ships must use\nthe latest format of Master\u2019s navigation audit scoring system sent by HSQE by\nemail to all ships.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NOTHING IS SERVED BY\nRECORDING LIES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A SHIP EXTERNAL AUDITOR\nJUST NEEDS TO SEE THAT THIS DOCUMENT EXISTS,&nbsp;\nAS IT IS AN INTERNAL DOCUMENT,&nbsp; TO\nFOSTER UNBIASED REPORTING FOR SHIPS SAFETY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This Checklist covers\nvarious items and aspects of the operation, which are scored as follows:-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4 = flawless<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3 = above average<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2 = average<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1 = needs improvement (\nMASTER IS ENCOURAGED TO USE 1 )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">0 = not observed/not\napplicable <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These navigational\naudits should carried during a critical section of the ship's passage which\nshould be one of the following:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-Arrivals at, or\ndepartures from ports,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-Berthing and\nunberthing operations in ports, STS mooring/unmooring operations,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-Transits of\nrestricted/busy coastal waters ( English channel , Singapore Straits, etc).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is to be used to\nconfirm that the Bridge Team is fully integrated and effective. It is not about\nhardware efficiency or inventories.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Assess the\neffectiveness of the use of the bridge equipment by the Bridge Team.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Assess the\neffectiveness of internal communications between the members of the Bridge team\n(including Pilots),&nbsp; as well as external\ncommunications to/from the ship,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Assess the\neffectiveness of , confirmation of,&nbsp; or\ncrosschecking,&nbsp; the activities of all the\nmembers of the Bridge Team (including any Pilots).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As part of the\nCompany's Improvement Process, any apparent deficiencies or weaknesses that are\narise from Masters&nbsp; Navigational\nAudits,&nbsp; will be reviewed and any\nresulting recommendations be promulgated to rest of the fleet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Master must verify that\nthe bridge team is familiar with GMDSS equipment for transmitting distress/\nurgency/nav warnings .&nbsp; Simplified , user\nfriendly instructions must be made , laminated and posted. This must not be\nconstrued to be a photocopy of the manual operating instructions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6) For man overboard\ndrill, we must move with the times. While a Williamson manoevere will still\nhave to be displayed and practiced \u2014 there are modern methods of pressing one\nor two buttons on GPS to fix a man in water by satellite ---- or by radar to fix\nhim by scanner. Hard over rudder movements are ill suited for modern fully\nloaded ULCCs\u2019.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-a-h0kNj0SX4/WW-vhpFHkOI/AAAAAAABU3M/N9DkJZ7POKYgyAPUz-sApHr8yhXB3gKXACLcBGAs/s1600/coSSsta_2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"400\" data-original-width=\"600\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-a-h0kNj0SX4/WW-vhpFHkOI/AAAAAAABU3M/N9DkJZ7POKYgyAPUz-sApHr8yhXB3gKXACLcBGAs/s640/coSSsta_2.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/naive-sailor-ship-manoevering-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/naive-sailor-ship-manoevering-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<u><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MASTERS GENERAL BRIDGE\nORDERS :-<o:p></o:p></span></u></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL OFFICERS SHALL BE\nGUIDED ON BRIDGE BY COMPANY NAVIGATION PROCEDURES AND ICS BRIDGE PROCEDURES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE BRIDGE SHALL NOT BE\nLEFT UNATTENDED AT SEA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DO NOT NEGLECT\nLOOKOUT&nbsp; .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">INFORM ME IMMEDIATELY\nOF ALL NAVIGATION AND PROPULSION BREAKDOWNS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FIX VESSELS POSITION\nREGULARLY BY ALL AVAILABLE MEANS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BEFORE YOU TRUST A GPS\nFIX,&nbsp;&nbsp; COMPARE GPS SOG WITH PROP\nSPEED,&nbsp;&nbsp; GPS COG WITH GYRO COUSE,&nbsp; AND APPLY WGS 84 CORRECTION.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE PRUDENT MARINER\nWILL NOT RELY ON FLOATING NAVIGATION AIDS UNLESS HE FIRST ASCERTAINS&nbsp; THEIR POSITION.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">KEEP BRIDGE LOG BOOKS\nAND REGISTERS UP TO DATE AT ALL TIMES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">USE RADARS ON RELATIVE\nTRAILS.&nbsp; USE TRUE VECTORS IN TSS SCHEMES\n, AND IN FISHING TRAFFIC TO FIND OUT STATIONARY BOATS WHO FISH OR SLEEP.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE OOW MUST SIGN THE\nNAVTEX WARNINGS, SO THAT IT CAN BE PLACED ON RECORD THAT HE HAS INDEED CHECKED\nIF IT IS APPLICABLE TO HIS OWN WATCH.&nbsp; ANY\nRELEVANT ONES MUST BE CHARTED BY OOW, WITHOUT WAITING FOR 2ND OFFICER TO DO IT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CALL ME IF THE VESSEL\nSLAMS IN HEAVY WEATHER.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CALL ME IF THE\nDIFFERENCE BETWEEN&nbsp; GPS SPEED AND\nPROPELLER SPEED EXCEEDS 3.5 KNOTS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MAKE SURE ALL MANDATORY\nVTS VHF REPORTINGS ARE DONE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PRESERVE THE SANCITY OF\nTHE BRIDGE.&nbsp; NO UNDESIRABLE PERSONS OR\nMATERIAL MUST BE SEEN ON BRIDGE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I NEVER FEEL DISTURBED,\nCALL ME ANY TIME YOU NEED ME ,&nbsp; WELL IN\nADVANCE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MASTER<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">XXXX<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CH OFFICER<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2ND OFFICER</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3RD OFFICER<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-J6xW4t8FN64/WXF5jLXCBII/AAAAAAABU3w/r3RnTEsj6W4nVj65GBrjm41iVyssW8dQwCLcBGAs/s1600/balarama_byS_molee-d6p1zqg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; He had set the men's 200m inter college record, at a mere 22.2 seconds and held it for 35 years, until recently Gaurang Amre broke the record, clocking at 21.7 seconds. He expressed gladness as the record was broken, but at the same time expressed concern over the time taken to break the record, quoting these records should be broken \"every two or three years\".[3] He has won the national title in 100m sprint 11 times.[4] Sumariwalla represented India at the 1980 summer olympics as a hundred-meter sprinter, in which he stood seventh in round one.[5] UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nADILLE BABY WANTS TO BOAST ABOUT STANDING 7TH OUT OF EIGHT IN MOSCOW - AN EVENT IN WHICH 65% OF NATIONS ( WEST ) AROUND THE WORLD BOYCOTTED<br />\n<br />\nWHY IS THE FELLOW HEADING THE ATHLETICS FEDERATION OF INDIA ?<br />\n<br />\nPU THIS COMMENT IN SPORTS MINISTERs WEBSITE--AS FOR AN ACK<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_86MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_86BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 21, 2017 at 12:48 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_87MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDRUGS IN INDIAN ATHLETICS WAS FIRST INTRODUCED BY A SHORT STOCKY PARSI SPRINTER--<br />\n<br />\nHE WOULD ALWAYS WIN IN INDIA WITH FANSTASTIC TIMINGS --BUT ABROAD HE WOULD COME LAST IN THE FIRST HEAT<br />\n<br />\nONE OF MY COUSINS WHO WAS A NATIONAL 100 METRES SPRINTER WOULD ALWAYS BE BEATEN BY THIS PARSI GUY IN INDIA --AND FAILED GET GET SELECTED FOR INTERNATIONAL MEETS<br />\n<br />\nMY COUSIN ( 11 INCHES TALLER THAN THIS PARSI MIDGET ) TOLD ME THIS IN THE LATE SEVENTIES --THAT THIS PARSI SPRINTER CAN NEVER EVER WIN WITHOUT DRUGS --AND THIS IS WHY HE COMES LAST IN THE FIRST HEATS ABROAD<br />\n<br />\nI DID NOT BELIEVE AS THOSE DAYS WE THOUGHT THAT DRUGS DO NOT HELP IN RUNNING<br />\n<br />\nTHOSE DAYS HORSES WERE GIVEN PERFORMANCE DRUGS IN PUNE<br />\n<br />\nLATER THIS PARSI SPONSORED A PARSI GIRL RUNNER -- THIS GIRL WOULD DO WELL IN INDIA ( NEVER DEFEATED PT USHA ) WITH BIG BENAMI MEDIA SUPPORT<br />\n<br />\nDO NOT ALLOW THIS PARSI FELLOW TO CONTROL INDIAN ATHLETICS--WARNING !<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS AN ANTI- PT USHA GANG LEAD BY A KARNATAKA WOMAN SPRINTER ( WHO WORE TIGHT LEOTARDS SHOWING HER CAMEL TOE) AND THIS PARSI GIRL .<br />\n<br />\nTHIS KARNATAKA APPA GIRLs ONLY CLAIM TO FAME WAS SHE BEAT PT USHA TWICE WHEN SHE WAS HAVING HER PERIODS</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">PT USHAs 400 METRES HURDLES NATIONAL RECORD SET IN USA OLYMPICS STILL STANDS AFTER 33 YEARS&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_36M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; MY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO 51.0%</b></span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIF CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL CANT WRITE THIS TRUTH --NOBODY ON THIS PLANET CAN--NOBODY HAS THE PERCEPTION</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE PRACTICE OF WAKING UP PEOPLE AT 5 AM WITH LOUDSPEAKERS FROM MOSQUES WAS STARTED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAT THE END OF MUGHAL RULE , ONLY HUGE GRAND MOSQUES EXISTED.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE CALL TO PRAYER WAS AT DAY BREAK , BY THE MUEZZIN CLIMBING TO THE TOP OF THE TALL MINARET AND YODELING FOR HIS VOICE TO CARRY.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBOTH WW1 AND WW1 WERE CREATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD TO CARVE OUT ISRAEL</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHE GOT NON-VIOLENT AHIMSA VAADI GANDHI ALL THE WAY FROM SOUTH AFRICA TO INDIA TO RECRUIT INDIAN SOLDIERS .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>NON-VIOLENT GANDHI TOLD INDIANS -- KILL ! KILL ! KILL!</b></span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAND THAT TOO KILL GERMANS WHO HAD DONE INDIA NO HARM ON BEHALF OF THE WHITE INVADER WHO WAS ROBBING BHARATMATA BLIND..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nGandhi recruited 13 lakh ( 1.3 million ) Indian soldiers in the first world war \u2013 out of which 111000 ( 1.11 lakh ) Indian soldiers were killed .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nGandhi recruited 25 lakh ( 2.5 million ) Indian soldiers in the second World war. Out of this 243000 ( 2.43 lakh) soldiers were killed.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nJEW ROTHSCHILD NEEDED ENORMOUS AMOUNT OF LEATHER --FOR ARMY BOOTS / BELTS/ GUN HOLSTERS/ HORSE SADDLES/ BRIDLES etc</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nROTHSCHILD BUILT TANNERIES ALL OVER INDIA . &nbsp;IMAGINE A JEW WHO OWN 70% OF ISRAEL BUILDING MOSQUES FOR INDIAN MUSLIMS .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHINDUS REFUSED TO WORK IN TANNERIES ( KILLING COWS ) AND HENCE JEW ROTHSCHILD CONVERTED HUGE PARTS OF THE POPULATION USING CRYPTO JEWS AS MULLAHS .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHESE CONVERTED POOR DALIT MUSLIMS SLOGGED IN THE TANNERIES. &nbsp; MOST OF THEM WERE AT THE SEA END OF GREAT RIVERS INDUS/ GANGES/ BRAHMAPUTRA ( TO PREVENT RIVER POLLUTION ) --AND KANPUR ..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WHY CAWN FUCKIN\u2019 PORE AT THE MID PART OF GANGES ? IT HAD THE LARGEST ROTHSCHILD ARMY CANTONMENT ON THIS PLANET DURING WW1</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD FITTED LOUDSPEAKERS ON ALL MOSQUES HE BUILT AROUND TANNERIES --TO WAKE UP HIS LEATHER WORKERS 1.5 HOURS BEFORE SUNRISE-SUCH WAS THE DEMAND FOR LEATHER.</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/06/ganga-manthan-cleaning-of-river-ganges.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWHY DID BANGLADESH HAVE SO MANY BENGALI MUSLIMS ?-- THEY WERE ALL TANNERY WORKERS -WORKING AT THE END OF RIVERS BEFORE THEY JOINED THE SEA--SO THAT THE WHOLE RIVER IS NOT POLLUTED.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIN CALICUT ROTHSCHILD HAD HIS HANDLOOM FACTORIES PRODUCING COTTON GOODS AND KHAKI FOR WW1 UNIFORMS .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHERE HE WOKE UP PEOPLE FOR A SIREN WHICH COULD BE HEAR ALL OVER CALICUT. &nbsp; DURING WW1 THIS SIREN BLEW AT SUNRISE .. WHEN I WAS BORN THIS SIREN BLEW AT 0715.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBOTH MY PARENTS WORKED AT THIS GERMAN BASEL MISSION FACTORY --BEFORE WW1 THIS FACTORY PRODUCED THE GREATEST AMOUNT OF KHAKHI CLOTHES ON THE PLANET .. TODAY THIS FACTORY IS CALLED COMMONWEALTH TRUST LTD .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/12/hermann-gundert-hermann-hesse-and.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_4BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Brahmacharya means purity of speech, of body, and of mind \u2013being a righteous person.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; III-43).</span></span></b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">PASSION MENTIONED ABOVE DOES NOT INVOLVE SEMEN AND OJAS BULLSHIT .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IT HAS MORE TO DO WITH TEMPTATION, GREED , CRAVINGS , INDULGENCE IN SENSE OBJECTS , AVARICE , SELF RESTRAINT AND EGO.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS IS FOR PURIFICATION OF NADIS IN WHICH FLOWS PRANA.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS FOUL LIE OF SEMEN WAS INJECTED INTO OUR SCRIPTURES BY FAKE MUTTS AND THE LYING WHITE HISTORIAN.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ROTHSCHILD USED VIVEKANANDA AND GANDHI TO SPREAD HIS FAKE BRAHMACHARYA MESSAGE.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HINDUISM IS NOT CATHOLIC CHRISTIANITY WERE PRIESTS DO NOT MARRY. IN HINDUISM A PRIEST MUST MARRY AND HAVE CHILDREN .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Patanjali Maharshi, the exponent of Raja Yoga philosophy, recommends that ten virtues should be practised by all men. The first five are: Ahimsa (non-violence), Satya (truthfulness), Brahmacharya (celibacy in thought, word and deed), Asteya (non-stealing) and Aparigraha (non-covetousness). These constitute Yama or self-restraint. The other five virtues are: Saucha (internal and external purity), Santosha (contentment), Tapas (austerity), Svadhyaya (study of scriptures or recitation of Mantra) and Isvarpranidhana (consecration of the fruits of all works to the Lord). These constitute Niyama or religious observance.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The most foul thing done was to encourage married men in Grihasta stage to practice Brahmacharya by sexual continence. Gandhi used this lame lie , to discard his wife from his bedroom and take in a homosexual JEW with an enema kit .Later this German Jew was discarded to take in teenaged naked girls who would sleep with him under the same blanket.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Rothschild got his fake and backdated Rishi Yajnavalkya to write: \u201cBrahmacharya is abstaining from sexual pleasure for ever, under all conditions and in all places, either physically, mentally or verbally.\u201d</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 6, BELOW--</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/07/police-reforms-in-india-much-more-with_22.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/07/police-reforms-in-india-much-more-with_22.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-aF-jfCk-6ZM/WW-txggZz8I/AAAAAAABU28/ZG9WaYV5QmkLgiJTclx3VDOgfa3dPdP_gCLcBGAs/s1600/VADAKAYIL3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"283\" data-original-width=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-aF-jfCk-6ZM/WW-txggZz8I/AAAAAAABU28/ZG9WaYV5QmkLgiJTclx3VDOgfa3dPdP_gCLcBGAs/s1600/VADAKAYIL3.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n<br />\n30 YEARS IN COMMAND<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n.</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. , serif;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: 18.6667px;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mRwYR4ydVhg/WWyotluI4hI/AAAAAAABUzw/iNxqIo2gnrIiL_CB6UKUrGm0EZ6S3xOfgCLcBGAs/s1600/7fMEskob_4SS00x400.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">India can no longer\nafford a politician\u2019s police and it\u2019s time for people\u2019s police.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The institution of\nmodern police traces its origin to Chanakya\u2019s Arthashastra, where he has\ndescribed the genesis of the state and need to legitimise its authority through\npolice as we know today.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chanakya had written\n2350 years ago,&nbsp; that the security of the\nsociety and the welfare of the people is dependent on the efficiency of the\npolice.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The phenomenal rise in\nprivate security agencies also accounts for the growing lack of trust in the\nstate police. This is a shameful but real state of affairs in most of India.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-C-6tfLQiGxY/WWze46EsFaI/AAAAAAABUz8/4FsdGXDABIQ5N1dcaUlTe7k-mf6tpXNDgCLcBGAs/s1600/soliee-main.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">WE DON\u2019T WANT ANY\nMEMBER IN THIS CENTRAL PANEL TO BE A LAWYER OR A JUDGE ( EVEN IF HE IS RETIRED\n)</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 16pt;\">SEDITION in India is not unconstitutional, it\nremains an offence only if the words, spoken or written, are accompanied by\ndisorder and violence and/ or incitement to disorder and violence.--- </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 16pt;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 16pt;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Fali fuckin\u2019 Nariman ( JNU incident \u201cBharata\ntere tukde honge , Inshah Allah \u201c)</span></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b>Arresting him for that? &nbsp;I mean that\u2019s deplorable. &nbsp;That is not SEDITION. &nbsp;Sedition,\nthe Supreme Court has said, are the acts which have a tendency and intention to\ndisturb law and order or incite violence. That is our law, that is how Section\n124A was interpreted and upheld as constitutional by a Constitution Bench.---<span style=\"color: blue;\">\nSoli fuckin\u2019 Sorabjee ( JNU incident \u201cBharata tere tukde honge , Inshah Allah \u201c)</span><o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; The only discretion or power that the police or\ngovernment shall have in such cases is to award punishment in cases where the\nCommission finds an officer guilty.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_15M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/police-reforms-in-india-much-more-with_17.html?showComment=1500311993979#c3557544252770609175\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 17, 2017 at 10:49 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_15MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nHours before the hanging of Yakub Memon for his role in the 1993 Mumbai bombings, Mahatma Gandhi\u2019s grandson Gopalkrishna Gandhi had appealed to the President to save him<br />\n<br />\nTHIS FELLOW IS NOW THE CANDIDATE OF THE WAITRESS FOR VP CHAIR<br />\n<br />\nIT IS GOOD THAT DROHIs SIGN SUCH PETITIONS\u2014WE ARE ABLE TO PROFILE THEM<br />\n<br />\nSome are in Pakistani ISI payroll\u2014some Rothschild\u2019s payroll.<br />\n<br />\nList of people who signed the petition<br />\n9 Shatrughan Sinha, MP<br />\n10 Mani Shankar Aiyer, MP<br />\n11 Ram Jethmalani, MP<br />\n12 Majeed Memon, MP<br />\n13 Sitaram Yechury, MP, G.S, CPI(M)<br />\n14 D.
