Ram, Senior Journalist<br />\n22 Prashant Bhushan, Senior Lawyer<br />\n24 Kavita Krishnan, Secretary, AIPWA<br />\n25 Annie Raja, General Secretary, NFIW<br />\n26 Tushar Gandhi, Mahatma Gandhi Foundation<br />\n28 Anand Patwardhan, Filmmaker<br />\n29 Naseeruddin Shah, Actor<br />\n30 Mahesh Bhatt, Filmmaker<br />\n39 Pamela Philipose, Journalist<br />\n43 Prof. Irfan Habib<br />\n47 Indira Jaisingh, Former, Addl. Sol. General<br />\n49 Vrinda Grover, Lawyer<br />\n57 Prof. Jayati Ghosh<br />\n59 Shabnam Hashmi, Anhad<br />\n69 Rahul Roy, Filmmaker<br />\n70 Dr. Ayesha Kidwai<br />\n77 Prof. Kamal Mitra Chenoy<br />\n87 Dr John Dayal, Member, National Integration Council<br />\n90 Nandini Sundar, Professor, Delhi School of Economics, Delhi University<br />\n95 Aruna Roy, MKSS<br />\n191 Lalita Ramdas<br />\n221 Farah Naqvi, Writer and Activist, Delhi<br />\n253 Fr. Cedric Prakash sj, Director, PRASHANT, Gujarat<br />\n261 Harsh Mander, social activist, writer, Aman Biradari, New Delhi<br />\n280 Sanjiv Bhatt, IPS Gujarat</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The magistrate is known\nto have powers more of an administrator, and most of them handle only minor\noffenses. They may handle offenses, such as, petty theft, small crimes, and\ntraffic violations.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the other hand,\njudges handle large cases.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are four\ncategories of magistrates in the Judiciary of India. This classification is\ngiven in the Criminal Procedure Code, 1973 (CrPC). It stipulates that in each\nsessions district, there shall be:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">a Chief Judicial\nMagistrate<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">a Sub-Divisional\nJudicial Magistrate<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">a Judicial Magistrates\nFirst Class, and<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">an Executive\nMagistrates [including DM, ADMs, SDMs]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1.The Chief Judicial\nMagistrate [CJM] (including Additional Chief Judicial Magistrates.) CJMs hear\nall types of criminal cases. All magistrates' courts are controlled by the CJM.\nThe CJM looks over the work of judicial magistrates, but cannot take any action\nagainst them. The CJM can only report the misbehavior of judicial magistrates\nto the High Court. A court of Chief Judicial Magistrates can sentence a person\nto jail up to ten years and impose fines of up to Rs 30,000 . The CJM is the\nmost senior among all magistrates in their district.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. There is a\nSub-Divisional Judicial Magistrate (SDJM) in every subdivision. They hear cases\nrelated to the Dowry Act, EC Act, and other criminal cases. They also maintain\nand control the judicial court below them. A court of Sub-Divisional Judicial\nMagistrates may sentence a person to fines of up to ten years and impose fine\nup to Rs 25,000 . Judicial magistrates can try criminal cases.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. A Judicial\nMagistrate First Class can sentence a person to jail for up to seven years and\nimpose a fine of up to Rs 15,000.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. An Executive\nMagistrate is an officer of the Executive branch (as opposed to the Judicial\nbranch) who is invested with specific powers under both the CrPC and the Indian\nPenal Code (IPC).. These officers cannot try any accused nor pass verdicts. A\nperson arrested on the orders of a court located outside the local jurisdiction\nshould be produced before an Executive Magistrate who can also set the bail\namount for the arrested individual to avoid police custody, depending on the\nterms of the warrant. The Executive Magistrate also can pass orders restraining\npersons from committing a particular act or preventing persons from entering an\narea (Section 144 CrPC). There is no specific provision to order a\n\"curfew\". The Executive Magistrates alone are authorised to use force\nagainst people. In plain language, they alone can disperse an \"unlawful\nassembly\". Technically, the police are to assist the Executive Magistrate.\nExecutive Magistrates can dictate to the police the manner of force (baton\ncharge/ tear gas/blank fire/firing) and also, how much force should be used.\nThey can also seek the assistance of the Armed Forces to quell a riot.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">NOTE: <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;Section 4 of the Police Act of 1861 states\nthat the District Police are subject to the \"</span><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">general control and\ndirection\" of the District Magistrate.</span><span style=\"color: blue;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">This should not be\ninterpreted as allowing the District Magistrate to interfere in the internal\nmanagement of the police force.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\">The police should be\naccountable to the law. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Any rule or\nregulation that unnecessarily subordinates the police to the District\nMagistrate should be removed.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE DON\u2019T WANT LAWYERS\nTURNED MAGISTRATES TO CONTROL THE POLICE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; <b style=\"background-color: white;\">SECTION 4 </b>&nbsp;Inspector- General of Police, etc.\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The administration of\nthe police throughout a general police district shall be vested in an officer\nto be styled the Inspector-General of Police, and in such Deputy\nInspectors-General and Assistant Inspectors-General as to the State Government\nshall seem fit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The administration of\nthe police throughout the local jurisdiction of the Magistrate of the district\nshall, under the <span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">GENERAL CONTROL AND DIRECTION of such Magistrate,</span> be vested in\na District Superintendent and such Assistant District Superintendents as the\nState Government shall consider necessary. &nbsp;&nbsp;UNQUOTE&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Below: Faster promotions and better raises if you declare openly that you support gay marriage . When you go for a job interview there is a culture round where you have to express your support for same sex marriage and anal/ oral sex between same sex. &nbsp;Photos are put on boards, with mobile phone and email IDs like how escort services do.</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IHSSxcOqJ9M/WW1nusbEBRI/AAAAAAABU0U/--zQGHG2SkA8gzsdHqM-BNK6UvkeilhvgCLcBGAs/s1600/AAEAAQAAAAAAAAlDAAAAJDQr3OTkwZjNkLWU0ZjQtNDMyMy1hMmI0LWJiMGMzMTdhNWI0OA.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; background-position: 0px -21px; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: auto; bottom: -1px; display: inline-block; height: 12px; margin-bottom: -5px; position: relative; vertical-align: top; width: 12px;\"></i></a></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"_5pbx userContent\" data-ft=\"{&quot;tn&quot;:&quot;K&quot;}\" id=\"js_2\" style=\"background-color: white; color: #1d2129; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.38;\">\n<div style=\"display: inline; font-family: inherit;\">\nHomosexuality has never been considered a crime in Hindu culture. In fact, Lord Ayyappa was born of Hari-Hara (Vishnu &amp; Shiva). It is not a crime in any Smriti. Everyone has male &amp; female elements. According to their dominance, tendencies show up &amp; may change. Nobody should face discrimination because of their sexual preferences. To be branded a criminal for this is absurd.</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>Below: &nbsp; WE HAVE ABSORBED HOMOSEXUAL DIRTY BLOOD TOO FROM THE INVADERS&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/hNwPD0I5Tms/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/hNwPD0I5Tms?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2049636661270941201\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_27M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. complete training should be\ncompulsorily retired.&nbsp; The lowest strata\nof police constables must be declared as SKILLED LABOUR.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The minimum educational\nqualifications for recruitment as Constable should be 12<sup>th</sup> standard pass\n( not failed )&nbsp; &nbsp;preferably Science / Math&nbsp; as he is expected to be tech savvy in future.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Physical fitness is a must- they\nmust undergo treadmill tests \u2013 recorded by graph and electronically. &nbsp;These treadmills must undergo surprise\ncalibration and severe punishment ( jail ) &nbsp;meted out if fitness cheating takes place&nbsp; .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All meritorious\nofficers should have the opportunity to be promoted at least three times during\ntheir tenure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HAVE A REWARD SYSTEM\nFOR WITNESSES WHO HELP THE VICTIMS OF A ROAD ACCIDENT .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Last year more than 6\nlakh people were injured in road accidents out of which a big percentage died.&nbsp; Many of these lives could have been saved, if\nthey had received timely help. &nbsp;But due\nto the apathy of society many people just passed by people as they lay in\ncritical condition.&nbsp; This happens only in\nIndia. No witness in India wants to be endlessly tangled in police cases and\ncourt cases.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Good Samaritan who\ntakes an accident victim to a hospital MUST&nbsp;\nnot be asked any questions and he should be able to leave IMMEDIATELY.. &nbsp;He must NOT be forced to stay unless he is a\ndirect eyewitness in which case only their address can be noted.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nGood Samaritan will NOT be held for any criminal or civil liability.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A\nbystander who calls the police or emergency service to the site of a road\naccident does not have to reveal his name or any other personal details on the\nphone or in person.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Medico Legal Forms which are provided by hospitals,\nit is optional for good Samaritans to submit their personal information. Many\ntimes the good Samaritan is told by PRIVATE hospitals to take the victim to the\nnearest GOVT hospital.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the victim\ndies in between criminal charges are slapped. &nbsp;&nbsp;Harrassment of the good Samaritan by police or\njudges must entail severe punishment..</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Good Samaritan can be\nexamined through video conferencing in order to protect him from harassment or\nany inconvenience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SOMETIMES LIKE IN THE\nBMW CRASH ( NANDA ) BOY CASE , &nbsp;FALSE\nWITNESSES ( KULKARNI ) &nbsp;ARE PRODUCED OUT\nOF THIN AIR BY LAWYERS LIKE RK ANAND . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1999_Delhi_hit-and-run_case\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1999_Delhi_hit-and-run_case</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IF ANY GOOD SAMARITANs TRUE\nSTATEMENT CONFLICTS WITH THE LYING STATEMENT OF THE FAKE WITNESS PRODUCED OUT\nOF THIN AIR\u2014 THE GOOD MAN IS JAILED FOR PERJURY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Good Samaritans MUST\nnot be asked to pay for hospital registration and admission costs unless he is\na family member of the injured who has to be treated immediately.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If a PRIVATE doctor\nfails to act to help an accident victim when he is expected to provide care,\nhis actions will be seen as \u201cProfessional Misconduct\u201d as prescribed by the\nIndian Medical Council Regulation 2002 and disciplinary action MUST be taken\nagainst them.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Kerala the doctor wants the bleeding victim to be brought to\nhim.&nbsp; He will never move his ass towards\nthe victim even if the accident place is just a short distance away. This must\ncause criminal charges to be slapped against the doctor ( jail\u2014not fine )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All PRIVATE and GOVT &nbsp;hospitals must put up a notice at their\nentrances in English, Hindi and the vernacular language of the State or Union\nTerritory stating that no good Samaritan will be asked to provide his personal\ndetails or pay money for the admission of the victim.&nbsp; There must be a POLICE VIGILANCE phone number/\nEmail to complain to.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the Good Samaritan\nrequires an acknowledgement to confirm that he has brought the injured person\nto the hospital with the details of time and place, the hospital shall oblige\nand the acknowledgement can be prepared in accordance to the STANDARD &nbsp;format prescribed<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If a Good Samaritan\nchooses to be a witness&nbsp; he must be\nexamined with utmost respect and the &nbsp;examination will be conducted at a time and\nplace of the Good Samaritan\u2019s convenience -- the investigation officer will be\ndressed in plain clothes.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the Good Samaritan is required\nby the investigation officer to visit the police station, the reasons for the\nrequirement shall be recorded by the officer in writing. In a police station,\nthe Good Samaritan will be examined in a single examination in a reasonable and\ntime-bound manner, without causing any undue delay.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If\na Good Samaritan declares himself to be an eyewitness, she will be allowed to\ngive her evidence in the form of an affidavit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More than 65% of those\nkilled in road accidents could have been saved if they had received immediate\nassistance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://www.financialexpress.com/india-news/help-accident-victims-guidelines-delhi-man-bleeds-to-death-robbed/344804/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.financialexpress.com/india-news/help-accident-victims-guidelines-delhi-man-bleeds-to-death-robbed/344804/</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Police officers should\ndevelop an attitude of courtesy and consideration towards members of the public\nwho come to them for help.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The way that junior\npolice behave towards the public is influenced by the way they are treated by\nsenior police. The way that police treat one another should be reformed.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The police should be\naccountable to the law. Any rule or regulation that&nbsp; unnecessarily &nbsp;subordinates the police to the District\nMagistrate ( lawyer turned Judge ) should be removed.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Section 4 of the Police\nAct of 1861 states that the District Police are subject to the \"general\ncontrol and direction\" of the District Magistrate.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This should not be\ninterpreted as allowing the District Magistrate to interfere in the internal\nmanagement of the police force.&nbsp; This\nmust never happen. We see this happening every day in India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Investigation and law\nand order functions shall be separated (a model is proposed to ensure this\nhappens without affecting the chain of command).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Specialised crime\ninvestigation wings and departments must be equipped with adequate facilities,\nscientific aids, and qualified and trained human resources.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The Department must have specialised units for\ninvestigating cyber crime, organised crime, homicide, economic offences and any\nother offences that require specific investigative skills<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Annual refresher\nclasses must be held. &nbsp;An simple objective\nexam must be held after the course . &nbsp;&nbsp;If\nthe policeman &nbsp;fail thrice, &nbsp;he must be discharged from the force or downgraded\nto a lower menial job .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lay down a\ntraining/education policy covering all ranks and categories of police\npersonnel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The state government\nmust periodically create and upgrade the infrastructure<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the district level,\nSpecial Investigation Cells shall be created to investigate more serious and\ncomplex offences, including economic crimes. &nbsp;&nbsp;Not a single police station is good enough to\ninquire into economic &nbsp;crimes , which in\nthe ATM era is common place.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Police Board must\nidentify these performance indicators, which should include:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">o operational\nefficiency;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">o public satisfaction (\n&nbsp;brainstorming )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">o victim satisfaction\n(both in terms of police investigation and response);<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">o accountability;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">o use of resources; and<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">o human rights record.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>WE DON\u2019T WANT LAWYERS\nAND JUDGES IN THE NATIONAL COMMISSION OF HUMAN RIGHTS ( NHRC ).&nbsp; &nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">Below\n, find Article 19(1) and 19 (2) in The Constitution Of India 1949:----<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">Article\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>19(1) </b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">in The Constitution Of India 1949:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">(1)\nAll citizens shall have the right to--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">(a) to\nfreedom of speech and expression;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>19 (2)</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">\nNothing in sub clause (a) of clause ( 1 ) shall affect the operation of any\nexisting law, or prevent the State from making any law, in so far as such law\nimposes reasonable restrictions on the exercise of the right conferred by the\nsaid sub clause in the interests of the sovereignty and integrity of India, the\nsecurity of the State, friendly relations with foreign States, public order,\ndecency or morality or in relation to contempt of court, defamation or\nincitement to an offence<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><b>SECTION\n124 A WAS CREATED BY ROTHSCHILD AFTER THE 1857 REVOLT\u2014TO PROTECT HIS KOSHER ASS</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">124A</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">. &nbsp;\u2014 Whoever, by words, either spoken or written,\nor by signs, or by visible representation, or otherwise, brings or attempts to\nbring into hatred or contempt, or excites or attempts to excite disaffection towards,\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">the Government </span>established by law in 1India, 1 shall be punished with\n1imprisonment for life, to which fine may be added, or with imprisonment which\nmay extend to three years, to which fine may be added, or with fine.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">APPLY\nBODMAS \u2013 &nbsp;SECTION 124 A IS SUPERCEEDED BY\nSEC 19 ( 1 ) and&nbsp; ( 2) AND HENCE BECOMES\n<span style=\"color: red;\">AUTOMATICALLY NULL AND VOID</span>\u2014 TO BE TORN AWAY AND BURNT</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The creation of\nill-will and bad feelings towards the government per se should be a concern\nonly in a colonial SLAVE state and should not be a concern, much less an offence, in a free democracy.</span><span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">IT IS\nA DISGRACE THAT A BLOGGER HAS TO POINT THIS OUT IN 2017<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">FALI\nBABY AND SOLI BABY WONT UNDERSTAND THE TRUTH BELOW<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THE\nCONSTITUTION HAS THREE SLABS ON TOP<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: white;\">1.. TOP\nMOST LAYER &nbsp;\u2014&nbsp; \u201cUNIVERSAL LAWS OF GOD\u201d &nbsp; ( DHARMA , UNWRITTEN\n</span><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">NATURAL JUSTICE </span><span style=\"background-color: white;\">)<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: white;\">2..\nSECOND LAYER FROM TOP &nbsp;\u2014 \u201c</span><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WATAN</span><span style=\"background-color: white;\">\u201d ( MOTHERLAND \u2013BHARTAMATA )<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: white;\">3\u2026 THIRD\nLAYER FROM TOP &nbsp;\u2013 \u201c</span><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WE THE PEOPLE</span><span style=\"background-color: white;\"> \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">CONSTITUTION\nIS UNDER THESE THREE FORCES </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">ABOVE &nbsp;IS BEYOND THE UNDERSTANDING OF A \u201cLAWYER\nTURNED JUDGE\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">WHAT\nIS BODMAS ?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3820210778654691610\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_129M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/police-reforms-in-india-much-more-with_17.html?showComment=1500431252817#c3820210778654691610\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 19, 2017 at 7:57 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_129MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/after-29-year-trial-2-get-5-years-for-rs-370-theft/articleshow/59658044.cms<br />\n<br />\nMELORD JUdGES WANT TO POINT FINGERS AT OTHERS ?<br />\n<br />\nTHEY WANT EVERYBODY TO SPEED UP WITH DEADLINES ?<br />\n<br />\nHEY MELORDS--WHAT ARE YOUR WORTH ?<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\">CONFUSING PEABRAINED SHIT BELOW</b><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-EOq-HQSrTsU/WW8dsTW50iI/AAAAAAABU2s/JkUtacmDVh8fLUVSYRrp40XzfPvaH7O1ACLcBGAs/s1600/rankWWs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"616\" data-original-width=\"1060\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-EOq-HQSrTsU/WW8dsTW50iI/AAAAAAABU2s/JkUtacmDVh8fLUVSYRrp40XzfPvaH7O1ACLcBGAs/s1600/rankWWs.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just being named in an\nFIR is not reason enough for the police to arrest you. The lack of this\nknowledge by the general public is often misused.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arrest has a\ndiminishing and demoralizing effect on the personality. He is outrage ,\ntraumatized and &nbsp;alienated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">REMEMBER ANY INDIAN WHO\nHOLDS A FOREIGN GUN TO POINT IT AGAINST BHARATMATA IS NOT PROTECTED BY THE\nCONSTITUTION \u2014&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NEVER MIND WHAT BENAMI MEDIA, COLLEGIUM JUDGES, NHRC , NCM AND\nNCW AND INTERNATIONAL AMNESTY THINKS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Criminal procedure\nCode, 1973 in its chapter V (section 41 to 60) deals with Arrest of a person.\nIronically, Code has not defined the term \u201cArrest\u201d.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Taking of a person into\njudicial custody is followed after the arrest of the person by Magistrate on\nappearance or surrender. In every arrest there is custody but not vice versa..\nThis code propose two types of arrests: (i) arrest made in pursuance of a\nwarrant issued by a magistrate (ii) arrest made without such a warrant but made\nin accidence with some legal provision permitting such arrest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arrest can be made by\npolice officer or Magistrate&nbsp; The code\nexempts the members of Armed forces from being arrested for anything done by\nthem in discharge of their official duties except after obtaining the consent of\nthe government (Sec. 45).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the police arrests\na person in execution of a warrant of arrest obtained from a magistrate, the\nperson so arrested shall not be handcuffed unless the police have obtained\norders from the Magistrate in this regard.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arrest of a person is\nmade in order to ensure his presence at the trial. In law, there is principle\nof \u201cpresumption of innocence till he has proven guilty\u201d it requires a person\narrested to be treated with humanity, Dignity and respectfully till his guilt\nis proof.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In a free society like ours , law is quite careful toward one\u2019s\n\u201cpersonal liberty\u201d and doesn\u2019t permit&nbsp;\nthe detention of any person&nbsp;\nwithout legal sanction. Even article 21 of our constitution provides :\n\u201cNo person shall be deprived of his life or personal liberty except according\nto procedure established by law\u201d. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MANY UNDERTRAILS HELD\nFOR DECADES HAVE FETCHED POLICE OFFICERS PROMOTIONS AND MEDALS.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT IS IN THE INTEREST OF THE CORRUPT POLICE\nOFFICER TO KEEP THE UNDERTRIAL BY HOOK OR BY CROOKS IN JAIL WITHOUT A TRIAL\u2014TILL\nHE RETIRES WITH HIS BENEFITS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/undertrial-prisoners-in-indian-remand.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/undertrial-prisoners-in-indian-remand.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It is a fundamental\nright to be informed of the grounds of arrest under sec. 50 of crpc and article\n22 of Indian Constitution</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It is the duty\nof the police officer to inform you and also tell whether the offence is\nbailable or non bailable.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In non- cognizable\ncases ,arrest are made with warrant and the person going to be arrested have a\nright to see the warrant under Sec. 75 of crpc.&nbsp;&nbsp; Warrant of arrest should fulfill certain\nrequirements such as it should be in writing , signed by the presiding officer\n, should have seal of court , Name and address of the accuse and offence under\nwhich arrest is made. If any of these is missing, warrant is illegal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under sec. 41 , police\nhave a power to arrest a person without warrant as prompt and immediate arrest\nis needed , no time to approach magistrate and obtain a warrant for example in\ncase where serious crime is has been perpetrated by a dangerous person or where\nchances of that person absconding unless immediately arrested. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The police officer must\nbe wearing a clear, visible and clear identification of his name which\nfacilitate easy identification. A memo of arrest must be prepared at the time\nof arrest \u2013 (i) attested by least one witness, it can be family member or\nmember of locality where arrest is made (ii)counter signed by arrested person.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arrested person have\nright not to be detained for more than 24hrs, without being presented before\nmagistrate, it is to prevent unlawful and illegal arrests. This right is\nfundamental right under article 22 of Indian constitution and supported under\nsection 57 and 76 of crpc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arrested person have\nright to remain silent under Sec. 20(3) of Indian constitution so that police\ncan\u2019t extract self \u2013 incriminating statement from a person without will or\nwithout his consent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">General rule is that\nFemales are not be arrested without the presence of a lady constable and\nfurther no female be arrested after sun-set but there are exception in some\ncases, where crime is very serious and arrest is important then arrest can be\nmade with special orders and it depends on facts and circumstances of each\ncase. Separate lock ups to be provided for them.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS WHY AFRICAN DRUG COURIERS\nARE NOWADAYS ALL WOMEN AFTER DUSK<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A search warrant is a\ncourt order that a magistrate, Judge or Court issues that authorizes law\nenforcement officers to conduct a search of a person, location or vehicle for\nevidence of a crime and to confiscate illegal items or evidence of crime, if\nthey find any.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In order to get a search warrant, the police must convince a\njudge that there is evidence of a crime at that place and if the judge is\nconvinced, he shall issue a warrant and the warrant must be very specific, as\nit should clearly state where exactly the search should take place, including a\nspecific date and time. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The magistrate must\nexercise his judicial discretion AND DUE DILIGENCE while issuing search\nwarrant.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NOWADAYS HIGH AND MIGHTY&nbsp; WITH\nEGO PROBLEMS USE PET POLICE AND PET MAGISTRATES FOR DEFAMATION CASES</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In reality, police who\nare attack dogs of corrupt politicians are known to use the power given in\nSection 165 in a very wide manner to fish for evidence in houses of any suspect\nor non-suspect, and sometimes even as a tool for harassment and\noppression..&nbsp;&nbsp; The police should prepare\na seizure list and make you sign the same.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The real danger is that\none may plant evidence against you during a search and police may use this\nagainst you in a case. This is why, SEARCHES MUST BE VIDEO RECORDED in future.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AT SEA MANY SHIP\nCAPTAINS HAVE BEEN ARMTWISTED BY CORRUPT CUSTOMS IN FOREIGN NATIONS \u2013PLANTING\nDRUGS <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Who may be arrested\nwithout warrant by police :\u00ad--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1) A person, who is\npossessing any implement of housebreaking.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2) A&nbsp;&nbsp; person&nbsp;&nbsp;\nhaving&nbsp;&nbsp; in&nbsp;&nbsp; his&nbsp;&nbsp;\npossession&nbsp;&nbsp; a&nbsp;&nbsp; property,&nbsp;&nbsp;\nwhich&nbsp;&nbsp; may<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">reasonably&nbsp;&nbsp; be&nbsp;&nbsp;\nsuspected&nbsp;&nbsp; to&nbsp;&nbsp; be&nbsp;&nbsp;\nstolen&nbsp;&nbsp; and&nbsp;&nbsp; who&nbsp;&nbsp;\nreasonably&nbsp;&nbsp; is<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">suspected to have\ncommitted some offence P. U. Sec. 379, 380,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">411, 412 of IPC. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3) A person, who is\nobstructing police officer in execution of his<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">duties or who escapes\nor attempts to escape from lawful custody.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A police officer who\narrests a person with a warrant must inform the person that the person is under\narrest and of the nature of the warrant.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before the person is\nreleased from police custody, a police officer must give to the person, in\nwriting, the name, rank and station of the arresting officer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; The previous 2 contracts she\nsailed with him on the ship.&nbsp;&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
