She had it all worked out, with the rich film\nproducer's connivance.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Later , after 14 months\n, she came back grovelling, and asked him to remarry her -- the producer just\nUSED her from all 3 orifices for a year -- if you know what I mean.. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">My friend had just\nrecovered from depression . He showed her the three scars on his wrist and\nasked her \" What would you do , if you were in my place\".&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Men don't go on TV and\ntell such sob stories.&nbsp; </i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The CBI arrest of a\nperson accused has to be done in compliance with certain rules and procedures.\nIn India, the procedure of CBI arrest- for government officials differs from\nthe CBI arrest- of the normal public.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The main difference\nbetween the two is that-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A public servant is to\nbe arrested only if and when it becomes absolutely essential to do so in the\ninterest of the investigation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A government official\ncan be arrested if there is enough reason to believe that the accused would\nabscond, will try to destroy the evidence, or act in such a way as to avoid the\nlegal process.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Where a person is\narrested without a warrant, the&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\npolice officer is required to tell him the nature of his offence, and\nin&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; case of non bailable offences,\nhis right to apply for bail (Section 50(2)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\nof the CrPC).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Section 59 of the CrPC\nprovides no person who has been arrested by a police officer shall be\ndischarged except on his own bond, or on bail, or under the special order of a\nMagistrate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A person apprehending\narrest for a non bailable offence may apply to the High Court or the Sessions\nCourt having jurisdiction for a direction that upon arrest he shall be released\non bail. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HIGH AND MIGHTY\nPOLITICIANS AND RICH CRIMINALS GET AWAY BY PAYING BRIBES .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">RICH AND POWERFUL\nPEOPLE NEVER BECOME UNDERTRIALS UNLIKE POOR VULNERABLE PEOPLE\u2014THIS MUST STOP <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you are arrested, an\nofficer can search you, without a warrant, for weapons, evidence or illegal or\nstolen goods.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Strip searches should not be conducted for offenses that do not\ninvolve weapons, drugs or violence unless police reasonably suspect you are\nconcealing a weapon or illegal goods and they have authorization from the\nsupervising officer on duty.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you are booked and jailed, you may undergo a\nfull body search, including body cavities.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The police personnel\ncarrying out the arrest and handling the interrogation of the arrestee should\nbear accurate, visible and clear identification and name tags with their\ndesignations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The&nbsp;&nbsp; particulars&nbsp;&nbsp;\nof&nbsp;&nbsp; all&nbsp;&nbsp; such&nbsp;&nbsp;\npolice&nbsp;&nbsp; personnel&nbsp;&nbsp; who&nbsp;&nbsp;\nhandle interrogation of the arrestee must be recorded in a register.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The police officer\ncarrying out the arrest of the arrestee shall prepare a memo of arrest at the\ntime of arrest and such memo shall be attested by atleast one witness, who may\nbe either a member of the family of the arrestee or a respectable person of the\nlocality from where the arrest is made. It shall alsobe counter signed by the\narrestee and shall contain the time and date of arrest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A person who has been\narrested or detained and is being held in custody in a police station or\ninterrogation center or other lock\u00adup, shall be entitled to have one friend or\nrelative or other person known to him or having interest in his welfare being\ninformed, as soon as practicable, that he has been arrested and is being\ndetained at the particular place, unless the attesting witness of the memo of\narrest is himself such a friend or a relative of the arrestee.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The arrestee should,\nwhere he so requests, be also examined at the time of his arrest and major and\nminor injuries, if any present on his body, must be recorded at that time. The \"Inspection\nMemo\" must be signed both by the arrestee and the police officer effecting\nthe arrest and its copy provided to the arrestee.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN THE SUNANADA PUSHKAR\nTHAROOR CASE HOTEL CCTC RECORD JUST DISAPPEARED \u2013NOBODY CARES. HER BODY HAS\nINJURY MARKS AD EVEN BITE MARKS <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN JAYALALITAA DEATH CASE\nCCTC RECORDS DISAPPEARED.&nbsp; DURING THE\nFUNERAL THE ENTIRE WORLD SAW THEY HER LEGS BELOW HER KNEES WERE MISSING.&nbsp; HER Z+ SECURITY WAS WITHDRAWN<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHAT IS ALL THIS?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The arrestee should be\nsubjected to medical examination by a trained doctor every 48 hours during his\ndetention in custody by&nbsp; a doctor&nbsp;&nbsp; on&nbsp;\nthe&nbsp;&nbsp; panel&nbsp; of&nbsp;&nbsp;\napproved&nbsp; doctors&nbsp; appointed&nbsp;\nby Director,&nbsp;&nbsp; Health&nbsp;&nbsp; Services<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Copies of all the\ndocuments including the memo of arrest, referred to above, should be sent to\nthe illaqa Magistrate for his record.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The arrestee must be\npermitted to meet his lawyer during interrogation, though not throughout the\ninterrogation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While arresting a female\na lady constable must be present,but in circumstance, where the arresting\nofficers is reasonably satisfied that, such presence of a lady constable is not\navailable or possible and or the delay in arresting caused by securing the\npresence of a lady constable would impede the course of investigation such\narresting officer for reasons to be recorded either before the arrest or\nimmediately after the arrest be permitted to arrest a female person for lawful\nreasons at any time of the day or night depending on circumstances of the case\neven without the presence of lady constable<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A members of armed\nforces of India shall not be arrested for anything done in discharge of his\nofficial duty&nbsp;&nbsp; except&nbsp;&nbsp; after&nbsp;&nbsp;\nobtaining&nbsp;&nbsp; consent&nbsp;&nbsp; of&nbsp;&nbsp;\ncentral&nbsp;&nbsp; government.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>&nbsp;NHRC , NCM AND NCW MUST KEEP AWAY FROM ARMED\nFORCES.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; WE DONT WANT THESE BILDERBERG CLUB CREATED ORGS TO\nSAVE BHARATMATA.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>ONLY CONSTITUTION AND\nRULES SHALL APPLY.&nbsp; &nbsp; NOT SOME BULLSHIT PAST\nJUDGEMENT MADE BY SOME LAWYER TURNED JUDGE --- WHO CAME VIA QUOTA OR BY\nMERIT\u2014TAKEN TOTALLY OUT OF CONTEXT.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THIS\nOUT OF CONTEXT PAST RULING BULLSHIT ( TAKEN AS GOSPEL ) MUST STOP IMMEDIATELY .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">BURN ALL PAST JUDGEMENTS OF COLLEGIUM JUDGES\n</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">VARIOUS FAMILIARIZATION\nAND OPERATIONAL CHECKLISTS FOR THE POLICE MUST BE MADE BY A CENTRAL PANEL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arrest is not must in\nevery cognizable case. It is the discretion of the police officer to arrest or\nnot to arrest, and the discretion can not be arbitrary but it must be guided by\nthe principles which laid down by .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In&nbsp;\norder to avoid harassment to a person&nbsp;\narrested by the Police to be produced before a Judicial Magistrate, a\ntime schedule of 24 hours is fixed so that person detained shall be produced\nwithin that time and if any Police Officer does not adhere to the time schedule\nwithout a reasonable cause, action should be taken against him. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whenever&nbsp;&nbsp; a&nbsp;&nbsp;\nperson&nbsp;&nbsp; is&nbsp;&nbsp; arrested&nbsp;&nbsp;\nand&nbsp;&nbsp; it&nbsp;&nbsp; appears&nbsp;&nbsp;\nthat&nbsp;&nbsp; the investigation&nbsp;&nbsp; as&nbsp;&nbsp;\nregards&nbsp;&nbsp; his&nbsp;&nbsp; involvement&nbsp;&nbsp;\ncannot&nbsp;&nbsp; be&nbsp;&nbsp; completed&nbsp;&nbsp;\nwithin the period of twenty\u00adfour hours provided in Section 57 of\nCr.P.C., the Investigating&nbsp;&nbsp; Officer&nbsp;&nbsp; should&nbsp;&nbsp;\nproduce&nbsp;&nbsp; him&nbsp;&nbsp; before&nbsp;&nbsp;\nthe&nbsp;&nbsp; Magistrate&nbsp;&nbsp; with an&nbsp;&nbsp;\napplication&nbsp;&nbsp; for&nbsp;&nbsp; Police&nbsp;&nbsp;\ncustody&nbsp;&nbsp; remand&nbsp;&nbsp; as&nbsp;&nbsp;\nper&nbsp;&nbsp; the&nbsp;&nbsp; provisions&nbsp;&nbsp;\nof Section 167 Cr.P.C.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Magistrate may authorize detention of\nthe&nbsp; accused in such custody for a term\nnot exceeding 15 days and thereafter send the accused to judicial custody as\nper section 167 Cr.P.C.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An investigating\nofficer can ask for remand only when there are grounds for believing that the\naccusation or information is well founded and it appears that the investigation\ncannot be completed within the period of 24 hours<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"https://www.researchgate.net/publication/260182850_Uniform_guidelines_for_postmortem_work_in_India\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.researchgate.net/publication/260182850_Uniform_guidelines_for_postmortem_work_in_India</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; He had set the men's 200m inter college record, at a mere 22.2 seconds and held it for 35 years, until recently Gaurang Amre broke the record, clocking at 21.7 seconds. He expressed gladness as the record was broken, but at the same time expressed concern over the time taken to break the record, quoting these records should be broken \"every two or three years\".[3] He has won the national title in 100m sprint 11 times.[4] Sumariwalla represented India at the 1980 summer olympics as a hundred-meter sprinter, in which he stood seventh in round one.[5] UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nADILLE BABY WANTS TO BOAST ABOUT STANDING 7TH OUT OF EIGHT IN MOSCOW - AN EVENT IN WHICH 65% OF NATIONS ( WEST ) AROUND THE WORLD BOYCOTTED<br />\n<br />\nWHY IS THE FELLOW HEADING THE ATHLETICS FEDERATION OF INDIA ?<br />\n<br />\nPU THIS COMMENT IN SPORTS MINISTERs WEBSITE--AS FOR AN ACK<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_86MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_86BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; KILL!</b></span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAND THAT TOO KILL GERMANS WHO HAD DONE INDIA NO HARM ON BEHALF OF THE WHITE INVADER WHO WAS ROBBING BHARATMATA BLIND..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nGandhi recruited 13 lakh ( 1.3 million ) Indian soldiers in the first world war \u2013 out of which 111000 ( 1.11 lakh ) Indian soldiers were killed .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nGandhi recruited 25 lakh ( 2.5 million ) Indian soldiers in the second World war. Out of this 243000 ( 2.43 lakh) soldiers were killed.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nJEW ROTHSCHILD NEEDED ENORMOUS AMOUNT OF LEATHER --FOR ARMY BOOTS / BELTS/ GUN HOLSTERS/ HORSE SADDLES/ BRIDLES etc</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nROTHSCHILD BUILT TANNERIES ALL OVER INDIA . &nbsp;IMAGINE A JEW WHO OWN 70% OF ISRAEL BUILDING MOSQUES FOR INDIAN MUSLIMS .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHINDUS REFUSED TO WORK IN TANNERIES ( KILLING COWS ) AND HENCE JEW ROTHSCHILD CONVERTED HUGE PARTS OF THE POPULATION USING CRYPTO JEWS AS MULLAHS .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHESE CONVERTED POOR DALIT MUSLIMS SLOGGED IN THE TANNERIES. &nbsp; MOST OF THEM WERE AT THE SEA END OF GREAT RIVERS INDUS/ GANGES/ BRAHMAPUTRA ( TO PREVENT RIVER POLLUTION ) --AND KANPUR ..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WHY CAWN FUCKIN\u2019 PORE AT THE MID PART OF GANGES ? IT HAD THE LARGEST ROTHSCHILD ARMY CANTONMENT ON THIS PLANET DURING WW1</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD FITTED LOUDSPEAKERS ON ALL MOSQUES HE BUILT AROUND TANNERIES --TO WAKE UP HIS LEATHER WORKERS 1.5 HOURS BEFORE SUNRISE-SUCH WAS THE DEMAND FOR LEATHER.</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/06/ganga-manthan-cleaning-of-river-ganges.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWHY DID BANGLADESH HAVE SO MANY BENGALI MUSLIMS ?-- THEY WERE ALL TANNERY WORKERS -WORKING AT THE END OF RIVERS BEFORE THEY JOINED THE SEA--SO THAT THE WHOLE RIVER IS NOT POLLUTED.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIN CALICUT ROTHSCHILD HAD HIS HANDLOOM FACTORIES PRODUCING COTTON GOODS AND KHAKI FOR WW1 UNIFORMS .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHERE HE WOKE UP PEOPLE FOR A SIREN WHICH COULD BE HEAR ALL OVER CALICUT. &nbsp; DURING WW1 THIS SIREN BLEW AT SUNRISE .. WHEN I WAS BORN THIS SIREN BLEW AT 0715.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBOTH MY PARENTS WORKED AT THIS GERMAN BASEL MISSION FACTORY --BEFORE WW1 THIS FACTORY PRODUCED THE GREATEST AMOUNT OF KHAKHI CLOTHES ON THE PLANET .. TODAY THIS FACTORY IS CALLED COMMONWEALTH TRUST LTD .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/12/hermann-gundert-hermann-hesse-and.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_4BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">November 8, 2016 at\n9:05 AM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">TEESTA SETALVADs GREAT\nGRANDFATHER CHIMANLAL HARILAL SETALVAD WAS A ROTHSCHILD STOOGE , &nbsp;AND WAS KNIGHTED\nFOR WHITEWASHING THE JALLIANWALA BAGH MASSACRE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">INDIANS WERE SHOT FOR\nNOT CRAWLING OUT OF THE MAIDAN ON ALL FOURS , LIKE MONKEYS --WHEN ORDERED .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">HIS SON , TEESTA\nSETALVADs GRANDFATHER WAS INDIAs FIRST ATTORNEY GENERAL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CH SETALVAD AND BR\nAMBEDKAR WERE ONE TWOSOME -- &nbsp;SUPPORTING ROTHSCHILD 100%<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In late 1919, the British\ngovernment got their loyal Sikh stooges to present a Saropa (Robe of Honour) to\nLieutenant Governor of the Punjab Sir Michael Francis O'Dwyer . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was given the Saropa\nin Harimandar Sahib by CRYPTO JEW SIKHS wearing 5K -- a man who cheered the\nmassacre of hundreds of innocent unarmed Hindus and Sikhs on Baisakhi day of\n1919. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This man who endorsed\nGeneral Reginald Edward Harry Dyer's action regarding the Jallianwala Bagh\nmassacre and termed it a \"correct action\u2014 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sir Michael Francis\nO'Dwyer would be later assassinated by Udham Singh. He took in two bullets and\ndied instantly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CHIMANLAL HARILAL\nSETALVAD had been knighted by Jew Rothschild, </span><b style=\"background-color: white;\">JUST BEFORE</b><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"> repeat JUST BEFORE\nthe Jallianwala Bagh inquiry. &nbsp; He was the VC of Bombay University.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reginald Edward Harry\nDyer returned to England as a great hero.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">IF I WERE TEESTA\nSETALVADs GREAT GRANDFATHER SIR CHIMANLAL HARILAL SETALVAD IF WOULD HAVE SENTENCED\nO'DWYER AND DYER TO DEATH. </span></b><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">NOW YOU KNOW WHY HIS\nSON MC SETALVAD BECAME THE FIRST AND LONGEST SERVING ATTORNEY GENERAL OF INDIA\n. MAJJA HAI ... KISSI KOH KUCH NAHIN PATHA .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Michael O'Dwyer, the\nLieutenant Governor of Punjab from 1912 to 1919, endorsed General Dyer and\ncalled the massacre a \"correct\" action.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>SIKHS GAVE HIM SAROPA\nIN THEIR HIGHEST PEETH-- HARMANDIR SAHIB . &nbsp; &nbsp;THIS MAN O'DWYER HAD GIVEN ORDERS TO\nREGINALD DYER .</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The National Security\nCouncil (NSC) of India is an executive government agency tasked with advising\nthe Prime Minister's office on matters of national security and strategic\ninterest. &nbsp;It was established by the Atal Bihari Vajpayee government on 19\nNovember 1998.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nNSC is the apex body of the three-tiered structure of the national security\nmanagement system in India. The other two tiers are the Strategic Policy Group,\nand the National Security Advisory Board.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Strategic Policy\nGroup is the first level of the three tier structure of the National Security\nCouncil. It forms the nucleus of the decision-making apparatus of the NSC.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This\ngroup consists of the following members:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cabinet Secretary<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chief of the Army Staff<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chief of the Naval\nStaff<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chief of Air Staff<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Governor of the Reserve\nBank of India (RBI)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Foreign Secretary<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Home Secretary<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CBDT Chairman<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Director of\nIntelligence Bureau<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Defence Secretary<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Secretary (Defence\nProduction)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Finance Secretary<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Secretary (Revenue)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Secretary (Research)\n(i.e. the head of the Research and Analysis Wing)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Secretary of the\nDepartment of Atomic Energy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Scientific Advisor to\nthe Defence Minister<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Secretary of the\nDepartment of Space<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chairman of the Joint\nIntelligence Committee (JIC).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Strategic Policy\nGroup undertakes the \"Strategic Defence Review\", a blueprint of short\nand long term security threats, as well as possible policy options on a\npriority basis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Joint Intelligence\nCommittee (JIC) of the Government of India analyses intelligence data from the\nIntelligence Bureau, Research and Analysis Wing and the Directorates of\nMilitary, Naval and Air Intelligence..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The JIC has its own Secretariat that\nworks under the Cabinet Secretariat. The National Security Advisory Board\nconsists of persons of eminence outside the Government&nbsp; with expertise in external security,\nstrategic analysis, foreign affairs, defence, the armed forces, internal\nsecurity, science and technology and economics.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The board meets at\nleast once a month, and more frequently as required. It provides a long-term\nprognosis and analysis to the NSC, and recommends solutions and address policy\nissues referred to it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>YET\u2014IT TOOK A BLOGGER\n33 POSTS ON SHELL COMPANIES TO WAKE THESE PATHETIC PEOPLE UP .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/A3ORZqWVwKk/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/A3ORZqWVwKk?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MANY TOP POLITICIANS\nOPERATE MAFIA AS MERCENERIES TO THREATEN THE POLICE.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MOST TOP BUILDERS HAVE THEIR OWN MAFIA WHOSE\nSERVICES THEY LEND TO THEIR SPONSOR POLITICIANS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Owing to the lack of a\ntransparent political funding system, India's politicians are rich in cash and\nthe need for this kind of money in real estate makes them perfect partners for\nproperty developers. Robert Vadra's dealings with DLF offer a perfect example\nof how this politician-builder nexus works.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Politicians accumulate resources\nwhile in office and then require a place to invest it where they can avoid\npublic scrutiny while earning a decent return. Because land is a valuable\ncommodity, many politicians deposit a portion of their assets with developers.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Builders then transfer back the assets to politicians which can be used to\noffset election expenses. These politicians, bureaucrats, big builders and the\nland mafia control the real estate market in most metros to the point where no\ngenuine buyer can really afford to buy a home.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And it is this very nexus that\nensures prices do not crash as it would wipe out the value of their slush\nfunds. A big chunk of a politician's money goes towards acquiring land or\nproperty. Politicians, through developers, pick up land where they have inside\ninformation of future road ingress and development<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jew Rothschild created\nhis own set of Sikh Crypto Jew mafia when he gave away barren land almost free\n.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These lands would be later criss crossed by canals \u2013and these lands became\ngold mines. The Sikhs were rewarded for supporting Jew Rothschild in 1857</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The descendants of these crypto Jew Sikhs wearing 5K were the\noriginal Khalistani leaders .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/unknown-history-of-sikhs-and-sikhism.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/unknown-history-of-sikhs-and-sikhism.html</a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Getting a flat allotted\nunder the discretionary quota of governments is commonplace and beneficiaries\ninclude kin and friends of politicians.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Adarsh scam shows this nexus . How did Devyani\nKhobragade get a flat in Adarsh ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Various Congress\npoliticians, including Ashok Chavan, acquired apartments for themselves and/or\ntheir family members when the land was actually approved for Kargil war widows.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adarsh_Housing_Society_scam\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adarsh_Housing_Society_scam</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://www.thehindu.com/news/national/adarsh-scam-backgrounder/article14264528.ece\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.thehindu.com/news/national/adarsh-scam-backgrounder/article14264528.ece</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Land scams began in a\nmajor way in Maharashtra during the chief ministership of Sharad Pawar as he\nwould dereserve prime plots for certain beneficiaries.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One major scandal was\nthe dereservation of the Vasai-Virar green belt into a residential zone, by\nwhich thousands of acres of land were freed for housing. Pawar was followed by\nothers, who saw huge money in real estate.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shiv Sena leader Manohar Joshi, who\nwas the chief minister from 1995-1999,lost his job because of adverse court\nobservations about how he favoured his son-in-law, a builder, to construct a\ntownship in Pune .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Virtually everybody from top to bottom is on the gravy train\nand works overtime to provide illegal gains to realtors, rather than acting as\ncustodians of public interest. politicians use several trusts as front\ncompanies to invest in real estate through the backdoor route.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Several\nso-called educational institutions have been built by politicians with their\nslush money and a veneer of legitimacy is sought to be introduced in their\nwake. They are attracted to this as they can get huge amounts of land allotted\nto them in the garb of constructing an educational institution and more black\nmoney can be utilised in constructing the buildings and other facilities.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>IF THERE IS POLITICAL\nWILL ALL THESE CORRUPT POLITICIANS AND BUILDERS CAN BE NABBED EASILY\u2014BY\nFOLLOWING THE SHELL COMPANY TRAIL<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">I WROTE A 33 PART\nSERIES ON SHELL COMPANIES.&nbsp; STILL&nbsp; GOVTS AND SECURITY AGENCIES ARE JUST GOING\nTHROUGH THE MOTIONS. </b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_31.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_31.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once they come to\npower, they can easily tweak the rules, and the land that was once allotted for\na hospital or an educational institute will soon be used for residential or\ncommercial purposes. As long as the asset is not in his name or his family's\nname, nobody can touch the politician. It is only when he leaves a trail does\nhe get caught<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A politician will hand\nover Rs 100 crore to a builder for expansion, which will be returned to the\npolitician once the project starts generating cash through sales to either\ninvestors or buyers. And this is why loans and advances have been a common\nindustry practice to grow the business, especially of those operating in the\ncommercial space such as offices, hotels and malls.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most large real estate\nprojects are developed through joint ventures or special purpose vehicles\neither to mitigate risks or regulatory restrictions on land ownership and\nprovide loans or advances to joint ventures and subsidiaries as start-up\ncapital.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WE NEED TO CREATE A\nTRAINING MANUAL FOR INVESTIGATIVE AGENCIES .&nbsp;\nENRON SCREWED INDIA\u2014NOBODY EVEN KNEW.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In order to ensure the\npolitician gets his cash and return on investment, builders use brokers and\nunderwriters to use property as tradable commodities.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A builder can easily\nsell flats to investors at a token price of Rs 10 lakh for a Rs 20 crore\nproperty before the construction of a project begins.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While the allotment of\nthe flat would be in the name of the investor, thegeneral power of attorney\n(where the buyer gets a GPA from the seller not only for his own use of the\nproperty, but for further 'sale' to someone else if he so desires) ensures that\nthe name of the buyer remains blank in the document, thus allowing the investor\nto sell the property further when the property appreciates in the next couple\nof months.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is probably how\nVadra made massive profits by buying several DLF flats in the pre-launch phase.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The politician or bureaucrat's illegal income is handed over in cash to a money\nlaunderer who deposits an equivalent sum in foreign exchange in Mauritius or\nsome other tax haven, where it becomes perfectly legitimate.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A company is then\nformed in the tax haven which invests the politician's money in a real estate\ncompany in India as FDI.&nbsp; So do you\nbelieve the India growth story that is attracting foreign funds to invest in\nrealty?&nbsp; It is actually Indian black\nmoney coming back to India as white money.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The politician here also gets\npreferential shares in the company at a low price. When he needs his money, he\ncan sell the shares at market price. In other words, the realty company is just\na front which functions as a bank for the politician. From getting money from\ndevelopers during elections, these politicians soon started investing with\ndevelopers, who became their bankers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Benami Transactions\n(Prohibition) Act empowers investigating agencies to summarily take over a\nproperty if it is proved to be 'benami', or is nominally in a particular\nperson's name while having been paid for and actually belonging to another.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But\nwith politicians and bureaucrats themselves the biggest offenders, the act,\npassed in the 1980s when Rajiv Gandhi was prime minister, has never been\nenforced rigorously.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2945498292896417682\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_12M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/09/queen-bee-and-darwin-capt-ajit.html?showComment=1500194514007#c2945498292896417682\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 16, 2017 at 2:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_12MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">https://naturalfarmerskerala.com/stingless-honey-bee-or-cheruthen-eecha/</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE ASK THE CHRISTIAN / COMMIE POLITICIANS OF KERALA&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">STOP LYING PROPAGANDA ABOUT BEES</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THERE ARE TWO TYPES OF BEES IN KERALA</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">1) STINGING BEES --BIG IN SIZE&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">2) NON STINGING BEES --SMALL, &nbsp;LIKE FLIES</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE REAL BEES ARE THE STINGING BEES. THEY COLLECT HONEY FROM REAL WILD FLOWERS . &nbsp; THEY MAKE THEIR HOMES ( HIVE ) IN A PERFECT HEXGONAL SHAPE USING SHABDA BRAHMAN--B LONGITUDINAL SOUND WAVES-- &nbsp;WHICH MAKES THE HONEY DIVINE . THESE BEES KEEP AWAY FROM WIFI WAVES AND BUILD BEE HIVES IN DEEP FORESTS HIGH ON TREES</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">THE NON STINGING VARIETY ARE SCAVENGER BEES. &nbsp; THEY CANT EVEN BUILD A DECENT HIVE. &nbsp; THEY ARE ATTRACTED TO SHIT SUGAR SOLUTIONS. &nbsp; IN KERALA WHERE EVER SOMEONE IS SQUEEZING SUGAR CANE ON THE STREETS THESE SHIT STINGLESS BEES FLY AROUND . THESE STINGLESS BEES ARE ATTRACTED TO WIFI.&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THESE USELESS STINGLESS BEES BUILD HOMES ON TOP OF HIGH RISE FLATS WHERE WIFI SIGNALS ARE MAXIMUM.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN MY WIFI ( KERALA STATE BSNL ) STOPPED WORKING I WENT TO THE POLE OUTSIDE MY GATE AND SAW THE WIFI ROUTER JUNCTION ABOUT NINE FEET ABOVE THE GROUND HAD A CRACK. &nbsp; I KNEW STINGLESS BEES WOULD BE INSIDE.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I GOT THE INTERNET SECTION OF THE TELEPHONE DEPT--THEY USED A LADDER AND FOUND A COLONY OF STINGLESS BEES INSIDE WITH SHIT USELESS HONEY DRIPPING</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THEY THEN PUT THE INTERNET JUNCTION BOX ONE FOOT UNDERGROUND AT THE BASE OF THIS POST--WHERE IN MONSOON WOULD BE WATER LADEN--THIS JUNCTION BOX WAS FILLED WITH WATER PROOFING PARAFFIN AND COVERED WITH WATER PROOF TAPE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IT IS A LIE THAT AYURVEDA USES STINGLESS BEE HONEY</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">PEOPLE JEALOUS OF AYURVEDA WRITE ALL THIS NONSENSE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THESE STINGLESS BEES CANNOT FLY TOO HIGH OR HUNT FOR WILD ORCHID HONEY OF THE WESTERN GHATS . WYANAD HONEY OF THE WESTERN GHATS IS THE BEST ON THIS PLANET.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AS A CHILD MY MOTHER ENSURES WE HAD WILD WESTERN GHATS HONEY --THE HEALTHY HONEY FROM STINGING BEES --WHO COLLECT HONEY FROM WILD ORCHIDS FROM UNMOLESTED MOUNTAINS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://naturalfarmerskerala.com/stingless-honey-bee-or-cheruthen-eecha/</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>WILD STINGING BEE HONEY LASTS THOUSANDS OF YEARS </b></span>.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE PHAROAH OR EGYPT, KING SOLOMON OF ISRAEL IMPORTED HONEY FROM THE LAND OF PUNT/ OPHIR ( MALABAR --NORTH KERALA )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">GETTING RID OF DIVINE BEES FROM NORTH KERALA IS A ZIONIST CONSPIRACY .&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n<b></b><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<b>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"></span></b>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">THIS BLOGSITE HAS TOLD MODI AGAIN AND AGAIN-- &nbsp;CONSERVE THE WESTERN GHATS OF NORTH MALABAR. &nbsp; &nbsp;DO NOT ALLOW WIFI WHICH KILLS THE STINGING HONEY BEES OF WYANAD HILLS . &nbsp; &nbsp;THEY LOSE THEIR WAY AFTER COLLECTING HONEY</span></b></span></b></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">\n</span></b>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/queen-bee-and-darwin-capt-ajit.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/honey-quantum-food-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br />THE PERFECT HEXAGONAL LATTICE HIVES OF LARGE STINGING BEES IS PROOF OF GODs EXISTENCE -- &nbsp; IT IS SEEN ON THE NORTH POLE OF SATURN, THE GRAPHENE LATTTICE, THE BENZENE RING , THE ICE CRYSTAL FLAKE--<br /><br />THE MERGE OF SHIVA / SHAKTI AS A SIX POINTED STAR&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">PUT THIS COMMENT IN THE WEBSITES OF PMO, PM MODI, HEALTH MINISTER, ENVIRONMENT MINISTER, HOME MINISTER, EDUCATION MINISTER AND THE WEBSITES OF HINDUS STALWARTS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Below: The honey inside such hives collected by stinging bees is DIVINE&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-MUGVWahn8uU/WWsq90a4V2I/AAAAAAABUyk/eAe8w2zmZ3AJHMxDYl3cnNVTUHQFRVg5gCLcBGAs/s1600/hexagonal00xtal.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"292\" data-original-width=\"300\" height=\"389\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-MUGVWahn8uU/WWsq90a4V2I/AAAAAAABUyk/eAe8w2zmZ3AJHMxDYl3cnNVTUHQFRVg5gCLcBGAs/s400/hexagonal00xtal.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">Below: Scavenger bee ( stingless ) hive. &nbsp;The honey is useless and unhealthy</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
