text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dY_UJ1kyhm0/WWvBq_8G3yI/AAAAAAABUzM/4a4NB2s_BfE24cz7n-bGi7HSLbG6OWQ2gCLcBGAs/s1600/B_Id_386369ww_S_Sreesanth.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"441\" data-original-width=\"700\" height=\"402\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dY_UJ1kyhm0/WWvBq_8G3yI/AAAAAAABUzM/4a4NB2s_BfE24cz7n-bGi7HSLbG6OWQ2gCLcBGAs/s640/B_Id_386369ww_S_Sreesanth.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/travesty-of-justice-sreesanth-and.html\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/travesty-of-justice-sreesanth-and.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The following guidelines should be observed\nwhen using handcuffs:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">o A person should not\nbe handcuffed if he can be kept in custody without handcuffs (because of their\nage, gender or infirmity)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">o A person arrested for\na bailable offence should not be handcuffed (unless there is a special reason\nsuch as a belief that the person is likely to escape)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">o In court, an accused\nperson should not be handcuffed (except with the permission of the court)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">o Detainees who are\nunder trial and other accused should not be handcuffed (unless there is a\nreasonable expectation that he will use violence or attempt to escape. The\npolice escort must be strong enough to prevent escape.)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">o If a person is\nhandcuffed, the reasons for handcuffing must be set out in the Sentry Relief\nBook<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">o Under no\ncircumstances should handcuffs be used for a person who is aged, bed-ridden in\nhospital, a woman, a juvenile or a civil prisoner.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">o The case involves a\ngrave offence such as murder or rape (or other like offences) and it is\nnecessary to arrest the accused and bring his or her movements under restraint\nto give confidence to frightened victims<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">o The accused is likely\nto abscond and evade the processes of law<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">o The accused is given\nto violent behaviour and is likely to commit further offences unless his or her\nmovements are brought under restraint<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">o The accused is a\nhabitual offender and unless kept in custody he/she is likely to commit similar\noffences again<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The restriction on use of handcuffs is not to\nplace any embargo on use of minimum force to control a violent prisoner.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>WE ASK--<o:p></o:p></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>WHY WAS A BLACK BAG PUT ON SREESHANTS HEAD\nWITHOUT EYE HOLES ?<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>WAS HE A TERRORIST LIKE AJMAL KASAB ?<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>WE KNOW WHOSE IDEA THIS WAS .<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">BIG FISH GOT AWAY IN THE SORDID BETTING\nCIRCUS KNOWN AS IPL.</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The prisoners either\nconvicted or under trial and confined in a sub-jail shall not be handcuffed,\nwhenever they are taken out in the precincts of the sub-jail for food or other\nnecessities, rather the entire guard including the guard commander shall be present.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If there are more number of prisoners, the guard in-charge should inform the &nbsp;officer in-charge of the police station to\nsend two or three constables to assist the subjail guard during the period when\nthe prisoners are taken out. The officer in-charge of police station shall\nprovided extra manpower as required by the guard in-charge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Whenever, it is considered necessary to\nhandcuff certain prisoners confined in subjail, while they are taken out, the\nwritten orders of the Magistrate should be obtained and the permission granted\nby him should be maintained in a book to be kept by the guard officer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;With regard to a refractory, violent or\ndangerous prisoner, the officer in-charge of the sub-jail guard or the senior\nPolice officer present may control him only by utilizing more personnel and by\nsuch force as may be necessary, while rushing a messenger to the concerned court\nor Magistrate for permission to handcuff him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Under-trial-prisoners or accused persons in\nHospital should not be handcuffed without permission of the court. In no case\nshould prisoners or accused persons who are aged and bed ridden in hospital or\nwomen prisoners, juvenile prisoners or civil prisoners be handcuffed or\nfettered. If necessary extra guard should be provided.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Under-trial prisoners and other accused\npersons shall not be handcuffed and chained without specific permission of the\ncourt and only if there is a reasonable apprehension, either due to heinous\nnature of the crimes with which they are charged or from their character or\nbehaviour that such persons will use violence or will attempt to escape or that\nan attempt will be made to rescue them.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The same principle shall be applied to\nconvicts proceeding in public while in police custody. Whenever non-convicted\naccused persons are handcuffed with court's permission, the fact and the\nreasons for it shall be stated in the Station House general diary, the sentry\nrelief book, and in the remand diary forwarded to the Magistrate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/undertrial-prisoners-in-indian-remand.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/undertrial-prisoners-in-indian-remand.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\">TRAINING VIDEO ( COMPUERISED ) SOFTWARE MUST\nBE CREATED FOR THE POLICE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\">AT SEA WE MAKE IT COMPULSORY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\">THE OFFICER / CREW IS ALLOWED TO CHOOSE HIS\nSUBJECT .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nMay 14, 2017 at 11:36 AM<br />\n<br />\nZAKIR NAIK WAS ABLE TO CONVERT MANY HINDUS INTO ISLAM --AS HE MADE THE HINDU SELF LOATHING<br />\n<br />\nHE USED TO MALIGN LORD GANESHA<br />\n<br />\nZAKIR NAIK IS SO STUPID THAT HE DOES NOT KNOW THAT SHIVA/ PARVATI AND GANESHA ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES-- NOT MORTALS<br />\n<br />\nGHANA IS THE METHOD OF RECITING SRUTI ( VEDAS ) BACKWARDS \u2013 INDICATIVE OF MOBIUS PATH AND CURVED TRUNK<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">GANAPATI ON THE MICRO SCALE CONTROLS THE MOOLADHARA BANDHAN -- ONLY OF THIS KNOT IS OPEN CAN KUNDALINI RISE</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">GANESHAs MOTHER PARVATI ( SHAKTI ) RISES UP FROM MOOLADARA CHAKRA TO MEET HER HUSBAND SHIVA AT SAHASRARA CHAKRA ONLY IF HER SON OPENS THE DOORWAY</span></b><br />\n<br />\nLord Ganesha is mentioned in the Rig Veda (2.23.1) written in 5000 BC, as the Lord of Mantras and seer among seers.<br />\n<br />\nWhen I shifted to my new home , my wife got the Ganapathi Homam done. I remember staying overnight. The pujari came couple of hours before dawn and started his homam. Ganesha is also called Vighnesha, the lord who removes obstacles.<br />\n<br />\nGanesha is the son of Lord Shiva and his wife Parvati. As per lore Parvati removed anointed paste from here body during a bath, and gave it life. Then she showed off her handsome new baby to the other gods. Unfortunately, the god Shani (Saturn), who is said to have the evil eye, looked at him, causing the baby's head to be burned to ashes.The god Vishnu came to the rescue and replaced the missing head with that of an elephant.<br />\n<br />\nAll Ganesha statues kept at HOME, must show a broken tusk on the left side of Ganesha and the truck towards that side.<br />\n<br />\nThe white invader lied --that ganesha used the broken tusk was used by him to write the epic, Mahabharata.<br />\n<br />\nThe lore is that Ganesha in anger threw the left tusk at the naughty moon.<br />\n<br />\nThis is an allegory for keeping the distance between earth and moon is 108 times the diameter of the moon..and the tilt of the earth on its axis at the MACRO scale<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WHY DOES GANESHAs MOTHER SHAKI NEED TO RISE TO MEET HER HUSBAND SHIVA ?</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">IT IS ABOUT CREATION ?</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">ZAKIR HUSSIAN DOES NOT HAVE TE BRAINS NOR THE CHARACTER TO UNDERSTAND THIS</span></b><br />\n<br />\n4000 years ago Adi Shankaracharya wrote \u2013<br />\nShivah Shakthyaa Yuktho Yadi Bhavathi Shakthaha Prabhavithum<br />\nNa Chedevam Devo Na Khalu Kushalaha Sphandithumapi<br />\n<br />\nTranslation Verse No 1 : Shiva becomes capable of creating the Universe, only when united with Shakthi , but otherwise , He is incapable of even a stir.<br />\n<br />\nIn the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as being created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are permanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal aspects are called Shiva and Shakti.<br />\n<br />\nPurusha (SHIVA ) is the embodiment of pure consciousness, and Prakriti ( SHAKTI ) as the embodiment of pure energy.<br />\n<br />\nBoth Shiva and Shakti are Consciousness---- Shiva is the changeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active aspect of the same Consciousness.<br />\n<br />\nThrough uniting with Purusha , Prakriti gave form to his spirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS here- not street side sex as figured out by small minds)<br />\n<br />\nWhen the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the sentient Purusha , the universe evolves.<br />\n<br />\nPurusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle. Prakriti symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy<br />\n<br />\nThe cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. The relationship between say- Shakti and Shiva is the dance of consciousness and energy<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_7MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_7BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_7B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_8B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c491530060054313499\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_8M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also the agent of all change<br />\n<br />\nShakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is withdrawn into himself at the end of creation. This is for the perceptive.<br />\n<br />\nModern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy are interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy . In the highest planes they are interchangeable, which is why we see a great incongruence between our spiritual experiences and the external reality.<br />\n<br />\nIn the higher metaphysical realms and subtle planes of our consciousness the physical laws of our universe lose their validity.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">CHECK OUT THE IDIOT NAMED ZAKIR NAIK-- SEE HOW HE DENIGRATES GOD GANESHA .</span></b><br />\n<br />\nBADAN KA MAIL -- ZAKIR NAIK REFERS TO MENSES BLOOD<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TLnehHUBSdI</span><br />\n<br />\nNO MUSLIM TALKS LIKE THIS --<br />\n<br />\nCHRISTIANS DO THIS--NOT MUSLIMS<br />\n<br />\nMUSLIMS SAY --CONVERT OR DIE -- OR PAY JAZIYA TAX<br />\n<br />\nBUT THERE IS NO DENIGRATION OF GODS<br />\n<br />\nTODAY MUSLIMS OPENLY GO TO SHIVA TEMPLES AND WORSHIP THE BLACK STONE ( SHIVA LINGAM ). call Sir Syed PAAJI as one of their founding fathers.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHEY, WE INDIANS DO NOT CARE FOR THE COMMIE HISTORY WRITTEN BY ROMILA THAPAR AND IRFAN HABIB. WHATEVER LIES THEY WROTE WILL BE BURNT.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/11/noor-inayat-khan-new-mata-hari-reloaded.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/12/sir-muhammed-iqbal-knighted-for.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n..</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_10b+seedFaYiD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_10b+seedFaYiD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 5, BELOW--</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"background-color: lime; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In India it is almost\nimpossible to throw out tenants who have stopped paying rent\u2014telling the house owner\nto do his worst<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If landlords approach\nthe judiciary , things don\u2019t happen. &nbsp;&nbsp;They\nare forced to take the help of anti-social elements to throw out the tenants by\nforce and coercion. &nbsp;This is nothing else\nbut resorting to the rule of the jungle<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">EVEN NATIONAL BANKS\nRECOVER LOANS BY USING LOCAL GOONDAS.&nbsp; &nbsp; THIS IS THE PATHETIC STATE OF INDIA</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Out\nof this 243000 ( 2.43 lakh)&nbsp; soldiers\nwere killed.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-OGS-yoQNEDU/WWb9LSWo98I/AAAAAAABUvY/GN3K-tBOdjgqvmpQr4GMOEABJog4D3WugCLcBGAs/s1600/MDRUM99_Indian_Soldiers_in_WW1-7.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; &nbsp;THESE\nCHITPAVAN BRAHMINS WERE JEWS . &nbsp; &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">CHECK OUT THE &nbsp;EXTREME IRONY, -- &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">MORE\nMAHARS DIED THAT SIKHS IN WW1 AND WW2 &nbsp;\u2013 USED AS CANON FODDER --BUT\nHEY, THEY WERE NOT PHOTOGENIC .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">THIS\nEVENT HAS NEVER BEEN RECOGNIZED BY THE INDIAN GOVT.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: 18.6667px;\">Below: Manachira maidan Calicut. &nbsp; Calicut is the cradle of world civilization. &nbsp;The pool is a source of pristine drinking water to Calicut city today &nbsp;-- once the bathing pond of the King's palace women ( when Vasco Da Gama came in 1498 AD )</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: 18.6667px;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">MY\nFATHER IN RSS DID SURYA NAMASKAR IN THE SAME MANACHIRA MAIDAN CALICUT , AS\nTHESE MALABAR REGIMENT POLICE AT SUNRISE .&nbsp;</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Below: Calicut court and Malabar police -- &nbsp;these Kalari experts crushed the Moplah rebellion in 1921 ( half breed Arabs )</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5Dqr-rdnBiU/WWb3kvs013I/AAAAAAABUvM/2UdrXMPDvaUAF_oHtozPZ2Fb3QeB59NIgCLcBGAs/s1600/1-malaWWbar-rebellion-720x340.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1984, there were\nanti \u2013Sikh riots in Delhi in which about 3,000 persons were killed. The Delhi\nPolice, barring some very few honourable exceptions, remained a mute spectator\nto the carnage because the rioters were instigated by politicians of the ruling\nparty.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/4l-FoRDuunI/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/4l-FoRDuunI?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the Mutiny of\n1857, the British decided to revamp the Police Force. In the Police Act of\n1861, the British Government vested most powers with the Executive to control\nthe Police in a manner that the police were formed to protect the Government,\nand not the people. What is worrisome is that this Act is still in place,\ndespite progressive legislations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">1857 WAS A FALSE FLAG\nAND A HEGELIAN DIALECTIC .</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/murky-truths-of-sepoys-mutiny-1857.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/murky-truths-of-sepoys-mutiny-1857.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An average policeman\ndoes not know his Indian Penal Code, Code of Criminal Procedure and Indian\nEvidence Act well.&nbsp; He does not get\nchance to develop and refresh his professional skills in service. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He learns hands on and\nmakes terrible mistakes that have serious repercussions on justice delivery in\nthe society. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This must change . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even a police constable\nmust pass an exam from henceforth.&nbsp; He must\nattend regular courses and get upgradation certificates without which he cannot\ncontinue on duty..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you visit any police\nconstables quarters in India, you will be appalled at the living\nconditions.&nbsp; Indian police is in such a\npathetic state because there is no investment in basic infrastructure and human\nresource in policing. The police continue to lack basic amenities and support\nfor performing their duties.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Even police\nstations don\u2019t have a proper toilet and drinking water facilities.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>In courts\nyou have toilets . &nbsp; You can smell urine from 100 metres away. &nbsp; You see MeLords are more interested in slapping CONTEMPT OF JUDGE ( not court ) against hapless people.</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The average police personnel is over worked\nand lowly paid. There is no system where rest hours are monitored and recorded.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Clearly the\nestablishment- the political elite- does not have an interest in reforming the\npolice because control over it suits them.&nbsp;\nBut their convenience is against the interest of the society. While\ncommon man experiences persecution and legal injustice, our police are getting\ndehumanized and brutalized.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The police leadership must insist on greater\nresources for the internal security services from the political leadership to\ninject some oxygen to a listless body that the Indian police have become.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AS A SHIP CAPTAIN I\nINSPECT LIVING QUARTERS OF MY CREW AND OFFICERS REGULARLY.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; MY CREW WELCOMES THESE INSPECTIONS BECAUSE\nTHEY KNOW CAPTAIN HAS BONAFIDE INTENTIONS AND THAT HE IS A MAN WHO DEMANDS\nACCOUNTABILITY.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEY GET A SHOCK WHEN\nWITHIN 24 HOURS OF MY TAKING OVER COMMAND , THEIR TOILETS AND CABINS GET\nCLEANER. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN &nbsp;98 % &nbsp;OF\nMY FOREIGN COMPANY SHIPS&nbsp; , OFFICERS AND\nCREW HAVE TOLD ME&nbsp; IN MY FIRST\nMEETING&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; \u201cSIR, BEFORE YOU TOOK OVER\nCOMMAND&nbsp; THERE WAS NO MENU CARD ON THE\nTABLE , FOR YEARS \u201d .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After 70 years of\nindependence, we are still governed majorly by Indian Police Act (IPA) of 1861\nwhich was drafted as a direct consequence of the Revolt of 1857.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1902-03, a Police\nCommission was established for the Police reforms under Sir Andrew Frazer and\nLord Curzon with the sole aim of protecting Jew Rothschild\u2019s interests</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It recommended the\nappointment of Indians at officer level in the police. Indians could rise only\nto the ranks of Inspector of Police, the senior N.C.O. position. However they\nwere not part of Indian Imperial Police.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a deep-seated\nand strong resistance to the idea of police reforms. &nbsp;Politicians and bureaucrats have developed a\ngreat vested interest in retaining control over the police organization. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our bureaucracy is in\nthis pathetic condition because of a COLLEGIUM SYSTEM from JNU controlled by\nwhite Jews from abroad . &nbsp;&nbsp;Ex-JNU commie\nstudents turned babus have inflicted a thousand cuts on Bharatmata<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Read all 11 parts\nbelow-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/02/jnu-den-of-anti-nationals-and-communist.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/02/jnu-den-of-anti-nationals-and-communist.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Police in India, which is\nunder the control of ruling parties, are blind to corruption at various levels\nand is itself a major partner in the crime.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People in Tamil Nadu\nhave a general idea how MANNARGUDI MAFIA operates</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At&nbsp; the state level, senior Police officers are\npromoted to serve the \u2018needs\u2019 of the ruling party. To go \u2018slow\u2019 on certain\ncases, to thwart investigation, to \u2018deal\u2019 with political opponents, to \u2018handle\u2019\nunderworld businesses \u2013 police are needed for the politicians.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No politician in any\nstate is willing to let the police follow the law, or give the police\ninstitutional independence even though the Supreme Court has ordered states to\ndo this more than 10 years ago (in 2006, to be exact).&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In every state, the top levels of the police\nare manned by officers who are in tune with their political bosses.&nbsp; They know their jobs depend on pandering to\nwhat their bosses want, and not just by upholding the law. This must stop. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">POLITICIANS MUST NO\nLONGER EVALUATE POLICE AND WRITE THEIR APPRAISAL/ SERVICE REPORTS .&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">WE WANT EXPERTS WHO\nKNOW WHAT IT TAKES NOT SOME HYPED UP ( by benami media ) PARSI LAWYERS WHO LIVE\nIN IVORY TOWERS HAVE THEIR OWN PRIVATE AGENDA AND AXE TO GRIND &nbsp;</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Political control over\nthe police must be kept within legitimate bounds.&nbsp; Internal management systems must be fair and\ntransparent. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Public complaints must\nbe</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">addressed through an independent\nmechanism.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indian military\nmust provide the police forces with tested and dependable specifications on\nequipment and technology. They are generally dependent on vendors, who often\nsell outdated or not-so-suitable technology by giving kickbacks to ministers</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most state police forces\ncontinue to use obsolete equipment and arms, and lack the latest technology\nthat would help in investigation and intelligence-gathering.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Well-trained and\nmotivated human resources are key to any police force\u2019s success. But, most\ntraining academies are poorly staffed and often don\u2019t have the necessary\nfacilities. Institutions need to be upgraded in terms of facilities, equipment and\ntechnology to build up morale.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">BE VERY CLEAR\n\u2013TERRORISM MUST NOT BE HANDLED BY ORDINARY PANDU HAVALDARS&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IF STATE HOME MINISTERS\nOR POLITICIANS TRY TO INFLUENCE THE POLICE&nbsp;\nTO LIE OR HIDE THE TRUTH \u2013&nbsp; THERE\nMUST BE A REDRESSAL SYSTEM .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">FRIVOLOUS FIRs IN\nPOLICE STATIONS MUST BE AVIDED\u2014&nbsp; ALL THIS\nSTARTED AFTER THE TV SERIES OF \u201c SATYAMEVA JAYATE&nbsp; \u201c&nbsp; WHERE\nTHE PUBLIC WAS TOLD THAT NO POLICE STATION CAN REFUSE AN FIR.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span>\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MOST FIRs IN POLICE STATIONS ARE RELATED TO\nHUMAN EGO...</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">IF THE JUDGE FEELS HUMAN EGO IS INVOLVED\n,</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">THE CASE MUST BE THROWN OUT </span>IMMEDIATELY<span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;WITH A PUNISHMENT GIVEN TO THE PERSON WHO </span>LEVELED<span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;CHARGES.</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS CAUSED&nbsp;\nMANY WOMEN ( LIKE ROHTAK GYPSY SISTERS ) TO TAKE DOCTORED ( SELECTIVE )&nbsp; VIDEOS USING THEIR PHONES TO TAKE REVENGE ON\nMEN \u2013WITH NCW IN CAHOOTS .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">40% OF FIRs\nIN POLICE STATIONS ARE POWERED BY HUMAN EGO. ALL THIS WASTES THE TIME OF THE\nPOLICE AND THE COURTS .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CYBER CELLS OF\nPOLICE STATIONS HAVE BEEN USED BY CORRUPT POLICTIANS TO SUPPRESS THE TRUTH\n\u2013AGAIN WITH MEDIA IN CAHOOTS .. &nbsp; LAWS MUST BE CREATED TO PUNISH LYING BENAMI MEDIA\nWHO ARE IN THE PAYROLL OF FOREIGN DESH DROHIS</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Rohtak sisters viral video controversy involves a video\nthat went viral on the social media in India in late November 2014 and the\nevents that followed.[1] The first video showed two sisters (referred to as the\nRohtak sisters or the Sonepat sisters)[2][3] beating three young men with a\nbelt alleging that the men had harassed them. Soon, the video was being\nbroadcast by television channels.&nbsp;</span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The girls were praised by the media and given\nthe nickname <span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>\"bravehearts\".</b></span> After a second video emerged within a few\ndays, which showed them kicking another boy, the opinions began to shift\ntowards negative.[3] Six women claiming to be passengers on the bus had\ntestified in front of the police. They said it was not an issue of harassment,\nbut a dispute over seats as the girls had been occupying a seat allotted to a\nsick woman. A longer unedited video had been found on the internet, in which\nthe girls asked a third girl, who had filmed the incident on their phone, to\nreturn it. Later another man came forward and claimed that he had been\nsimilarly accused of molestation by the girls and he had to pay </span><span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri;\">\u20b9</span><span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">20,000 to have the charges\ndropped.[4]<o:p></o:p></span></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">On 8 December, the girls offered to undergo a narcoanalysis\ntest to prove that their version of the events were true.[5] The girls had\nfailed the polygraph test conducted on them, while the accused had passed\nit.[6] On 18 January, the girls made a complaint to Suman Dahiya,\nvice-chairperson of the Haryana State Commission for Women, saying that they\nwere being pressured to withdraw the case by authorities and that they were\nasked obscene questions during the polygraph test.[7] In May 2015, the sisters\ncomplained to the police that someone was posting morphed pictures of them on\nsocial media.[8]<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">The court delivered its judgement on 04 March 2017.[9][10]\nAll the charges were dismissed and the boys were held to be innocent.[11][12]\nThey were acquitted of all the charges against them.[13] [14]They had lost\nnearly three years of their life, apart from getting a bad name across the\nmedia. That same electronics media has completely ignored the court judgement\nand not a single TV program or news feature has been there for publicizing the\njudgement. This is in sharp contrast to the media mob which fell upon the\naccused boys at the time of the false allegations.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>BRAIN STORMING (\nINVOLVING EVEN LOWEST POLICE CONSTABLES ) IS A MUST TO CREATE POLICE REFORMS , INTRODUCE NEW LAWS TO DEAL WITH THE SCOURGE OF TERRORISM AND DELETE\nREDUNDANT LAWS .&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Perjury is one of the\nmain reasons of failures of prosecution cases in courts..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Read all 12 parts of\nthis unfinished post--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Police during\ninvestigation examines witnesses and record their statements. All or some of\nsuch witnesses are called for deposing before the court during the trial. At\nthe time of trial, in many cases, witnesses do not reveal the truth or turn\nhostile denying having ever made the statement to the police as recorded by\nthem.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This, instead of supporting the prosecution case, helps the accused. In\nsome cases, even the complainants who lodged F.I.R. change their stand refusing\nto support the case.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">There must be\nspecial witness rooms in every police station with a special colour on walls, &nbsp;every thing done under video camera. The\npunishment for bearing false witness must be long term jail. &nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However NO good samaritan who helped out in a\nroad accident must be harassed by the police or treated shabbily.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During a\ntrial if the court is&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">convinced that a\nwitness or a complainant is intentionally giving false information concealing\nthe facts, such court may record its findings and direct the prosecutor to\ninitiate action against such perjurers.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It must be ensured that\nthe witness is protected . Most witnesses turn rogue because their children\nare&nbsp; kidnapped or there is threat of acid\non face. &nbsp;&nbsp;It is high time we have intelligent judges who\ncan glean circumstantial evidence rather than trusting a unreliable witness.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Some\nRICH lawyers have their own set of witnesses staying in homes provided by these\nlawyers .&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>They have LYING witnesses for every occasion.&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;
