margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_74M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/police-reforms-in-india-much-more-with_12.html?showComment=1499959172492#c376699695722999338\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 13, 2017 at 8:49 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_74MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nTHE ENTIRE BENAMI MAINSTREAM MEDIA ( WHO ARE ON THE PAYROLL OF EVIL PHARMA ) ARE DOING HOOOO HAAAA ABOUT SCHOOL CHILDREN TAKING DRUGS IN INDIA<br />\n<br />\nTHEY CRY \" SCHOOL CHILDREN ARE TAKING METH, LSD, MARIJUANA, HEROIN, COCAINE ..<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />THE WHOLE IDEA IS TO CLUB NON-ADDICTIVE MARIJUANA ( CANNABIS/ GANJA / BHANG ) ALONG WITH DESTRUCTIVE AND ADDICTIVE KILLER DRUGS&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/10/say-no-to-plastics-human-suffering-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWE ASK MODI-- DO WE HAVE A HEALTH MINISTER WHO KNOWS HIS JOB ?<br />\n<br />\nHULLO JP NADDA -- WHAT ARE YOU UP TO ? &nbsp;DO YOU KNOW YOUR JOB ?<br />\n<br />\nWE WATCH<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Legality_of_cannabis_by_U.S._jurisdiction</span><br />\n<br />\nPUT THIS COMMENT IN THE WEBSITES OF PM MODI, PMO, LAW MINISTER, HEALTH MINISTER<br />\n<br />\nASK FOR AN ACK<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1996, Prakash Singh\n(a former Directors General of Police of the states of Assam and subsequently\nUttar Pradesh and finally Director General of the Border Security Force)\ninitiated a Public Interest Litigation (PIL) in the Supreme Court of India,\nasking the court to investigate measures to reform the police forces across\nIndia to ensure the proper rule of law and improve security across India.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nSupreme Court studied various reports on police reforms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2006, a bench of\nJustice Y.K. Sabharwal, Justice C.K. Thakker and Justice P.K.\nBalasubramanyan&nbsp; ordered the state\ngovernments to implement several reforms in police force.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The court sought to\nachieve functional autonomy to the police and enhanced police accountability\nthrough its directives. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The court\u2019s directives\nin a nutshell are:----<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Constitute a State\nSecurity Commission (SSC) to ensure that the state government does not exercise\nunwarranted influence or pressure on the police. SSC will also lay down broad\npolicy guideline and evaluate the performance of the state police.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ensure that the DGP is\nappointed through the merit-based transparent process and secure a minimum\ntenure of two years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even police officers on\noperational duties (Including Superintendents of Police in-charge of Districts\nand Station House Officer in-charge of a police station) are also provided\nminimum tenure of 2 years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Separation of\ninvestigative and law and order Functions of the police.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Set up a Police\nEstablishment Board to decide on transfers, postings, promotions and other\nservice related matters of police officers of and below the rank of Deputy\nSuperintendent of Police (DSP) and recommend the same for officers above the\nrank of DSP. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Set up Police\nComplaints Authority at state and district level to inquire into public\ncomplaints against police officers in cases of serious misconduct, including\ncustodial death, grievous hurt, or rape in police custody and at district\nlevels to inquire into public complaints against the police personnel below the\nrank of Deputy Superintendent of Police in cases of serious misconduct.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Set up National\nSecurity Commission at the Union level to prepare a panel for selection and\nplacement of Chiefs of the Central Police Organisations with a minimum tenure\nof two years<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the supreme court\norder came, the states quickly latched on to the part of it which said the\norder must be followed until new acts are passed. Thus states quickly passed\nnew acts in order to not to follow SC directions on police reforms<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Events since 2006 have\nbeen dismaying, with several State governments devising their own means to\ndilute and wholly sabotage what the SC had laid down. On the facade, the new\nPolice Acts appeared to be fully compliant but in fact, they were a ruse to\noutwit the court.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why we still\nsee DIGs and IGs being handed out a two-year tenure on paper, but given\nmarching orders midway.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A few States have made\nofficers temporarily in charge of the post of DGP without having to obey the SC\ndirection.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The judicial directions\nwere to be implemented by December 31, 2006. Subsequently, the time limit was\nextended till March 31, 2007. There has been considerable resistance to\nimplementing the directions. The political leadership and the bureaucracy are\nnot prepared to loosen their stranglehold over the police.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 2006 judgement rattled\nour politicians.&nbsp;&nbsp; They feared the loss\nof power and eight states (Andhra Pradesh, Gujarat, Punjab, Jammu &amp;\nKashmir, Karnataka, Maharashtra, Tamil Nadu and Uttar Pradesh) in an attempt to\nhold on to that power filed review petitions.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nHowever, all these petitions were dismissed by Supreme Court on Aug\n23rd, 2007.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since the order, 17\nstates have passed new Acts while 12 have issued executive orders. Almost none\nfollowed the SC order either in letter or spirit. These Acts, unfortunately,\nwere passed to circumvent the implementation of the court\u2019s directions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nstates took advantage of a provision in the judgement that its orders would be\noperative \u201ctill such time a new Model Police Act is prepared by the central\ngovernment and/or the state government pass the requisite legislation\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Following the 2006 SC\ndirectives, only half the states in the country have enacted new Police acts to\nreplace the colonial Police Act of 1861.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even so, most of these virtually allow\nchief ministers to pick police chiefs at their whims\u2014 officers with weak\nvertebrae, as Senkumar might say \u2014 instead of choosing them from\nUPSC-recommended panels. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On May 17th, 2008 the\nSC constituted a monitoring committee headed by Justice KT Thomas to oversee\nthe implementation of its directives. The committee in its report submitted in\n2010 said: \u201cpractically no state has fully complied with those directives so\nfar, in letter and spirit.\u201d&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It also expressed its \u201cdismay over the total\nindifference to the issue of reforms in the functioning of police being\nexhibited by the states\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In many states, the\ncomposition of State Security Commission is not independent of the political\ninfluence of ruling party. Most states have avoided having the opposition\nleader in the commission, and independent members were kept away.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Independence\nof DGP is of paramount importance. Many states have refused to give more than\none-year fixed tenure to DGP. Even reasons for his removal have been kept vague\nwith grounds ranging from public interest, administrative exigencies and\nincapacitation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Government of India has\nalso not shown sincerity in implementing the Court\u2019s directions. It has yet to\npass a Model Police Bill.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cNot a single state\ngovernment is willing to cooperate. What can we do?\u201d remarked then Chief\nJustice of India KG Balakrishnan, three years after the 2006 verdict. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">This CJI\nrose fast on SC quota\u2014 but he and his father were Christians. This is what our CJI chair is worth.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/11/altamas-kabir-worst-chief-justice-of.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/11/altamas-kabir-worst-chief-justice-of.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Read all 7 parts of the post below--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/foreign-funded-trojan-horse-ngos-pil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/foreign-funded-trojan-horse-ngos-pil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The judiciary is\nhelpless, because the law requires proof.. In many cases, upright officers are\ntransferred for looking too closely at criminal activities. Innocents are\nframed, the disadvantaged are intimidated and evidence goes missing from police\nlaboratories.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even in cases, which have become cause c\u00e9lebres\u2014such as the\nSheena Bora murder, the Malegaon blasts, the Jessica Lal killing , Sunanda\nPushkar Tharoor murder and others\u2014enough evidence was not collected.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The police should be\nmore than just the arm of the law, but a moral force to bring justice for all.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Police is an exclusive\nstate subject and the center has its limitations in this regard.&nbsp; After independence, some states came out with\ntheir own police acts.&nbsp; For example, the\nBombay Police act, 1951; the Kerala Police act 1960; the Delhi Police act,\n1978.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, all of these police\nacts were a replica of the Indian police act, 1861. This has in extreme\nsituations made the situation of guardian turning predator and the confidence\nof the people has come down.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">India's police continue\nto be governed by an archaic and colonial police law passed in 1861. The Indian\nConstitution makes policing a state subject and therefore the state governments\nhave the responsibility to provide their communities with a police service.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, after independence, most have adopted the 1861 Act without change,\nwhile others have passed laws heavily based on the 1861 Act.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In India almost all the\nwitnesses turn hostile. \u2026</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is experienced that day by day the tendency of\nturning hostile is developed among the prosecution witnesses. The reason behind\nit may be that the action against such hostile witnesses is not being taken. In\nserious offences like murders, the witnesses use to turn hostile easily and\nthey can change the fate of the case.&nbsp; Stringent\naction is required to be taken against such prosecution witnesses with a view\nto eradicate such tendency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, it is very\nrare that action is initiated for giving false evidence or information.\nConsequently, the evil of perjury has reached epidemic proportions. &nbsp;With a view to curbing the tendency of\nperjury, it is necessary to take prompt and deterrent action against those who\ncommit perjury. The police and the judiciary should not hesitate in initiating\naction against the perjurers<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">EVERY WITNESS WHO TURNS\nHOSTILE MUST COMPULSORILY UNDERGO A LIE DETECTOR TEST AND IN THE CASE OF\nHEINOUS CRIMES, &nbsp;A NARCO TEST</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/12/telgi-stamp-paper-scam-must-be-exhumed.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/12/telgi-stamp-paper-scam-must-be-exhumed.html</a></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2350 years ago,\nChanakya considered&nbsp; perjury as a very\nserious offence with severe punishment&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Benami media, and &nbsp;film producers in the payroll of foreign desh\ndrohis , should be warned to exercise restraint in projecting negative roles of\nthe police .&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Whenever feasible, action for anti-national activities (defamation\nof police force -- not crying Bollywood superstars ) must &nbsp;be taken\npromptly.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<b><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>WHY IS POLICE CORRUPT IN INDIA?<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>WHEN A POLICE CONSTABLEs DAUGHTER REFUSES TO\nGO TO COLLEGE BECAUSE HER CHAPPALS BROKE --</b></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>--AND THE COBBLER SAYS IT CANT BE MENDED\nANYMORE\u2014WHAT SHOULD HE DO ?</b></span></span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>GIVE POLICE A LIFE OF DIGNITY AND HONOUR</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>THIS IS THE FIRST STEP !</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THIS IS WHAT I DID ON MY SHIP AS A SHIP CAPTAIN-- </span><span style=\"color: red;\">RAISE THE MORALE&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>REST FOLLOWS LIKE MAGIC !</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-7plFp6yvoBE/WWjJd2YXvKI/AAAAAAABUwg/ELeCP5MZFJUvnzsRvqKZAs08OQB-6guYQCLcBGAs/s1600/dssownload.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"195\" data-original-width=\"259\" height=\"481\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-7plFp6yvoBE/WWjJd2YXvKI/AAAAAAABUwg/ELeCP5MZFJUvnzsRvqKZAs08OQB-6guYQCLcBGAs/s640/dssownload.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: Even my worst detractors at sea will vouch-- Captain ran ships with morale on the highest notch -- &nbsp;it can never ever be surpassed .&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">As soon as I came on board, crew and officers extended their contacts &nbsp;--&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">-- &nbsp;they knew for sure they can learn their job , they will get good food, &nbsp;there will be great joy at the workplace ( success , never failure ) &nbsp;--&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">-- they would triple their efforts&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XlhcTgDv7Qs/WWjIVe_om_I/AAAAAAABUwc/kKDUUJaMaKMUON5TK5_Amusl9SAVOzEngCLcBGAs/s1600/FIGHTER.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"691\" data-original-width=\"922\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XlhcTgDv7Qs/WWjIVe_om_I/AAAAAAABUwc/kKDUUJaMaKMUON5TK5_Amusl9SAVOzEngCLcBGAs/s1600/FIGHTER.JPG\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">CAPTAIN GAVE THEM DIGNITY -- &nbsp;HE SET THEIR SOULS ON FIRE--WHAT THEY WILL NOT DO FOR HIM ?</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-G-0fQPoO-nk/WWjL_87WRcI/AAAAAAABUwk/bNt5wEBhcbotJP8w_cY8i_NhPcyjQPPEACLcBGAs/s1600/DSCI0139.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"480\" data-original-width=\"640\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-G-0fQPoO-nk/WWjL_87WRcI/AAAAAAABUwk/bNt5wEBhcbotJP8w_cY8i_NhPcyjQPPEACLcBGAs/s640/DSCI0139.JPG\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ubXEhgqi8nE/WWjNKr_FsOI/AAAAAAABUwo/FzjYnv1IvJwFdHVIg4kU7SUmTHG-rWaeACLcBGAs/s1600/imagSDes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ubXEhgqi8nE/WWjNKr_FsOI/AAAAAAABUwo/FzjYnv1IvJwFdHVIg4kU7SUmTHG-rWaeACLcBGAs/s1600/imagSDes.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can\u2019t measure what\na patrolman standing on a cover or walking ( driving ) his beat has prevented.&nbsp; There is no product at the end of a\npoliceman\u2019s day.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With a view to\nimproving their image, the police personnel should also enhance their\nprofessional qualities, display transparency in their working, improve their\nbehaviour and change their attitude towards common people.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Special emphasis should\nbe given on training of policemen to keep them physically and mentally\nfit.&nbsp;&nbsp; Good service conditions including\nprovision for residential accommodation and reasonable salary to lead a\ndignified life can prevent policemen from adopting partisan and corrupt\nmethods.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every policeman has an\noriginal power vested in him.&nbsp;&nbsp; Once a\nlaw is passed by Parliament, no one can tell him how he should act in upholding\nit.&nbsp;&nbsp; No politician needs to guide him.&nbsp; The policeman is no one\u2019s servant, a\nprinciple which must be clearly understood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The policeman&nbsp; must use his own discretion in carrying out\nthe law.&nbsp;&nbsp; This means he must have basic\ncompetence and moral fibre.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The police is not the\nservant of anyone, save of the law itself.&nbsp;\nNo minister or politician can tell him&nbsp;\nhe must or must not prosecute this man or that one. \u2026He is answerable to\nthe law and the law alone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Japan, there is a National Public Safety\nCommission which is the apex body. It is insulated from political pressures and\neven the Prime Minister is not empowered to give it any directions.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the U.S., following the reforms carried\nout in the seventies political machines can no longer control American police\ndepartment nor can they protect police departments from public scrutiny.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Insulating the police\nfrom unlawful political interference requires serious and immediate\nattention.&nbsp; The investigating agency\nneeds to be relieved of extraneous pressures and the time is ripe to set\nup an independent agency which would be free of internal and external\npressures. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THE LOYALTY OF THE\nPOLICE MUST BE TO THE WATAN.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">THE\nPOLICE MUST REMAIN SUBORDINATE TO THE PM AND THE CENTRAL HOME MINISTER.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6951632667512393223\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_189M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/police-reforms-in-india-much-more-with_12.html?showComment=1500049701433#c6951632667512393223\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 14, 2017 at 9:58 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_189MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nIMPORTANT :<br />\n<br />\nIN MY POST ON NATURAL JUSTICE I HAD MENTIONED THAT FRIVOLOUS AND EGO MASSAGE CASES BY HIGH AND MIGHTY MUST BE SHIFTED FROM REGULAR COURTS TO LOK ADALATS\u2026.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">THE HIGH AND MIGHTY WHO HAVE FILED FRIVOLOUS CASES JUST WANT TO TROUBLE AND HARASS THE LOWLY UNDERDOG AND THEY DELIBERATELY WONT APPEAR FOR LOK ADALAT\u2026. THEIR AIM IS TO BLEED THE OTHER PARTY BY TAREEQ , PEH TAREEQ, PEH TAREEQ , FEES TO LAWYERS.</b></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">IN SUCH A SCENARIO\u2014 AFTER TWO CONSECUTIVE \u201c ABSENCE WHEN SUMMONED BY LOK ADALAT \u201c THE FRIVOLOUS EGO MASSAGE CASE MUST BE THROWN OUT AND CASE TERMINATED, WITH AN OFFICIAL WARNING NOT TO FILE SUCH FRIVOLOUS CASES IN FUTURE..</span></b></div>\n<br />\nREAD ALL 12 PARTS--<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/justice-cannot-be-blind-natural-justice.html</span><br />\n<br />\nPUT THIS COMMENT IN THE WEBSITES OF CJI, LAW MINISTER, ATTORNEY GENERAL, PMMODI, PMO, HOME MINISTER<br />\n<br />\nASK FOR AN ACK<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-WIdWLmhPh4Q/WWkCnZutd9I/AAAAAAABUw4/2u0reGDwi88dlERLyt5FTbzhr1MI1ZPsQCLcBGAs/s1600/mqdefAAault.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"180\" data-original-width=\"320\" height=\"225\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-WIdWLmhPh4Q/WWkCnZutd9I/AAAAAAABUw4/2u0reGDwi88dlERLyt5FTbzhr1MI1ZPsQCLcBGAs/s400/mqdefAAault.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In post-independence\nperiod, erection of large number of statues of national leaders and frequent\nincidents of their desecration result in law and order problems.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This forces the\nauthorities to deploy a large number of police force to guard such places or\npatrol such areas to prevent such incidents. &nbsp; Guarding BR Ambedkar statues\nitself costs immense manpower</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In addition to the\nabove, &nbsp;law and order duties for FAALTHU processions,\nmorchas, strikes, bandhs, etc. consume large number of police personnel who\ncould otherwise be deployed in crime prevention work.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Police don\u2019t even know\nwhat to do when a bandh call is state govt sponsored with associated vandalism</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Investigation\nand prosecution are two facets in the administration of criminal justice. &nbsp; The\nrole of Public Prosecutor is inside the Court, whereas investigation is outside\nthe Court. Involving the Public Prosecutor in investigation is unjudicious as\nwell as pernicious in law.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nlegal profession&nbsp; must&nbsp; shoulder serious responsibilities of helping the\njudiciary in reaching to the truth.&nbsp; This\ncalls for not merely a high level of learning but also good conduct.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The profession of a lawyer should be considered\nmore as an act of public service than as a business to make profits.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">We have\nseveral rich and famous lawyers of India representing desh drohis and rich\ncriminals. We know who these bastards are \u2013they have become high and mighty\npoliticians today<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It\nimposes a stringent code of ethics and a moral obligation on the members of the\nprofession to behave in a decent and honest manner.&nbsp; With the&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">growth\nof complexity of laws, opportunities and temptations , lawyers</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">depart from the path of right conduct.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">Most lawyers</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">have lost all sense of ethics .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Some\nlawyers let down their own clients for fame and fortune . Every rich lawyer (\nwho wore worn out hawai chappals , rode a bicycle and stayed in slums / chawls\nwhen they started their profession ) has a DIRTY secret.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">WHY DO\nYOU THINK I STARTED THE SANATANA DHARMA SERIES ( UNFINISHED SERIES PART 83\n)&nbsp; ?<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">HE\nWANTED ME TO EXPOUND MORE .</span>&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/04/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_29.html\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/04/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_29.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"top-ra\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"c2805900473302630869\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6VOqqm-hCbM/XCa06XjAUxI/AAAAAAABfL4/E3K2A6jHNG0XTf7_mZb9kjj9WxD3GwmzQCK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/02/mistakes-deliberate-or-inadvertant-in.html?showComment=1549168286941#c2805900473302630869\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 3, 2019 at 10:01 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nGAYATRI MANTRA HAS 24 SYLLABLES.<br />\n<br />\nWHEN RECITING GAYATRI MANTRA EACH SYLLABLE HAS AN ATTACHED MUDRA, EACH MUDRA IS DEDICTAED TO A MAHARISHI \u2013WHICH MAKES THE UTTERANCE SUPER-POTENT ..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS HAS NOT BEEN WRITTEN DOWN<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3O9kaTV45Oo</span><br />\n<br />\nNADIS ARE CHANNELS THROUGH WHICH PRANA FLOWS - MUDRAS DIRECT THE FLOW OF PRANA ..<br />\n<br />\nATTACHED WITH EACH MUDRA THERE ARE SUBTLE MOVEMENTS AND BREATHING PATTERNS INVOLVING NOSTRIL AIR FLOW ( SWARA YOGA ) AND DIAPHRAGM MOVEMENT ( MODULATING PHRENIC NERVES )<br />\n<br />\nIn the thorax, each phrenic nerve supplies the mediastinal pleura and pericardium.. Two phrenic nerves originates in the neck and passes down between the lung and heart to reach the diaphragm.<br />\n<br />\ninhalation through the mouth,<br />\nlengthening the neck,<br />\nlengthening the tongue,<br />\nlengthening the spine,<br />\nholding the breath in,<br />\ncompressing the trunk while holding the breath in,<br />\ntensioning nerves and acupuncture meridians,<br />\nbreathing through alternate nostrils,<br />\nholding the breath out, and<br />\nexpanding the chest while holding the breath out.<br />\n<br />\nTHE FIRST RISHI IS VISHWAMITRA .. THE LAST RISHI HAS BEEN HIJCKED AND CONVERTED TO FAKE YAJNAVALKYA BY JEW ROTHSCHILD.<br />\n<br />\nTHE DHARMA CHAKRA HAS 24 SPOKES ( CONVERTED TO ASHOKA CHAKRA BY JEW ROTHSCHILD )..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/gayatri-mantra-savitr-savitur-saraswati.html</span><br />\n<br />\n\u201cGayatri Chandhas\u201d (meter). This chandhas has 3 padas ( iambic dimeter lines ) and each pada has 8 syllables with a total of 24 syllables-- octosyllabic feet..<br />\n<br />\n\u0950 \u092d\u0942\u0930\u094d\u092d\u0941\u0935\u0903 \u0938\u094d\u0935\u0903 \u0964<br />\n\u0924\u0924\u094d\u0938\u0951\u0935\u093f\u0952\u0924\u0941\u0930\u094d\u0935\u0930\u0947\u0923\u094d\u092f\u0902\u0952<br />\n\u092d\u0930\u094d\u0917\u094b\u0951 \u0926\u0947\u0952\u0935\u0938\u094d\u092f\u0951\u0927\u0940\u092e\u0939\u093f \u0964<br />\n\u0927\u093f\u092f\u094b\u0952 \u092f\u094b \u0928\u0903\u0951 \u092a\u094d\u0930\u091a\u094b\u0952\u0926\u092f\u093e\u0951\u0924\u094d \u0965<br />\n<br />\n<br />\no\u1e43 bh\u016br bhuva\u1e25 sva\u1e25<br />\ntatsaviturvare\u1e47ya\u1e43<br />\nbhargo devasyadh\u012bmahi<br />\ndhiyo yo na\u1e25 prachoday\u0101t<br />\n\u2013 Rigveda 3.62.10<br />\n<br />\nTHE 24 SPOKE REPRESENTAIONS HAVE ALSO BEEN CORRUPTED BY THE WHITE INVADER TO INVOLVE MATERIAL NONSENSE LIKE MONEY, SUCCESS , MAINTENANCE, BHAKTI ( REPLACING SHRADDHA ) , SUPPRESSION , PRODUCTION,SWEETNESS, DEFENCE , PENANCE, SERVICE ETC<br />\n<br />\nTHE 24 SPOKES HAS 24 FEMALE DIETIES ( WOMENs EMPOWERMENT ) WHICH IS NONSENSE..<br />\n<br />\nTHE REAL 24 SPOKES OF DHARMA CHAKRA ARE\u2014<br />\nAnur\u0101ga (Love)<br />\nPar\u0101krama (Courage)<br />\nDhairya (Patience)<br />\n\u015a\u0101nti (Peace)<br />\nMah\u0101nubh\u0101vatva (Magnanimity)<br />\nPra\u015bastatva (Goodness)<br />\n\u015aradd\u0101na ( Shraddha )<br />\nAp\u012b\u1e0dana (Gentleness)<br />\nNi\u1e25sa\u1e43ga (Selflessness)<br />\n\u0100tmniyantran\u0101 (Self-Control)<br />\n\u0100tm\u0101havana (Self Sacrifice)<br />\nSatyav\u0101dit\u0101 (Truthfulness)<br />\nDh\u0101rmikatva (Righteousness)<br />\nNy\u0101y\u0101 (Justice)<br />\n\u0100n\u1e5b\u015ba\u1e43sya (Mercy)<br />\nCh\u0101ya (Gracefulness)<br />\nAm\u0101nit\u0101 (Humility)<br />\nPrabhubhakti (Loyalty)<br />\nKaru\u1e47\u0101vedit\u0101 (Sympathy)<br />\n\u0100dhy\u0101tmikaj\u00f1\u0101na (Spiritual Knowledge)<br />\nMahopek\u1e63\u0101 (Forgiveness)<br />\nAkalkat\u0101 (Honesty)<br />\nAn\u0101ditva (Eternity)<br />\nApek\u1e63\u0101 (Hope)<br />\n<br />\nEACH SPOKE ( SEED ) HAS A COLOUR AND SOUND WHICH IS FOUND ONLY IN THE LAND OF BHA-RA-TA.<br />\n<br />\nGayatri consists of 24 Syllables as follows:--<br />\n1st Line: Ta, sa, vi, tu, va, re, ny, ya - 8<br />\n2nd Line: Bha, go, De, va, ya, dhee, ma, hi - 8<br />\n3rd Line: Dhi, yo, yo, nah, ra, cho, da, ya - 8<br />\n__<br />\nTOTAL-- 24<br />\n<br />\nGAYATRI MANTRA ADDRESSES QUASAR ( SAVITUR ) \u2013 THE PRIMORDIAL LIGHT , OF BRILLIANCE MORE THAN A TRILLION SUNS .<br />\n<br />\nThe Puranas mention that only 24 rishis since antiquity have mastered the 24 mudras, and thus wielded the whole power of\u2014Gayatri Mantra.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2Cno3I1h9EU<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/pranayama-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html<br /><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n0IfmCagD0g</span><br />\n<br />\nQUASAR energy has to be drawn down to re-enforce the inner vision of Man<br />\n<br />\nGayatri is Brahmani in the morning, Vaishnavi at noon and Rudrani in the evening.<br />\n<br />\n\"Gayatri Chandasaam aham\": In Bhagawad Gita, Lord Krishna proclaims that He is Gayatri in Veda mantras.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" This energy exceeds the total of the light of all the stars within a galaxy. Quasars are the brightest objects in the universe<br />\n<br />\nBRAHMAsWIFE SARASWATI IS A QUASAR<br />\n<br />\nSHIVA WIFE PARVATI IN HER DESTRUCTIVE MODE ( KALI ) IS A BLACK HOLE<br />\n<br />\nWho knows now and who can declare the paths that lead to the God; only their lower habitations are visible, who dwell in regions of supreme mystery. Rig Veda III.54.5<br />\n<br />\nAccording to the Vedas penned down 7000 years ago ( 400 centuries on oral rute ) life on Earth is under the rule of vast cosmic forces that originate from the stars.<br />\n<br />\nWe are so involved in the transient events of our personal lives that we miss these great powers altogether. Like fish, we fail to see the ocean. However the Maharishis seers who heard the SRUTIS knew it<br />\n<br />\nAccording to Vedic astrology, the light from this galactic source QUASARS has a special influence upon Earth. It nourishes and sustains intelligence in human beings.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WHY WE CALL SARASWATI THE GODDESS OF LEARNING<br />\n<br />\nIn Japan Saraswati is called Benzaiten<br />\n<br />\ntv\u00e9 v\u00ed\u015bv\u0101 sarasvati, \u015brit\u0101\u0301 y\u016b\u1e41\u1e63i devy\u0101\u0301m |<br />\n\u015bun\u00e1hotre\u1e63u matsva, praj\u0101\u0301\u1e41 devi didi\u1e0d\u1e0dhi na\u1e25 |17| RIG VEDA 2-41-17 5000 BC<br />\n<br />\nIn you the divine, O Sarasvati, all forms (or, energies) of life are set. Take delight in the Shunahotras (in us, who have joy in the sacrifice); O Goddess bestow progeny (inner offspring) on us. (17)<br />\n<br />\n\u201cAmong the Mantras I am The Gayatri\u2019 Bhagavad Gita 4000 BC.<br />\n<br />\nAUM BHOOR BHUWAH SWAHA,<br />\nTAT SAVITUR VARENYAM<br />\nBHARGO DEVASAYA DHEEMAHI<br />\nDHIYO YO NAHA PRACHODAYAT.<br />\n<br />\n\u0950 \u092d\u0942\u0930\u094d\u092d\u0941\u0935: \u0938\u094d\u0935: \u0924\u0924\u094d\u0938\u0935\u093f\u0924\u0941\u0930\u094d\u0935\u0930\u0947\u0928\u094d\u092f\u0902 \u0964 \u092d\u0930\u094d\u0917\u094b \u0926\u0947\u0935\u0938\u094d\u092f \u0927\u0940\u092e\u0939\u093f, \u0927\u0940\u092f\u094b \u092f\u094b \u0928: \u092a\u094d\u0930\u091a\u094b\u0926\u092f\u093e\u0924\u094d \u0964\u0964<br />\n<br />\nSAVITUR IS QUASAR ( SOURCE )<br />\nOm Bhur Bhuvah Svaha<br />\nTat Savitur Varenyam<br />\nBhargo Devasya Dhimahi<br />\nDhiyo Yo Nah Prachodayat<br />\n<br />\nSyllable Translation<br />\n<br />\nOm: Para Brahman<br />\nBhur: The Physical plane<br />\nBhuvah: The Astral plane<br />\nSvaha: The Celestial plane<br />\nTat: Ultimate Reality<br />\nSavitur: The Source<br />\nVarenyam: Fit to be worshiped<br />\nBhargo: The Spiritual effulgence<br />\nDevasya: Divine Reality<br />\nDhimahi: We meditate<br />\nDhiyo: Intellect<br />\nYo: Which<br />\nNah: Our<br />\nPrachodayat: Enlighten<br />\n<br />\nGoddess Saraswati (saras = fluid, wati = easily, i.e. easily flowing energy) has the ability to bring into manifestation the concept of Creation thought by Brahma in his thoughts.<br />\n<br />\nThe words (or Vach) spoken by Brahma to create the universe is indeed Saraswati!<br />\n<br />\nThis is the first time it is being told after the death of Adi Shankaracharya 4000 years ago<br />\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO 50.7 %<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_109b+seedJpjD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_109b+seedJpjD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THOUGH\nSHIVA IS THE DESTROYER, &nbsp;HIS WIFE PARVATI\nIN THE FORM OF KALI IS THE ULTIMATE DESTROYER &nbsp;\u2013 &nbsp;THE BLACK\nHOLE <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THOUGH\nBRAHMA IS THE CREATOR, &nbsp;HIS WIFE\nSARASWATI IS THE </span><span style=\"color: red;\">QUASAR</span><span style=\"color: purple;\"> &nbsp;( </span><span style=\"color: red;\">SAVITR</span><span style=\"color: purple;\"> OF\nGAYATRI MANTRA ) &nbsp;.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">SAVITR\nIS THE SOURCE OF VEDAS</span><span style=\"color: purple;\"> , WHICH OUR MAHARISHI SEERS &nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">DOWNLOADED INTO THEIR GREAT\nMINDS AS SRUTIS , THE WORD OF GOD</span></b></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">VEDAS\nWENT ON ORAL ROUTE FOR 330 CENTURIES BEFORE BEING PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Savitr has a major role\nin creation of the cosmos<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With the blessings of\nLord Brahma, &nbsp;Savitr &nbsp;gave the four Vedas to mankind - &nbsp;by way of exquisite SRUTI\nVERSES in Sanskrit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Gayatri Mantra has\na Vedic metre of 24 syllables.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Bhagavad Gita (Ch.\n10. 35), Lord Krishna states 6000 years ago :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brihat saama latha\nsaamnaam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gayatri chandasaam aham<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Among the hymns, I am\nthe Brihat saama , Of the poetry, I am the Gayatri verse sung daily by the\ninitiated<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\" Om Stut\u00e4 May\u00e4\nVard\u00e4, Vedam\u00e4t\u00e4 Prachodayant\u00e4m <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">P\u00e4vm\u00e4ni Dwij\u00e4n\u00e4m, \u00c4yuh,\nPr\u00e4nam, Praj\u00e4m, Pashum, <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">K\u00efrtim, Dravinam,\nBrahmvarchasam <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mahyam Dattw\u00e4 Brajata\nBrahmlokam || \"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;That \"G\u00e4yatr\u00ef bestows good health,\nvitality, longevity, wealth with grace, glorious success, co-operation, love,\nintellectual elevation and divine culmination of the self\" --- can be\nverified by everybody by sincerely practicing G\u00e4yatr\u00ef S\u00e4dhan\u00e4 in day-to-day\nlife with intrinsic faith\u2026.. Nothing could be more authentic then\nself-experience\u2026..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gayatri is the\npresiding deity of the morning prayer and rules over the Rigveda and the Garhapatya\nfire<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Savitr is celebrated in\neleven whole hymns of the Rig Veda and in parts of many others. &nbsp;&nbsp;Savitr is mentioned about 170 times in\naggregate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Savitr is not the sun\nas told and written by every Hindu stalwart and millions of people since Adi\nShankaracharya died 4000 years ago.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sun is a minuscule and insignificant part\nof this cosmos-- Vedas rise far above&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a total disgrace\nthat a blogger has to reveal this in the year 2017&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A quasar is an active\ngalactic nucleus of very high luminosity.</span> &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nQ<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">uasar is the mother figure\nof stars such as our own Sun. &nbsp;They were\nthe Suns of the primordial Universe. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A quasar is trillions\nof times more brilliant than the sun \u2013 in as much as this light emitted from a\nQuasar &nbsp;is far more than the speed of\nlight.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Quasars give off more\nenergy than &nbsp;hundreds of normal galaxies\ncombined. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;They\nare the most distant object detected in the universe to date. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Because quasars are so\nbright, we can see them all the way across the universe,</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
