text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=knNhT67DnMM<br />\n<br />\nHEY , JEWS ARE GIVING AWAY QUANTUM THEORY TO EINSTEIN<br />\n<br />\nALBERY EINSTEIN WAS AN IDIOT-- VERY POOR IN MATH---WHO WAS PROPPED UP BY ROTHSCHILD TO SHOW THAT JEWS ARE INTELLIGENT<br />\n<br />\nEVERY THEORY OF ALBERT EINSTEIN FOR WHICH HE BECAME FAMOUS IS LIFTED FROM VEDAS<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/yellapragada-subbarow-nobel-prize-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWIKIPEDIA WONT GIVE CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL A PAGE BECAUSE I HAVE WRITTEN AT LEAST 50 TIMES ABOUT \"FASTER THAN LIGHT \" COMMUNICATIONS<br />\n<br />\nTHE FIRST SET OF QUANTUM PHYSICISTS WHO KNEW SANSKRIT AND VEDAS--ALL CONVERTED INTO HINDUISM, THREW AWAY THEIR BIBLES AND GOT THEMSELVES CREMATED<br />\n<br />\nVEDAS CONFIRM THAT COMMUNICATIONS CAN HAPPEN FASTER THAN LIGHT--AND VEDAS HAVE NOT BEEN PROVED WRONG YET .<br />\n<br />\nTHE CONCEPT OF MAYA --WAS USED BY THE WHITE AN TO PROVE THAT HINDUS ARE SUPERSTITIOUS-- WELL MAYA IS JUST QUANTUM PHYSICS<br />\n<br />\nAt the closing of Mahabharata, seeing his enemies in heaven and his own family in hell Yudhishthira starts shouting at Krishna ( WHAT THE FUCK ) and condemning his perverted sense of justice.<br />\n<br />\nThis was the last way station before he entered Sakina, the Great Peace at the heart of the Godhead.<br />\n<br />\nSo the keeper of the last dwelling , the 7th astral layer, said to Yudhishthira:<br />\n<br />\n\u201cStop shouting! You have known neither paradise nor hell. Here there is no happiness, no punishment, no family, no enemies. Rise in tranquility. Here words end, like thought. This was your last illusion- the veil of MAYA is now lifted .\u201d<br />\n<br />\nTHE SHALLOW MIND OF THE WHITE MAN CANNOT UNDERSTAND WHAT I WROTE ABOVE<br />\n<br />\nThe philosophy of ancient India is quite diverse and complex in structure. So complex, in fact, that almost all have given up on making sense of this kaleidoscope\u2014till Quantum physics came on the scene.<br />\n<br />\nYet since the advent of quantum physics reveals that Vedanta is beyond the cutting edge of physics, which is only now, discovering the illusory nature of physical reality and the existence of subtler energy and information currents behind all that we see.<br />\n<br />\nVedanta is the very science of consciousness at both human and cosmic levels. It recognises consciousness as the ultimate reality and affirms its presence in all existence.<br />\n<br />\nModern physicists have looked to Vedanta for understanding their proposed unitary field of consciousness behind the universe, to explain the coherence of all cosmic laws and understand the THEORY OF EVERYTHING represented by the divine geometry of Sri Yantra ( the geometry of OM)<br />\n<br />\nVedanta is the unitary philosophy explaining the oneness of the individual soul with the universal consciousness.<br />\n<br />\nSuperluminal communication is a hypothetical process in which information is sent at faster-than-light (FTL) speeds. If wormholes are possible, then ordinary subluminal methods of communication could be sent through them to achieve superluminal transmission speeds<br />\n<br />\nOn the surface Quantum Physics (QP) and Vedanta may look very different. One is part of the scientific tradition and the other in some ways is philosophy soaked in spirituality.<br />\n<br />\nScience is trying to understand the universe \u2018out there\u2019 and Vedanta addressed the universe \u2018inside you\u2019\u201d<br />\n<br />\nOne of the fundamental difference between western philosophy, with that,of Vedanta is that ,the western philosophy believe the universe and everything in the universe belongs to god.<br />\n<br />\nOn the other hand Vedanta philosophy believe that god himself present in each and every atom of this creation ,god is present not only in human, but even in animals ,plants , rocks ,stars planets atom and molecules.<br />\n<br />\nTo a Vedantic every part of this universe is dynamic, it is vibrating, it is listening and can respond according to ones KARMA, It can be by action and can be purely thought. The universe listens to our action as well as thought and gives in return what exactly we want either knowingly or unknowingly, weather it is bad or good.<br />\n<br />\nThe scientific tradition is about Science of object. And Vedanta is called science of consciousness or science of subject. And is not a philosophy<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_9BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_9b+seedEdduD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_6T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_9b+seedEdduD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_6TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_6TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_6TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_9b+seedEdduD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_9b+seedEdduD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_6TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_6TN\"></span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_6TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_9b+seedEdduD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_6B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7603640773661651980\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_6M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_30.html?showComment=1514595060183#c7603640773661651980\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">December 30, 2017 at 6:21 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_6MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nMundaka Upanishad says: \u201cJust as a spider projects its own web and then re-absorbs it into its own body, so also That One Reality projects this variegated universe and then absorbs it back into it.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nSanatana Dharma views the universe as an inseparable web, whose interconnections are dynamic and not static, the cosmic web is alive; it moves and grows and changes continually.<br />\n<br />\nModern physics, too, has come to conceive of the universe as such a web of relations and, like Vedanta, has recognized that this web is intrinsically dynamic. The dynamic aspect of matter arises in quantum theory as a consequence of the wave-nature of subatomic particles.<br />\n<br />\nTalking about the Quantum Physics we stumbled upon the most bizarre result of quantum theory came when Bell\u2019s theorem and subsequent experiments proved the so called entanglements to be right. In such cases, two or more atoms, electrons or photons demonstrate correlated properties even at distances where no communication is possible between them during the given time.<br />\n<br />\nThese developments are the most important developments in the history of physics and perhaps in the whole of science. They give rise to the idea of the interconnected wholeness of the world and non-local interactions in contrast to the separate identities with local interactions.<br />\n<br />\nThe Kerala school of math used math as a spiritual activity \u2013based on which astrology thrived. They used math as a most subtle and rigorous form of thought.<br />\n<br />\nBoth Pythagoras and Plato studied in the Kerala school of Math at Kodungallur university and they introduced this concept to the west without really understanding the depth<br />\n<br />\nEven today, the modern mind has NOT reached the bottom of the ancient Indian sage\u2019s mind.<br />\n<br />\nThe white historian must know that ENTIRE Greek philosophy was stolen from Indian philosophy written 4500 years earlier.<br />\n<br />\nGreeks never really understood the real essence of profound subjects like Epistemology, though Indian sages taught them in their own lands. Pythagoras ( died 495 BC ) and Plato studied in India. Aristotle lifted from Vedanta material taken out of India<br />\n<br />\nPlato ( died 348 BC ) , a homosexual shared his stolen from Kodungallur University spoils with his mentor Socrates ( died 399 BC ) , and fellow homosexual side kick Aristotle ( died 322 BC ) and got himself immortalized as the founder of the Academy in Athens, the first institution of higher learning in the Western world.<br />\n<br />\nAristotle, Socrates and Plato were hardcore homosexuals . Aristotle initiated Alexander the great into homosexuality.<br />\n<br />\nQuantum Teleportation ( mentioned in Vedas ) has been achieved. Scientists from China recently set the record for the farthest quantum teleportation ever, when they beamed a photon in its quantum state into orbit. This brings several quantum mechanical concepts into the equation, including quantum entanglement.<br />\n<br />\nTeleportation is a verification of Quantum Entanglement<br />\n<br />\nAction at a distance implies that a physical object can be moved by non-physical means, so not by touch or physical force. With entanglement, it means that either information is travelling FAR FAR faster than the speed of light ( VEDAS SAYS IT IS INSTANTANEOUS )<br />\n<br />\nWorldview paradigms are changing, yet old scientific dogma ( THANKS TO THE CUNT POPE ) still sticks around and dominates.<br />\n<br />\nQuantum entanglement\u2014 physics at its strangest \u2014 ( written down in Vedas 7000 years ago ) has moved out of this world and into space.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/quantum-entanglement-video-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nA team of Chinese physicists sent eerily intertwined quantum particles from a satellite to ground stations separated by 1200 kilometers, smashing the previous world record.<br />\n<br />\nThe result is a stepping stone to ultrasecure communication networks and, eventually, a space-based quantum internet.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_6MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_6BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_6B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_7B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2849351715198825203\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_7M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_30.html?showComment=1514595161341#c2849351715198825203\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">December 30, 2017 at 6:22 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_7MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\nEntanglement involves putting objects in the peculiar limbo of quantum superposition, in which an object's quantum properties occupy multiple states at once<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/schrodinger-father-of-quantum-physics.html</span><br />\n<br />\nPhysicists have entangled particles such as electrons and photons, as well as larger objects such as superconducting electric circuits.<br />\n<br />\nTheoretically, even if entangled objects are separated, their precarious quantum states should remain linked until one of them is measured or disturbed. That measurement instantly determines the state of the other object, no matter how far away. The idea is so counterintuitive that IDIOT Albert Einstein mocked it as \"spooky action at a distance.\"<br />\n<br />\nIn 2015, the most sophisticated of these tests, which involved measuring entangled electrons 1.3 kilometers apart, showed once again that spooky action is real.<br />\n<br />\nBeyond the fundamental result, such experiments also point to the possibility of hack-proof communications.<br />\n<br />\nLong strings of entangled photons, shared between distant locations, can be \"quantum keys\" that secure communications. Anyone trying to eavesdrop on a quantum-encrypted message would disrupt the shared key, alerting everyone to a compromised channel.<br />\n<br />\nPSSSSTTT-- BEFORE CHINA INVENTS THE QUANTUM SATELLITE--WE MUST BREAK THE NATION INTO 4 PARTS AND HAVE TIBET AS A NEIGHBOUR<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nEntangled photons degrade rapidly as they pass through the air or optical fibers. So far, the farthest anyone has sent a quantum key is a few hundred kilometers.<br />\n<br />\nOnce you have satellites distributing your quantum signals throughout the globe, you've done it,--You've leapfrogged all the problems you have with losses in fibers.<br />\n<br />\nJian-Wei Pan, a physicist at the University of Science and Technology of China in Shanghai, got the chance to test the idea when the Micius satellite, was launched in August 2016. The satellite is the foundation of the $100 million Quantum Experiments at Space Scale program<br />\n<br />\nBell's theorem is a \"no-go theorem\" that draws an important distinction between quantum mechanics (QM) and the world as described by classical mechanics<br />\n<br />\nIn its simplest form, Bell's theorem states: No physical theory of local hidden variables can ever reproduce all of the predictions of quantum mechanics.<br />\n<br />\nBell's theorem is the most profound discovery of science.and it is lifted straight out of the Vedas<br />\n<br />\nThere is no need for a faster-than-light signal to tell particle A what measurement has been carried out on particle B, because the universe, including particle A, already 'knows' what that measurement, and its outcome, will be.<br />\n<br />\nLOT OF MY DETRACTORS WERE GUFFAWING LIKE DONKEY WHO HAVE SEEN FRESH SHIT WHEN THEY HEARD THAT MY WIFE MATCHED MORE THAN 500 HOROSCOPES FOR MY ELDER SONs BRIDE<br />\n<br />\nBell\u2019s theorem and subsequent experiments proved the so called entanglements to be right. In such cases, two or more atoms, electrons or photons demonstrate correlated properties even at distances where no communication is possible between them during the given time.<br />\n<br />\nThese developments are the most important developments in the history of physics and the whole of science. They agree with Vedanta. They give rise to the idea of the interconnected wholeness of the world and non-local interactions in contrast to the separate identities with local interactions.<br />\n<br />\nIn their first experiment, the Chinese team sent a laser beam into a light-altering crystal on the satellite. The crystal emitted pairs of photons entangled so that their polarization states would be opposite when one was measured.<br />\n<br />\nThe pairs were split, with photons sent to separate receiving stations in Delingha and Lijiang, 1200 kilometers apart. Both stations are in the mountains of Tibet, reducing the amount of air the fragile photons had to traverse., the team reports simultaneously measuring more than 1000 photon pairs.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 4--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_7MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_7BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_7B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_8B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5265314992318285551\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_8M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_30.html?showComment=1514595226017#c5265314992318285551\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">December 30, 2017 at 6:23 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_8MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 3-<br />\n<br />\nThey found the photons had opposite polarizations far more often than would be expected by chance, thus confirming spooky action over a record distance<br />\n<br />\nThe team had to overcome many hurdles, including keeping the beams of photons focused on the ground stations as the satellite hurtled through space at nearly 8 kilometers per second.<br />\n<br />\nPan baby's team recovered only about one photon out of every 6 million sent from the satellite\u2014far better than ground-based experiments but still far too few for practical quantum communication.<br />\n<br />\nPan expects China's National Space Science Center to launch additional satellites with stronger and cleaner beams that could be detected even when the sun is shining. (Micius operates only at night.)<br />\n<br />\nIn the next 5 years we plan to launch some really practical quantum satellites, Pan baby says \u2013and I believe him<br />\n<br />\nIn the meantime, Pan baby plans to use Micius to distribute quantum keys to Chinese ground stations, which will require longer strings of photons and additional steps.<br />\n<br />\nThen he wants to demonstrate intercontinental quantum key distribution between stations in China and Austria, which will require holding one half of an entangled photon pair on board until the Austrian ground station appears within view of the satellite.<br />\nPan baby also plans to teleport a quantum state\u2014a technique for transferring quantum-encoded information without moving an actual object\u2014from a third Tibetan observatory to the satellite.<br />\n<br />\nMY ELDER SONs CODING PARTNER IS A CHINK--HE SAYS IS VERY INTELLIGENT<br />\n<br />\nEuropean and U.S. teams are also proposing putting quantum instruments on the International Space Station. One goal is to test whether entanglement is affected by a changing gravitational field, by comparing a photon that stays in the weaker gravitational environment of orbit with an entangled partner sent to Earth.<br />\n<br />\nThere are not many experiments which test links between gravity and quantum physics.<br />\n<br />\nThe implications go beyond record-setting demonstrations: A network of satellites will soon connect the quantum computers being designed in labs worldwide.<br />\n<br />\nAgain --quantum entanglement, one of the odder aspects of quantum theory, links the properties of particles even when they are separated by large distances. When a property of one of a pair of entangled particles is measured, the other \"immediately\" settles down into a state compatible with that measurement.<br />\n<br />\nSo how fast is \"immediately\"?<br />\n<br />\nAccording to research by Prof. Juan Yin and colleagues at the University of Science and Technology of China in Shanghai, the lower limit to the speed associated with entanglement dynamics \u2013 or \"spooky action at a distance\" \u2013 is at least 10,000 times faster than light.<br />\n<br />\nVedas says INSTANTANEOUSLY<br />\n<br />\nNiels Bohr, one of the prime developers of quantum theory, once said that those who are not shocked when they first encounter quantum theory cannot possibly have understood it. Eighty years later, this is still true, and applies even to those of us who first encountered quantum theory decades ago.<br />\n<br />\nVEDAS SAYS THAT DARK MATTER ( KALI ) HAS SPEED TOO.<br />\n<br />\nDark matter is a constant sea of matter traveling the opposite direction in the timeline, only appearing for a moment, travelling beyond light-speed, exerting gravity.<br />\n<br />\nGravity is the result of an amount of matter pulling itself together, to create compressive force toward the center, which curves all energy paths both directions in the 4th dimension The closer to center-of-gravity, the faster energy moves, hence the inward pull of gravity. The gravity \u201cfield\u201d is the area where spacetime tries to even itself out.<br />\n<br />\nLIGHT FROM QUASARS ( SARASWATI ) IS FASTER THAN LIGHT .<br />\n<br />\nCUNT Isaac Newtons \"isolated systems \" are NOT found in nature. He did NOT understand what he presented to the world as 99% of his work , including calculus was stolen from 6000 year old Vedic era books.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_8B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4933770657494039661\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: medium; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_18M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Much of this inter-cellular signaling is electrochemical in nature<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">With up to 100 trillion cells it is hard to imagine how that many cells can remain in harmony by the slow process of electrochemical signaling especially under times of great distress when survival of the entire organism is at stake and / or requires extremely rapid and coordinated responses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Epigenetics which is the study of the mechanisms by which the environment influences cells and their offspring without changing genetic codes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Inter-cellular communication is especially critical in embryonic development. From a single fertilized egg, the embryo divides thousands of times and each time producing identical offspring cells called stem cells. Then at some critical point when the embryo has reached a certain size, something truly miraculous happens.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">CONTINUED TO 4--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">CONTINUED FROM 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Cells begin to differentiate and form groups of like cells that will eventually become all the highly specialized tissues and organs that make up the human body. Out of the entire mass of undifferentiated cells making up the embryo, how does a particular stem cell suddenly know that it is to transform into a heart cell, liver cell, neuron, etc?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Clearly, some of the differentiation results from electrochemical signaling with the immediate surrounding cells. This exchange is certainly necessary and provides information about how a cell must change to express itself correctly to become the right type of cell at the right place and at the right time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">In higher organisms with brains, the massively parallel processing capabilities of the brain structures are capable of simultaneously resonating with QUANTUM HOLOGRAM information at an incredible range of frequencies<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">AKASHIK RECORD of Vedas described as an all pervasive foundation that contains not only all knowledge of the human experience but also the entire history of the universe. Our normal five senses cannot access this information but it can be accessed through spiritual practices such as meditation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">We live in a universe that operates according to the following principles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">It is:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Self-organizing - All non living and living matter seems to be the result of the emergent complexity adapting and evolving in response to changes in the environment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Intelligent - The universe utilizes information, processes it and assigns meaning to it. It seems to evaluate new experiences against stored information and \"chooses\" actions based on that evaluation based on feedback mechanisms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Creative - All matter in the universe appears to be interconnected and communicates with itself to continually form more complex systems. These systems seem to regulate and organize themselves in ways that are flexible, adaptable and exhibit some form of purposeful behavior.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Interactive - All matter continually interacts with all other matter. There is no such thing as independent action. Everything is defined in relationship to everything else.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Learning - Experience is retained in nature\u2019s memory, the Quantum Hologram. The exchange of information between any two objects occurs instantaneously no matter their space time separation and these interconnections cannot be shielded or attenuated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2289545902881016127\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_98M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_20.html?showComment=1538102659197#c2289545902881016127\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 28, 2018 at 8:14 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_98MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NARENDRA DAMODARDAS MODI-- HAS STOOD IN THE SHADOWS AND USED THE COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY TO STRIKE AT THE ROOTS OF THE SACRED INSTITUTION OF MARRIAGE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN SANATANA DHARMA NO MAN CAN PERFORM A YAGNA WITHOUT HIS WIFE.. A WIDOWER OR A BACHELOR CANNOT PERFORM A YAGNA..</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">Marriage ( vivaha ) is known as \"saha-dharma-carini-samprayoga\". It means \"union with a wife together with whom a man practises dharma\".</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The clear implication is that carnal pleasure is not its chief purpose, but the pursuit of dharma.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The sastras do not ask a man to pursue dharma all by himself but require him to take a helpmate for it. The wife is called \"dharma-patni\", \"saha-dharma-carini\", thus underlining her connection with dharma, and not with sensual pleasure.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Here is proof of the high esteem in which the sastras hold women.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">THE INDIAN JUDICIARY WITH BENAMI MEDIA AND NCW IN CAHOOTS HAS REDUCED AN INDIAN WOMAN TO A SEX OBJECT..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/dubious-role-of-bilderberg-club-created.html</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">IN SANATANA DHARMA , NO WOMAN CAN ENTER ANY TEMPLE , WHEN SHE IS MENSTRUATING.. THIS IS NOT FOR SABARIMALA ALONE..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN MY HOME MY WIFE HAS NEVER ENTER THE PUJA ROOM WHEN SHE HAD HER PERIODS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\"Deho devalaya prokto jivah prokto sanatanah. \" (The body is a temple. The life enshrined in it is the eternal Lord. )</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">You do not enter the precincts of a temple if you are unclean.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">GAYATRI MANTRA CAN BE CHANTED BY WOMEN AS LONG AS SHE DOES NOT HAVE HER PERIODS..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE KANCHI MUTT HEAD CHANDRASEKHARA SARASWATI WROTE THAT WOMEN CANNOT RECITE GAYATRI MANTRA.. HE IS WRONG.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KANCHI MUTT WAS AN AYYAPPA TEMPLE CONVERTED TO A FAKE MUTT BY JEW ROTHSCHILD..( JUST LIKE UDIPI MUTT )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6Kb0q9J8lPA</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE MEDITATE ON SAVITR, - THE SACRED LIGHT FROM THE PRIMORDIAL SOURCE, MAY SHE GUIDE OUR INTENTIONS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS SACRED LIGHT IN NOT THE SUN, AS WRITTEN AND TOLD BY EVERY BODY SINCE VEDAS WERE WRITTEN DOWN 7000 YEARS AGO.. IT IS THE QUASAR, WHOSE BRILLIANCE EXCEED A TRILLIONS SUNS.</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/gayatri-mantra-savitr-savitur-saraswati.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">There is no mortal author to Gayatri mantra.. Gayatri mantra contains in itself the spirit and energy of all Vedic mantras.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Gayatri is the essence of Rgveda, Yajurveda and Samaveda. The Atharvaveda has its own Gayatri</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE HAVE IMMIGRANTS LIKE ROHINGTON NARIMAN ( WITH FOREIGN DNA ) RULING OVER SANATANA DHARMA.. WE HAVE AN ACTIVIST LAWYER NAMED INDU MALHOTRA CATAPULTED AS SUPREME COURT JUDGE.. WE KNOW WHO STAR KID CHANDRACHUD IS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE WATCH</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n</li>\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9uvv3iW2Ljk/WWMk2bZAlxI/AAAAAAABUtA/g0L1r7BFWxYrPAdowrlLN4XxhqSIt0fvQCLcBGAs/s1600/BBBBB1TBB.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"640\" data-original-width=\"311\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9uvv3iW2Ljk/WWMk2bZAlxI/AAAAAAABUtA/g0L1r7BFWxYrPAdowrlLN4XxhqSIt0fvQCLcBGAs/s640/BBBBB1TBB.jpg\" width=\"310\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A typical scene would\nbe around 100 captains watching in the hall while ONE captain is selected to respond\nto media calls via VHF or satellite phone after a grounding incident where oil\nwas spilt into the harbor.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There would be media\nlike CNN ( all simulation ) asking the Captain all sorts of questions . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In one seminar we had\nthe ship Captain chosen for this ,&nbsp; answering\nall questions like an idiot (nay Little Bo Peep ). &nbsp;He was then bombarded with questions from\nvarious harbor authorities, coast guard, &nbsp;pollution dept, companys technical bosses , commercial bosses , insurance lawyers , salvage tugs, local politicians &nbsp;, yellow media etc &nbsp;( simulated ) and he was answering\nall of them like a CUNT without prioritizing &nbsp;. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a senior Captain , I\nwas called on stage to evaluate the young Captain after this simulated exercise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">I said &nbsp; \u201c In my entire\ncareer as Captain , I have never responded personally even when the situation is\nnormal . &nbsp;&nbsp;Say , while entering a port \u2013 if\nI have to speak to the Port Control , my officer on watch will call the port\ncontrol . &nbsp; Only when the desired man is on line will I as a Captain be called to\ncommunicate and that too\u2014 to the point like ETA . &nbsp; &nbsp;I will\nnever answer questions like \u201cwhat is the length of your ship\u201d --I leave that to the OOW. &nbsp; &nbsp;In the\ncase this Captain of the ship involved in the accident wasted 25% of his precious time\nby calling other parties and behaving like a messenger -nay- a PEON at sea . &nbsp; Captain must never behave like a\npeon when his ship had a disaster . &nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">CAPTAIN IS MEANT TO DO COMMAND AND CONTROL</span></b> \u201c</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>CHECK OUT THE COMMENT BELOW. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; INDIA WILL REMAIN IN THIS PATHETIC STATE AS LONG AS OUR POLITICIANS , POLICE , JUDICIARY , &nbsp;IAS OFFICERS AND MEDIA DO NOT HAVE A TECHNICAL BRAIN&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_2M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/police-reforms-in-india-much-more-with_10.html?showComment=1499658528108#c2627825484868331078\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 10, 2017 at 9:18 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_2MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/300-retailers-quit-after-sale-of-aadhaar-linked-subsidised-fertiliser/articleshow/59519899.cms<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">UREA MEANT FOR FERTILISER HAS BEEN DIVERTED TO NAXALS FOR MAKING NITRO EXPLOSIVES IN A CLANDESTINE MANNER FOR DECADES ... ..INDIAN GOVT DID NOT EVEN KNOW THIS WAS HAPPENING.....</span></b><br />\n<br />\nAT SEA WE CARRY LIQUID UREA ON CHEMICAL TANKERS. TO AVOID CUSTOMS DUTY AND TRADE BLOCKS THEY MISDECLARE THE UREA AS FERTILIZER -- RATHER THAN EXPLOSIVES RAW MATERIAL ..<br />\n<br />\nI KNOW THE DESTINATION BASED ON THE TANK CLEANLINESS THE SHIPPERS DEMAND .<br />\n<br />\nPUT THIS COMMENT IN PM MODIs , AJIT DOVALs AND HOME MINISTERs WEBSITES</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In modern times the\nShip Captain has to warn the crew of immediate sacking if they take photos in\nsecret and send it by WHATSUP or email to media ( sometimes for rewards ). Once\nthe company\u2019s reputation is lost , it is difficult to survive</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This content can find\nits way around the world almost instantly. In a recent case, video of a ship\ncollision recorded on a Filipino crew member\u2019s camera phone was trending on\nyoutube and finding its way into the mainstream media before the owners even\nknew that a collision had occurred.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once I had a man with a\ncamera taking pictures of my ship.&nbsp; When\nsummoned him to my cabin , this white skinned fellow tells me&nbsp; \u201cThis is my country. I don\u2019t need permission\nfrom the Ship\u2019s captain to take a picture\u201d .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I immediately invited him to enter my bed room and take a picture of my\nwife in bed . Then I confiscated his camera , made him gave me his address and\ntold him that the camera will be returned by the ship\u2019s agent.&nbsp; He was then thrown out of the ship.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The Pasha Bulker\nGrounding off Newcastle north of Sydney in 2007 is a classic case study. The\nmishap kickstarted a whole new industry in the sea-side city. Getting a room in\nany motel was difficult. Restaurants were in overdrive. Sticky-beakers and\nhappy-snappers were everywhere. There was this festive feeling in the air. A\nbig coal ship gate-crashing our shores and threatening to leak oil!&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Newcastle\non the world map! &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Lap it up folks !</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>A lot of this had to do\nwith salvage crews and government officials coming to town, not to mention\ntourists. And, of course, the media - journos, producers, crews and support\nstaff in cars, TV trucks, satellite trailers and helicopters, all vying for the\nlatest break or exclusive. A battalion of cameramen and photographers with an\nappetite for information somewhere between insatiable and insane.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>This, of course, isn\u2019t\njust the norm down under. Be assured it will happen pretty much anywhere that a\nbig ship comes to grief, especially if the media can get easy access to capture\nvisuals, and especially if the vessel is in a precarious or striking state\n(listing, semi submerged or losing cargo overboard).</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Captain after an\naccident must not admit liability.&nbsp; There\nis no such thing as an \u201coff the record\u201dremark.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">IT IS BETTER TO READ\nOUT A STATEMENT RATHER THAN BE INVOLVED IN AN OPEN ENDED DIALOGUE .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">AFTER THAT TELL \u201c THE NEXT STATEMENT AT SO\nAND SO TIME&nbsp; . DON\u2019T CALL ME I WILL CALL\nYOU \u201d </span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Simplify your message\nto no more than three bullet points and get these across as often as you can in\nplain, jargon-free English.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I remember a STUPID\nsenior Indian police officer giving a one hour statement to TV after a murder\npeppered with ridiculous references to a popular English novel.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With the exception of\nspecialised maritime magazines, there are only a few journalists who focus on\nthe maritime sector. Therefore, coverage of this complex industry is generally\nleft to economic and financial editors. When maritime incidents occur, the\nmedia ( who don\u2019t know port from starboard ) depends on generalist newsstaff to\ncover these stories.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Therefore, don\u2019t be\nurprised that your incident&nbsp; may become\nan international news ( in case of pollution or loss of life ) event within\nminutes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>AS A SHIP CAPTAIN DO\nNOT ALLOW MEDIA TO AGGRESSIVELY PUT HIS/ HER&nbsp;\nMIKE UNDER YOUR NOSE WITHOUT YOUR CONSENT LIKE WHAT THEY DO FOR PAHLAJ\nNIHALANI .&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">IF HE DOES IT\u2014HE LOSES HIS\nCHANCE FOREVER.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After an accident the\nship captain must show concern and show great understanding for those\naffected\u2014without being TRAGEDY KING .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Show you\u2019re effective.\nDescribe positive actions. Audiences are often not impressed by processes which\nmay lead nowhere.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If no one is assigned\nto manage media in these crucial first hours, the company will lose control of\nthe story. This could have serious ramifications during the response and \u2014 more\nimportantly\u2014 in its aftermath.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your company\u2019s name and\nreputation are on the line!&nbsp; You company\ncould just disappear . You have NO idea how Exxon took a hit .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THE ITALIAN WAITRESS\nDROVE A 131&nbsp; YEAR OLD GRAND OLD PARTY\nINTO THE GROUND BY SENDING HER AKKAL KA DUSHMAN SON TO JNU TO STAND IN\nSOLIDARITY WITH DESH DROHI COMMIE STUDENTS/ PROFESSORS.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">NEHRU/ INDIRA GANDHI/ RAJIV GANDHI WOULD\nNEVER HAVE DONE THIS </b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Managing media in the\nmidst of a crisis is a vital response function.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;A trainer should have real-life experience in\ncrisis communications and management. A public relations or media firm that\nlacks this experience cannot provide the essential knowledge and perspective\nrequired for this specialized form of communications.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There must be a focus\non strategies and steps to take before, during and after media interviews.&nbsp;&nbsp; Interactive use of video can be used to\nenhance the training experience of participants. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Everyone\u2019s familiar\nwith the concept of\u2018reputation\u2019, but measuring and quantifying it is much more\ndifficult</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>For Capt Ajit\nVadakayil\u2014&nbsp; Chanakya is THE FATHER OF THE\nNATION \u2013not Rothschild\u2019s agent Gandhi<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">Chanakyas DANDANITI was\nmore into prevention THAN cure.. </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/untouchables-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/untouchables-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arthashastra&nbsp; contains both the civil law and criminal law.\n&nbsp;&nbsp;Kautilya ascribed a lot of importance\nto \u2018dharma\u2019. &nbsp;&nbsp;According to him, \u2018the\nultimate source of all law is dharma\u2019. He appealed in the name of \u2018dharma\u2019 to\nthe sense of honour and duty and to human dignity, to moral responsibility and\nto enlightened patriotism. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The judge in the\narthashastra was called \u2018dharmashta\u2019 or upholder of dharma. He was NOT an\nadherent of Rothschild\u2019s justice system where JUSTICE IS BLIND. &nbsp;Rather Chanakya\u2019s judicial system was based on\nNATURAL JUSTICE within the perimeter of context. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chanakya warned that anybody giving false\nevidence would face the DANDA ( stick )</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arthashastra-- \u201cbecause\nthe King is the guardian of right conduct of this world with four \u2018varnas\u2019 and\nfour \u2018ashramas\u2019 he (alone) &nbsp;can enact and\npromulgate laws (to uphold them) &nbsp;when\nall traditional codes of conduct perish &nbsp;(through disuse or disobedience).\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/aSPazayi86o/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/aSPazayi86o?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Saam daam dand bhed,\nsaam daam dand bhed &nbsp;(Repeat 5 times)</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Mann mein aghna se\nbhare bolo kahan jaaye<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Saam daam dand bhed,\nsaam daam dand bhed<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Yeh trishna se bhare\nbolo kahan jaaye<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sarkar ke dhwar pe\njaake teher jaaye</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Saam daam dand bhed,\nsaam daam dand bhed (Repeat 2 times)</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Sarkar ek vichaar jo\nmaane ga jaane ga hoo<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Govinda govinda govinda\ngovinda</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Saam daam dand bhed,\nsaam daam dand bhed (Repeat 2 times)</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Anyay ke saath mein\nkaise jiye jaaye<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Saam daam dand bhed,\nsaam daam dand bhed<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Sarkar ke dhwar pe jaake\ntehar jaaye<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Saam daam dand bhed,\nsaam daam dand bhed<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Anyay ke saath mein\nkaise jiye jaaye<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Saam daam dand bhed,\nsaam daam dand bhed<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Sarkar ke dhwar pe\njaake tehar jaaye<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Saam daam dand bhed,\nsaam daam dand bhed</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sarkar besaar ko bhoole\nna bhoole na</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Saam daam dand bhed,\nsaam daam dand bhed (Repeat 2 times)</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Govinda govinda govinda\ngovinda govinda</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Saam daam dand bhed,\nsaam daam dand bhed</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Saam daam dand bhed,\nsaam daam dand bhed</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are four ways of\nmaking someone to do a task, stated as \u201cSaam, Daam, Dand &amp; Bhed\u201d. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This sutra by Chanakya\nis used worldwide. &nbsp;Why? &nbsp;It works and is highly practical. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Chanakya,\nthe primary duty of the king is to protect \"Dharma\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT DENOTES FOUR WAYS IN\nWHICH WORK CAN BE TAKEN FROM OTHERS\u2014BY MOTIVATION<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">MASLOW LIFTED FROM CHANAKYA\nNEETI</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SAAM -knowledge (\nnegotiations, ask after explaining why, evince interest for help , convince ,\ncreate sense of belonging , foster brotherhood , raise awareness from correct\nperspective )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DAAM -money ( offer ,\npay , reward, catalyse, mollify , incentives )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DAND - punishment (\ncreate fear by display of power, consequences , sanctions, discipline ,\npenalize)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BHED \u2013 discriminate (\ndescribing right from wrong \u2013conscience appeal , catalyse , laying own terms)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BHED IS NOT DIVIDE AND\nRULE-- NOR TORTURE-- NOR BY HOOK-- NOR BY CROOK-- NOR EXPLOITATION OF\nVULNERABILITY \u2013 NOR A FOUL STING OPERATION \u2013 NOR AMPUTATE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Malayalam and\nSanskrit BHED means \u201cbetter option \u201c</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DAND is as simple as\nnot allowing your child to eat unless he has washed his hand .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In ancient times the\nKing was looked upon as the &nbsp;protector of\ndharma.&nbsp; &nbsp;He too was governed by his dharma as any other\ncitizen was. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus if any actions of the\nKing went against the prevailing notion of dharma, associations and/or the\nindividual citizens were free to question him. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chanakya wrote that \u2018dharma\u2019 alone is guiding\nstar for every king, or rather every individual and that following \u2018dharma\u2019 one\nshall have a life of dignity while social order prevailing in society.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;
